content: Donald Trump is going to North Carolina for an economic speech. Can he stick to a clear message? ASHEVILLE, N.C. (AP) — Donald Trump will have an opportunity to recalibrate his presidential comeback bid with a rally and speech in North Carolina that his campaign is billing as a significant economic address. The event on Wednesday afternoon in Asheville carries both national and local implications for the former president. Aides and allies say Trump must sharpen his arguments against Vice President Kamala Harris and draw a clear policy contrast, especially on the economy. In recent weeks, he has focused instead on personal attacks and grievances. The speech comes the same day that the Labor Department reported that year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, a potential boon for Harris. Presented with rise in border crossings, Kamala Harris chose a long-term approach to the problem WASHINGTON (AP) — Vice President Kamala Harris was never the “border czar,” as her critics claim. Biden administration officials say she was assigned to tackle the “root causes” of migration from the Central American nations of El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras that were responsible for a large chunk of border crossers. The vice president took a long-term approach to the problem, helping persuade multinational corporations and Latin American businesses to...

WHO declares mpox outbreaks in Africa a global health emergency as a new form of the virus spreads
content: LONDON — The World Health Organization has declared the mpox outbreaks in Congo and elsewhere in Africa a global emergency, with cases confirmed among children and adults in more than a dozen countries and a new form of the virus spreading. Few vaccine doses are available on the continent. Earlier this week, the Africa Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced that the mpox outbreaks were a public health emergency, with more than 500 deaths, and called for international help to stop the virus’ spread. “This is something that should concern us all ... The potential for further spread beyond Africa and beyond is very worrying,” said WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus. The Africa CDC previously said that mpox, also known as monkeypox, has been detected in 13 countries this year, and that more than 96% of all cases and deaths are in Congo. Cases are up 160% and deaths are up 19% compared with the same period last year. So far, there have been more than 14,000 cases and 524 people have died. People are also reading... “We are now in a situation where (mpox) poses a risk to many more neighbors in and around central Africa,” said Salim Abdool Karim, a South African infectious diseases expert who chairs the Africa CDC emergency group. He noted that the new version of mpox spreading from Congo appears to have a death rate of about 3-4%. During the global 2022...

title: Conor Daly to take over No. 78 car for Juncos Hollinger Racing for rest of IndyCar season
creator: By DAVE SKRETTA - AP Sports Writer
content: IndyCar veteran Conor Daly will drive the No. 78 car for Juncos Hollinger Racing for the remainder of the season, beginning with this weekend's race at World Wide Technology Raceway near St. Louis, the team announced Wednesday. Daly is taking over for Agustin Canapino, who parted ways with the team last week after a series of social media firestorms. “I am extremely pleased to reunite with (team co-owner) Ricardo Juncos after our success together in the Road to Indy,” Daly said, referring to the IndyCar feeder system. “Ricardo took a chance on me when I was young and it made a huge difference in my career. There are a lot of people on this team that I’ve worked with before and that gives me a lot of confidence.” Canapino stepped away from Juncos Hollinger Racing in June before a race at Road America after disputing claims that rival driver Théo Pourchaire of Arrow McLaren Racing had received online death threats from Canapino's fans following an on-track incident between the two. Arrow McLaren wound up severing its technical and marketing relationship with the team. Another driver, former Juncos Hollinger teammate Callum Ilott, has said Canapino’s passionate fan base had made threatening comments last season. Ilott said he felt he never received support from the team and was released at the end of last season. Meanwhile, Canapino's performance also had been on a downward...

There was nothing new posted Wednesday on the artist’s website or his Instagram page, where his avid fans typically learn of his recent work. NASA still deciding whether to keep 2 astronauts at space station until next year
creator: By MARCIA DUNN - AP Aerospace Writer

title: NASA still deciding whether to keep 2 astronauts at space station until next year
content: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) — NASA said Wednesday it's still deciding whether to keep two astronauts at the International Space Station until early next year and send their troubled Boeing capsule back empty. Rather than flying Boeing’s Starliner back to Earth, Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams would catch a ride on SpaceX’s next flight . That option would keep them at the space station until next February. The test pilots anticipated being away just a week or so when they rocketed away as Starliner's first crew. But thruster failures and helium leaks marred the capsule’s trip to the space station, raising doubts about its ability to return safely and leaving the astronauts in limbo. NASA officials said they're analyzing more data before making a decision by end of next week or beginning of the next. These thrusters are crucial for holding the capsule in the right position when it comes time to descend from orbit. “We’ve got time available before we bring Starliner home and we want to use that time wisely," said Ken Bowersox, NASA’s space operations mission chief. Switching to SpaceX would require bumping two of the four astronauts assigned to the next ferry flight, currently targeted for late September. Wilmore and Williams would take the empty seats in SpaceX’s Dragon capsule once that half-year mission ends. Another complication: The space station has just two parking places...

content: Donald Trump is going to North Carolina for an economic speech. Can he stick to a clear message? ASHEVILLE, N.C. (AP) — Donald Trump will have an opportunity to recalibrate his presidential comeback bid with a rally and speech in North Carolina that his campaign is billing as a significant economic address. The event on Wednesday afternoon in Asheville carries both national and local implications for the former president. Aides and allies say Trump must sharpen his arguments against Vice President Kamala Harris and draw a clear policy contrast, especially on the economy. In recent weeks, he has focused instead on personal attacks and grievances. The speech comes the same day that the Labor Department reported that year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, a potential boon for Harris. title: AP Business SummaryBrief at 1:33 p.m. EDT
content: Annual US inflation falls to 3-year low, clearing the way for the Fed to begin cutting rates WASHINGTON (AP) — Year-over-year inflation reached its lowest level in more than three years in July, the latest sign that the worst price spike in four decades is fading and setting up the Federal Reserve for an interest rate cut in September. Measured from a year earlier, prices rose 2.9%, down from 3% in June. It was the mildest year-over-year inflation figure since March 2021. The ongoing inflation slowdown could affect the presidential campaign, given that former President Donald Trump has highlighted rampant inflation as a key failing of the Biden administration and its energy policies. Vice President Kamala Harris has said she would soon unveil new proposals to “bring down costs and also strengthen the economy overall.” Sweet and salty deal worth $30 billion would put M&M's and Snickers alongside Cheez-It and Pringles M&M’s maker Mars is buying Kellanova, the maker of Cheez-Its and Pop-Tarts, for nearly $30 billion. The deal could significantly broaden Mars' snacking portfolio and help it expand globally. Kellanova was created last year when the Kellogg Co. split into two companies. Chicago-based Kellanova sells many of the former company’s most profitable brands, including Pringles and Rice Krispies Treats. It had net sales of more than $13 billion last year. title: Haider-Wallner: „Die Leute haben genug vom Drüberfahren“
ORRIN MORRIS: God’s love is like a discovered treasure
creator: By Orrin Morrisodmsketchingpad@yahoo.com
content: In Matthew 13:44 (KJV) Jesus illustrated the excitement of discovery of God’s love and grace. He said, “Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field; the which when a man hath found, he hideth, and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath, and buyeth that field.” (KJV) I was probably surrounded by today’s wildflowers for more than 20 years before I discovered them. One July, about 2 p.m., I was looking out the kitchen window and saw a strange sight. A ray of sunlight had lit the ground through the leaves of a white oak tree. Elsewhere, the ground was in shadows. In the center of the brightly lit area was a stick about a foot tall with flying bugs all over it, or so I thought. I rushed out with my camera and took more than a dozen photos. The “bugs” were actually blooms. CRANEFLY ORCHID Tipularia discolor This strange orchid has blooms on a single stem with no leaves, as illustrated. In fact, after the seed pods dry and the stem dies, only a single leaf remains at ground level. It remains green throughout the winter (see the lower inset). The underside of the leaf is purple and in some cases the veins are elevated like ribs. As the daylight lengthens in the spring the leaf dies. Often there is no sign that the plant exists, then in summer a solitary thin stalk rises from the ground. Most of the activity is underground. In the soil a corm exists, a...

title: Vinesh Phogat’s appeal for a shared silver Olympic wrestling medal rejected by arbitration court
creator: By CLIFF BRUNT - AP Sports Writer
content: Indian wrestler Vinesh Phogat’s appeal for a shared silver medal after she was disqualified from an Olympic final for missing weight has been rejected by the ad-hoc division of the Court of Arbitration for Sport in Paris, the court said Wednesday. The Indian Olympic Association's President, P.T. Usha, expressed shock and disappointment at the court's decision, the Press Trust of India reported. Phogat was disqualified from the final in the women's 50-kilogram freestyle category after weighing in 100 grams above the weight limit on Aug. 7. Instead of becoming India’s first woman to compete in an Olympic final, she was denied a medal. She appealed, requesting credit for the three wins she earned after weighing in successfully on Aug. 6. The Court of Arbitration for Sport —- the highest court in sports -— said a judge held a hearing Friday regarding Phogat’s case against United World Wrestling and the International Olympic Committee. The court originally said a decision was expected by the end of the Olympics on Sunday, but it granted arbitrator Annabelle Bennett more time, citing “exceptional circumstances,” and pushed the deadline for a decision to Tuesday. And then on Tuesday, the Wrestling Federation of India said the court pushed its deadline back to Friday. Phogat announced Aug. 8 on social media that she would retire from the sport. The post, written in Hindi , translates...

title: WHO declares mpox outbreaks in Africa a global health emergency as a new form of the virus spreads
content: LONDON (AP) — The World Health Organization has declared the mpox outbreaks in Congo and elsewhere in Africa a global emergency, with cases confirmed among children and adults in more than a dozen countries and a new form of the virus spreading. Few vaccine doses are available on the continent. Earlier this week, the Africa Centers for Disease Control and Prevention announced that the mpox outbreaks were a public health emergency, with more than 500 deaths, and called for international help to stop the virus’ spread. “This is something that should concern us all ... The potential for further spread beyond Africa and beyond is very worrying,” said WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus. The Africa CDC previously said that mpox, also known as monkeypox, has been detected in 13 countries this year, and that more than 96% of all cases and deaths are in Congo. Cases are up 160% and deaths are up 19% compared with the same period last year. So far, there have been more than 14,000 cases and 524 people have died. “We are now in a situation where (mpox) poses a risk to many more neighbors in and around central Africa,” said Salim Abdool Karim, a South African infectious diseases expert who chairs the Africa CDC emergency group. He noted that the new version of mpox spreading from Congo appears to have a death rate of about 3-4%. During the global 2022 mpox outbreak that...

title: Incêndios deflagram em quintal e habitação do Bairro Padre Cruz em Lisboa
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: D ois incêndios deflagraram, esta quarta-feira, num quintal e numa habitação devoluta, no Bairro Padre Cruz, em Lisboa, confirmou o Notícias ao Minuto junto do Regimento de Sapadores Bombeiros de Lisboa. De acordo com a mesma fonte, os incêndios ocorreram ambos na Rua Rio Lena, sendo que o primeiro alerta foi dado pelas 15h44 e, à chegada, os "operacionais depararam-se com outro incêndio", tendo separado os meios. Um dos incêndios ocorreu numa moradia devoluta e o outro num quintal, que afetou cerca de 50 metros quadrados. Os dois incêndios já se encontram extintos. Nos locais, estiveram um total de oito viaturas e 30 operacionais do Regimento de Sapadores Bombeiros de Lisboa, além da Polícia de Segurança Pública (PSP). As causas dos incidentes ainda não são conhecidas. Leia Também: Mulher detida após queima que evoluiu para incêndio nas Caldas da Rainha

title: "Maioria dos residentes das zonas fronteiriças de Kursk" foi retirada
creator: Lusa
content: "A maioria dos residentes das zonas fronteiriças da região de Kursk foram temporariamente deslocados e encontram-se em locais seguros", assinalou o ministério na rede social Telegram, sem fornecer o número total de civis abrangidos. No entanto, precisou que 8.000 dos deslocados se encontram em abrigos situados em 11 regiões russas. Na segunda-feira, o governador em funções de Kursk, Alexei Smirnov, assegurou que cerca de 121.000 pessoas foram retiradas das zonas fronteiriças com a Ucrânia e outras 60.000 transferidas para locais mais seguros. Smirnov também afirmou que as forças ucranianas controlavam 28 localidades em território de Kursk, onde vivem cerca de 2.000 pessoas, mas não forneceu informações sobre a sua situação atual. O comando militar ucraniano assegurou hoje que mantém sob controlo até 76 localidades russas e anunciou planos para a formação de "corredores humanitários" em Kursk para a retirada dos civis. Em simultâneo, as autoridades ucranianas anunciaram uma retirada maciça da região de Sumy, fronteiriça com a província russa de Kursk, e que implicará o abandono de 138 localidades pelos seus habitantes. Em Belgorod, outra região junto à fronteira com a Ucrânia, as autoridades locais referiam-se hoje a uma certa estabilização da situação e ao início do regresso a casa de parte dos civis previamente retirados. A ofensiva militar...

title: Euro ultrapassa 1,10 dólares e regista máximo desde janeiro
creator: Lusa
content: P elas 18h01 (hora de Lisboa), o euro seguia a 1,1018 dólares, quando na terça-feira, pela mesma hora, negociava a 1,0971 dólares. O euro também subiu relativamente à libra e ao iene. O Banco Central Europeu (BCE) fixou a taxa cambial do euro em 1,1019 dólares. A taxa de inflação homóloga abrandou em julho nos Estados Unidos, situando-se em 2,9%, contra 3% em junho, segundo o índice CPI, divulgado hoje pelo Departamento do Trabalho. No entanto, na comparação mensal, os preços subiram 0,2% face ao mês anterior, depois de terem caído 0,1% em junho. Já a inflação subjacente, que exclui os preços mais voláteis dos alimentos e da energia, fixou-se nos 3,2%, abaixo dos 3,3% registados em junho. Em termos mensais, este indicador acelerou 0,2%. A taxa anual do índice de preços ao consumidor é a mais baixa desde março de 2021, enquanto a inflação subjacente está no nível mais baixo desde abril de 2021. "Difamação". Carlos Pinto nega ameaças à ex-mulher e avança com queixa
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: C arlos Pinto saiu em liberdade após ter cumprido oito dos onze anos a que foi condenado por ter tentado matar a mulher, Eliza, num hotel em Espanha. O caso voltou a ser notícia esta semana, após a vítima ter denunciado que está novamente a ser alvo de ameaças por parte agora ex-marido. No entanto, o português nega todas as acusações e revelou que vai apresentar uma "queixa no Ministério Público por difamação e perseguição". O caso foi denunciado por Eliza, de nacionalidade romena, ao Notícias ao Minuto , que adiantou que voltou a receber ameaças do ex-marido através das redes sociais, após este ter saído em liberdade condicional de uma prisão em Vigo. Além dela, também os seus amigos próximos terão, alegadamente, recebido 'pedidos de amizade' no Facebook vindos de Carlos Pinto. Num comunicado enviado ao Notícias ao Minuto , o homem alega as informações são "falsas" e que "nunca" se aproximou de "amigos ou redes sociais da Eliza", que, segundo garante ainda, "não é a vítima". Eliza contou também, anteriormente, que o ex-marido lhe enviou várias cartas. "Nas primeiras cartas que enviou, ofereceu dinheiro para que eu desistisse do caso. Acho que na altura, as cartas diziam 150 mil euros. Depois começaram as cartas de ameaças", disse a mulher. Mas Carlos Pinto alegou agora que "é mentira que tenha mandado alguma carta com ou sem ameaças à...

content: A semana de de Atlético-MG e Cruzeiro foi peculiar. A rivalidade, que é comum em Minas Gerais e em todo o Brasil, cruzou as fronteiras e veio parar em Buenos Aires. O Galo, na última terça-feira (13), empatou por 1 a 1 com o San Lorenzo , pela primeira partida das oitavas de final da CONMEBOL Libertadores , enquanto a Raposa, na quinta (15), às 21h30 (de Brasília), encara o Boca Juniors , pela mesma fase, mas da CONMEBOL Sul-Americana . ESPN no Disney+ O Disney+ está ainda maior e melhor. Filmes, séries e os esportes da ESPN num só lugar. Conheça o novo Disney+. No Nuevo Gasómetro, de acordo com a assessoria do Ciclón , foram vendidos 412 ingressos para os alvinegros dos 2 mil disponíveis, enquanto a torcida celeste, desde a última quinta (8), esgotou a carga de 2 mil na Bombonera. E o tema foi motivo para os torcedores cruzeirenses ironizarem o rival pelo público cinco vezes menor em Buenos Aires. "Não tem como comparar, eles gostam de comparar, jamais comparem. Se colocasse cinco mil ingressos à venda, iria vender os cinco mil para a torcida do Cruzeiro", disse o torcedor Victor Souza ao ESPN.com.br . "Até quem era sócio não conseguiu comprar, a torcida é a maior, não tem jeito. Podia colocar cinco mil, dez mil, a gente ia lotar La Bombonera, é a maior de Minas", completou João Vitor Abreu. Já os amigos Keven Clayton e Allan Righi, que vieram juntos...

title: Jornal argentino chama Cássio de 'vilão' do Boca e se irrita com retorno do goleiro à Bombonera: 'O destino insiste'
content: Em artigo publicado nesta quarta-feira (14), o jornal Olé lamentou o novo encontro do Boca Juniors com o goleiro Cássio , que vai ocorrer nesta quinta-feira (15), às 21h30 (de Brasília), em duelo contra o Cruzeiro , pelas oitavas da CONMEBOL Sul-Americana . O diário chamou o arqueiro de "vilão" dos xeneizes e lembrou suas grandes atuações em derrotas do Boca em CONMEBOL Libertadores : na final de 2012 e nas oitavas de 2022. ESPN no Disney+ O Disney+ está ainda maior e melhor. Filmes, séries e os esportes da ESPN num só lugar. Conheça o novo Disney+. Em tom de irritação, o veículo de Buenos Aires reclamou de como o "destino insiste" em colocar Cássio no caminho do time argentino, principalmente em estágios decisivos de torneios continentais. "Parece que o destino insiste em colocar Cássio em frente ao Boca Juniors. Ele decretou o fim de uma era com sua saída do Corinthians, assinando com o Cruzeiro e deixando para trás a melhor etapa de sua carreira. Mas o terror do Boca não terminou com seu adeus ao Timão: o vilão do filme vai atacar de novo. Nesta quinta, o goleiro voltará a protagonizar esse papel em La Bombonera , pelas oitavas da Sul-Americana, para tentar seguir sendo o carrasco dos xeneizes ", escreveu. "Cássio é um desses jogadores que nunca jogaram no Boca, mas todos os torcedores do clube têm seu nome em mente. Pelo Corinthians, ele...

creator: By PAULA PASCHE - Associated Press

title: Lions coach Dan Campbell says leg injury to Jahmyr Gibbs is going to be 'fine'
content: ALLEN PARK, Mich. (AP) — Detroit Lions running back Jahmyr Gibbs, dressed in shorts, watched training camp from the sideline on Wednesday after he left practice earlier in the week with a leg injury. As a rookie last season, Gibbs rushed for 945 yards with 10 touchdowns along with 316 receiving yards and a score. After he was sidelined with a soft tissue injury in the spring, he had been healthy during training camp. The team called it a leg injury with ESPN reporting that it’s a hamstring. Coach Dan Campbell does not seem concerned about the injury status of Gibbs or rookie cornerbacks Terrion Arnold (upper body) and Ennis Rakestraw (ankle), who also were injured on Monday. “I think we’re going to be fine here, I think we’ll be good,” Campbell said in a radio interview on Wednesday, without offering specifics on the injuries. Arnold, a first-round draft pick, has impressed in camp and has lined up mostly with the starters during drills. On Wednesday, he worked apart from the team running on a grassy hill near the practice field. Defensive coordinator Aaron Glenn could not say if he’ll be ready for the season opener on Sept. 8 against the Los Angeles Rams. “We’ve seen enough, but he’s not where he needs to be. He needs a lot of improvement to do,” Glenn said. “Once he gets back from his injury he has to get out there and grind and continue to work.” Backup quarterback Hendon...

title: Shaqiri, Chicago agree to contract termination
creator: ESPN
content: and the have agreed to a contract termination, bringing an end to the midfielder's disappointing spell at the club, it was announced Wednesday. Shaqiri joined Chicago from in 2022 for what was a then-club-record fee of of $7.5 million. At the time, he was the top earner in MLS on a salary of $8.15 million, before being usurped by duo and , as well as 's . "After discussions with Xherdan, we have mutually agreed that parting ways is in the best interest of all parties," sporting director Georg Heitz said in a . "We thank him for his contributions to the Club and wish him success in the next chapter of his career." Shaqiri -- who previously played for European heavyweights , and -- struggled to live up to that price tag and reputation in Chicago. In 75 matches (63 starts) for the Fire across all competitions, he scored 16 goals and registered 20 assists. The Fire failed to make the MLS playoffs in 2022 and 2023 and currently sits 14th in the 15-team Eastern Conference with nine games of the regular season remaining. Shaqiri, who has won 125 caps for Switzerland, will now be a free agent. "I believe this is the right time for me to explore new opportunities in my career," Shaqiri added in the team release. "I want to thank the Club and the fans for their support during my time in Chicago. I wish the Fire nothing but success moving forward." Shaqiri's departure comes two days...

title: Sources: Arsenal, Real Sociedad in Merino talks
creator: Alex Kirkland, Rodrigo Faez
content: and are accelerating talks over the transfer of midfielder to the club, sources have told ESPN. The player has already given his approval for the move to go ahead, sources said, but an agreement between the clubs is yet to be reached. Arsenal's interest in Merino is nothing new. Coach Mikel Arteta has been a fan of the player for some time, and believes his profile -- and evolution in recent seasons -- is what his team needs. Merino, 28, was part of the Spain team that lifted the Euro 2024 title, contributing most notably with an extra-time winner against Germany in the quarterfinals. He has twice turned down offers to renew his contract at Real Sociedad, and the Basque club know they must find a destination for him this summer to avoid losing him for free in a year's time. The size of the transfer fee is the principal obstacle to concluding a deal, sources told ESPN. The LaLiga club expect to receive at least €35 million ($38.6m) for one of their star players, while Arsenal believe that are asking for too much given that Merino's contract expires in 2025. However rejected a €35m offer for Atletico Madrid earlier this summer, the sources added. The two clubs have a good relationship, however, and there is optimism about reaching a positive solution for all parties. Sources also said that Real Sociedad are close to agreeing a new contract with after the midfielder turned down a...

Pojavila se nova vrsta fetiša, muškarci za ovo plaćaju i do 20.000 dolara
content: Seks fetiši polako prestaju da budu tabu teme i sve je više muškaraca i žena koji otvoreno pričaju o svojim seksualnim fantazijama. Međutim, pojavio se novi fetiš trend koji je zapanjio i šokirao mnoge. Reč je o finansijskoj dominaciji koja postaje sve popularnija i zbog koje mnogi muškarci troše ogromne količine novca. Osim mogućnosti da ima nekoga drugog sa strane, postoje i drugi razlozi zbog čega muškarac neće želeti da bude intiman. 19:37 13.8.2024. 1 d Nedavna studija otkrila je da trojka može predstavljati pozitivno iskustvo za sve koji su u takvoj vezi. 19:40 12.8.2024. 2 d Sigurno ste čuli za žensku dominaciju, gde se žena pretvara kao da je gospodarica muškaraca i koja mu naređuje da radi sve što je po njenoj želji. Ovo je jedan od popularnjih muškh fetiša, a finansijska dominacija je isto to, samo što je novac uključen u priču. Muškarci bukvalno plaćaju žene i mole ih da one budu dominantne nad njima, gde one vrše seksualnu torturu po njihovoj želji. Poenta je da se novac daje tokom tok seksualno čina i da mušakrac kosntantno daje svoj novac.Međutim, glavna stvar kod ovog fetiša jeste ta što je reč o ogromnim količinama novca, a neke devojke su rekle da su za noć zarađivale i po 20.000 dolara, jer je davanje tolikog novca ono što je uzbuđivalo muškarce. Genova 2024, festa e grande tennis per i 20 anni dell'Aon Open Challenger-Memorial Giorgio Messina
content: Edizione da record per l’Aon Open Challenger-Memorial Giorgio Messina che festeggia 20 edizioni, un compleanno speciale per il torneo internazionale di tennis che si svolgerà a Genova dal 1 all’8 settembre presso i campi in terra rossa di Valletta Cambiaso. Con i suoi 185mila dollari di Total Financial Commitment si conferma uno dei principali dei tornei italiani dopo gli Internazionali di Roma ma soprattutto, con i suoi 20 anni, è inserito nella ristretta cerchia dei challenger più longevi in tutto il mondo. Nishikori e tanti altri big in campo a Genova Un’edizione 2024, sempre sotto la direzione di Sergio Palmieri, figura illustre del tennis nazionale, che presenterà ai nastri di partenza il numero 70 del mondo come il brasiliano Thiago Seyboth Wild, già vincitore a Genova nel 2023 in finale contro Fabio Fognini davanti ad uno stadio ‘Beppe Croce’ sold out con oltre 2000 persone. In carriera ha vinto anche un torneo ATP 250. Attesa anche per l’altro brasiliano Thiago Monteiro, numero 76 del ranking ATP e trionfatore a Genova nel 2022 vincendo con l’azzurro Andrea Pellegrino. Presenza illustre quella del giapponese Kei Nishikori al rientro nei mesi scorsi dopo un lungo infortunio: è stato numero 4 del mondo ed ha un palmares ricchissimo con 6 titoli vinti nei torneo ATP 500 e altrettanti in quelli ATP 250. E nei giorni scorsi ha battuto nel Master 1000 di Montreal in...

title: The one feature in Google’s Weather app update I’ve been waiting for
creator: Robby Payne
content: For years at this point, I’ve used the different incarnations of Google’s Weather app. From widgets to the web app to the included app in Android, it’s the simple, straightforward weather solution I’ve relied on for a long time. Recent additions like the real-time rain gauge have proven useful and I’ve found that the daily, hourly and 10-day forecast are usually pretty accurate. With most of their weather info being based on weather.com, it’s less about the Google Weather app being more or less accurate: it’s about having a clean interface to see it all from. advertisement The lingering issue But for all the things the Google Weather app has done right over the years, I’ve always been frustrated that a simple weather map isn’t included. Why this is the case is a complete mystery to me, but I really do hate having to leave the weather app I like the most to open up the ad-riddled Weather Channel app just to see where an upcoming storm is approaching from. No longer a problem...soon During Google’s hardware event yesterday, however, the brief time spent on the updated Google Weather app looks to finally be solving this issue, and I can’t wait to use it. Sure, there are new widgets and other great features on the way, but I only care that I’ll be able to check the precipitation map when bad weather is looming. I’ve embedded the event video below right at the moment you can see...

title: Serie B, Brescia-Palermo sarà trasmessa gratis su Dazn
content: Toccherà a Brescia e Palermo aprire la Serie B 2024-25. Allo "Stadio Mario Rigamonti" andrà in scena l'anticipo del venerdì della prima giornata della regular season, che vedrà protagoniste le squadre allenate da Rolando Maran e Alessio Dionisi. La novità, che farà piacere a tifosi ed appassionati di calcio, è rappresentata dal servizio offerto da DAZN per l'occasione. Brescia-Palermo gratis su DAZN DAZN , che trasmetterà tutte le 390 partite del campionato di Serie B, renderà visibile gratuitamente la prima gara della stagione: per assistere alla sfida Brescia-Palermo , in programma venerdì 16 agosto alle 20.30, basterà andare su dazn.com/home e, una volta cliccato su uno dei free content disponibili in home page, registrarsi gratuitamente con e-mail, nome e cognome. Dopo l'amara eliminazione dai playoff dello scorso anno, rondinelle e rosanero ripartono da qui, così come la cadetteria. ABBONATI A DAZN PER VEDERE TUTTA LA SERIE B

title: U automobilu izmjereno 48 stepeni: Puste ulice, nepodnošljive vrućine u ovom bh. gradu
content: Ulice Bijeljine danas u popodnevnim satima bile su puste zbog nepodnošljivih vrućina u tom bosanskohercegovačkom gradu. U Karađorđevoj i Ulici Meše Selimovića naišao bi tek po neki prolaznik, a slično je i u ostalim ulicama, jer napolje izlazi samo ko mora. U vozilu, koje je bilo parkirano na suncu, izmjereno je 48 stepeni, prenosi InfoBijeljina . Meteorolozi i za naredne dane najavljuju paklene vrućine, a ljekari savjetuju građane na dodatni oprez. title: Alfa INFO / Nastavak radova na tunelu Hranjen
content: U večerašnjem Alfa INFO gledajte: - Nakon što je IPSA Institut iz Sarajeva izabran za obavljanje poslova nadzora, nastavljeni su radovi na probijanju tunela Hranjen, na trasi brze ceste Sarajevo – Goražde. Prema informaciji Autocesta FBiH, ovaj složeni projekat podrazumijevao je i potrebu provođenja kompletnog procesa eksproprijacije, te ishodovanje svih potrebnih saglasnosti, kao i dozvola od nadležnih institucija i ministarstava, te je posao nadzora, vrijedan 350.961 KM sa uračunatim PDV-om dodijeljen ponuđaču IPSA Institut d.o.o. Sarajevo. - U Sarajevu je upriličena primopredaja vozila za Gorsku službu spašavanja Federacije Bosne i Hercegovine, koji je donirala Turska agencija za saradnju i koordinaciju (TIKA). Svečnooj primopredaji na sarajevskoj Darivi prisustvovali su predsjednik TIKA-e Serkan Kayalar, ambasador Turske u Bosni i Hercegovini Sadik Babur Girgin te brojni volonteri i predstavnici GSS-a. - Fudbaleri madridskog Reala večeras od 21 sat igraju protiv Atalante u utakmici UEFA Superkupa. Susret pobjednika prošlosezonskog izdanja Lige prvaka i Evropske lige igra se na stadionu Narodovi u Varšavi. title: Situacija je ozbiljna, ali spriječena je prava katastrofa na Ponijerima
content: Požar je pogodio Crni vrh, područje između Kaknja i Zavidovića, a prava katastrofa spriječena je prooravanjem puteva. - Moram pohvaliti uposlenika ŠPD Zavidovići, Šumarija Kakanj. Njihovim prooravanjem puteva uspješno je spriječena velika katastrofa. Zahvaljujući kakanjskim vatrogascima koji su dopremili potrebnu vodu dio požara prema Podborju je stavljen pod kontrolu. Do kasno sinoć smo pokušavali obezbijediti helikoptere za gašenje. Hvala Mirnesi Softić koja je svojim znanjem i autoritetom uspjela obezbijediti da danas budu angažovana dva helikoptera na gašenju ovog požara. Očekujemo njihov angažman u popodnevnim satima. Trenutno velike temperature ne dozvoljavaju kvalitetan angažman Situacija je ozbiljna ali sam ubijeđen da ćemo i ovaj požar ugasiti, kao što su naši vatrogasci jutros rano ugasili požar koji je nesavjesni građanin zapalio na Teševu - objavio je načelnik Općine Kakanj Mirnes Bajtarević. title: Policajci Edin Ranica i Šaban Topovčić: Velika je čast nositi grb Bosne i Hercegovine na uniformi!
content: U novom intervjuu na Avaz TV gostovali su Edin Ranica i Šaban Topovčić, službenici Direkcije za koordinaciju policijskih tijela BiH. Oni su u fokus javnosti došli prošle sedmice, kada su na moru u Makarskoj od sigurne smrti spasili izbjeglice iz Ukrajine. U ovom tekstu, u direktnom prijenosu pratite najzanimljivije izjave iz intervjua. 1' - Bili udarna vijest u svim medijima u Hrvatskoj i BiH. Redovno smo obavljali svoje poslove na području Hrvatske. Bili smo u pratnji jednog funkcionera. Slučajno smo se ti zadesili. To je Allahova odredba da sve obaveze ostavimo, da odemo na plažu i da se nađemo u tom trenutku na licu mjesta. 4' - Starija gospođa Lasija je naduvala svoj dušek i otišla je u more. S njom su bile snaha i kćerka i one su je prevrnule sa dušeka. Čuo sam kolegu Šabana kako mi govori "Guraj, guraj, plivaj, guši se." 5' - Bilo je i pomalo scena na koje nisam navika. Kada se čovjek guši, hvata se za posljednju slamku spasa. Njih tri su se borile za život i svaka je preko druge dvije gledala da se spasi. Ovu stariju gospođu je dijelilo 10 sekundi od smrti. 7' - Nakon svega smo ustanovili da se radi o porodici koja se iz Ukrajine uputila prema Međugorju na molitvu. Nakon toga, iz Međugorja idu u Njemačku. Bježe iz Ukrajine zbog ruske invazije. 8' - Gospođa koja je spašena poslala nam je poruku da smo njeni anđeli čuvari i da joj je taj dan drugi...

Helez o učinku helikopterske jedinice u gašenju požara: Ponosan sam na OSBIH, ali ne razumijem vlasti RS
content: Helikopteri Oružanih snaga BiH vrše posljednje pripreme i uskoro će poletjeti kako bi gasili požar na području Ponijera kod Kaknja, objavio je ministar odbrane Bosne i Hercegovine Zukan Helez. Ovo će im biti sedmi angažman pri gašenju požara u našoj zemlji u posljednjih 15 dana. Do sada su uspješno ugasili požare kod Bugojna, Olova, Drvara, Žepča, Mostara i Foče. - Pored angažmana helikoptera Oružanih snaga BiH pri gašenju požara, Oružane snage BiH su uputile 30 svojih pripadnika sa mehanizacijom i vozilima za gašenje požara kod Bileće. Iako je osnovni zadatak Oružanih snaga BiH zaštita suvereniteta, državnosti i teritorijalnog integriteta naše zemlje, Oružane snage BiH pokazuju da spremne i sposobne pomoći građanima naše zemlje pri elementarnim nepogodama. Moram priznati da me žalosti, a istovremeno i ne razumijem vlasti manjeg bosanskohercegovačkog entiteta RS za uporno zaobilaženje i ignoriranje helikoptera Oružanih snaga naše zemlje pri gašenju požara. Napominjem da bez zahtjeva lokalnih vlasti i saglasnosti Predsjedništva BiH ne mogu podignuti helikoptere i gasiti požar. Kako god, ponosan sam na naše Oružane snage koje su uspješnim angažmanom pri gašenju požara u vrlo kratkom roku pokazale su spremne i sposobne izići na kraj sa najtežim izazovima i biti na usluzi svim građanima u našoj domovini - naveo je Helez. Helikopteri...

İngilizce konuşan ülkeler arasında en uzun yaşayanlar belli oldu
content: 9news'un haberine göre, araştırmacılar, Avustralya, Yeni Zelanda, Kanada, Birleşik Krallık ve ABD gibi İngilizce konuşulan ülkeler dahil Avusturya, Belçika, Danimarka, Finlandiya, Fransa, Almanya, İtalya, Japonya, Hollanda, Norveç, Portekiz, İspanya, İsveç ve İsviçre gibi 20 gelişmiş ülkedeki insanların 1990-2019 yılları arasındaki ortalama yaşam süreleri incelendi. EN UZUN AVUSTRALYALILAR YAŞIYOR Araştırmada, Avustralya vatandaşlarının İngilizce konuşan ülkeler arasında en fazla yaşam süresine sahip oldukları kaydedildi. Buna göre, Avustralya'da ABD'ye göre 4 ila 5 yıl, Kanada, Yeni Zelanda, İrlanda ve Birleşik Krallık'a göre ise 1 ila 2,5 yıl arasında yaşam beklentisinin daha uzun olduğu ortaya çıktı. Kanada ise söz konusu ülkeler arasında en fazla yaşam süresine sahip ikinci ülke oldu. Kadınların ortalama yaşam süresinin 81,5 yıl, erkeklerin ise ortalama 76,5 yıl çıktığı ABD'nin ise İngilizce konuşulan ülkeler arasında en kısa yaşam süresine sahip olan ülke olduğu belirlendi. Ayrıca, araştırmacılar, Avustralya'da uyuşturucu ve alkol kullanımı, kanserler ile kardiyovasküler ve solunum yolu hastalıklarından kaynaklanan ölüm oranlarının daha düşük olduğuna dikkati çekti. Öte yandan, İngilizce konuşulan ülkelerdeki kadınlar, 20 yüksek gelirli ülkelerde ortalama ömür sıralamasında hiçbir zaman en üst...

content: ، محمد ربیعی چهارشنبه شب در نشست خبری پیش از بازی با پرسپولیس در جمع خبرنگاران در هتل امیرکبیر اراک افزود: دیدار عصر فردا بازی نخست لیگ است که شرایط خاص خود را دارد. وی بیان کرد: پرسپولیس قهرمان ۲ دوره متوالی و چندین دوره لیگ و تیم قابل احترامی است. سرمربی تیم فوتبال ذوب‌آهن اصفهان ادامه داد: تیم پرسپولیس از نظر فنی و کیفی از وضعیت خوبی برخوردار است و خود را نسبت به گذشته برای حضور در لیگ نخبگان آماده کرده است. ربیعی اظهار کرد: همه تیم‌ها امسال با پیش فصل کوتاهی همراه بودند و تیم ذوب‌آهن تنها ۲۵ روز زمان داشت که فرصتی اندک برای آماده‌سازی فصل جدید بود. وی گفت: این مهم دلایل متعددی داشت اما به هرحال همه تیم‌ها با آن دست و پنجه نرم می‌کنند. سرمربی تیم فوتبال ذوب آهن اصفهان افزود: در این میان مشکلات اداری هم برای استفاده از بازیکنان وجود دارد که فردا پس از بازی در این زمینه صحبت می‌کنم و فعلا تمرکزمان بر بازی با پرسپولیس است. ربیعی ابراز امیدواری کرد: بازی فردا مقابل پرسپولیس در ورزشگاه امام خمینی(ره) اراک خوب باشد تا همه کسانی‌که این دیدار را تماشا می‌کنند از آن لذت ببرند. وی در خصوص برخی شرایط تیم ذوب آهن توضیح داد: چهار بازیکن خوب سال گذشته تیم با مصدومیت جدا شدند، ۲ بازیکن تیم سرباز شدند و ۲ مهره تاثیرگذار هم به تیم‌های دیگر رفتند. سرمربی تیم فوتبال ذوب آهن اصفهان ادامه داد: جواد محمدی یکی از بازیکنانی است که به فولاد رفته و بحث‌های حقوقی آن را باشگاه دنبال می‌کند و محمد حسن اسلامی هم دیگر بازیکنی است که به تیم استقلال پیوسته است. ربیعی عنوان کرد: تیم ذوب آهن...

Disney wants wrongful death suit thrown out because widower bought an Epcot ticket and had Disney+
creator: By Jordan Valinsky, CNN
content: NEW YORK — A man suing Walt Disney Parks and Resorts for the wrongful death of his wife is facing a new legal hurdle: Disney is trying to get it dismissed and sent to arbitration — because he signed up for Disney+ years earlier. Court documents show that the company is trying to get the $50,000 lawsuit dismissed because the plaintiff, Jeffrey Piccolo, signed up for a one-month trial of the streaming service Disney+ in 2019, which requires trial users to arbitrate all disputes with the company. Company lawyers also claim that because Piccolo used the Walt Disney Parks’ website to buy Epcot Center tickets, Disney is shielded from a lawsuit from the estate of Piccolo’s deceased wife, Kanokporn Tangsuan, who died of a reaction to severe food allergies. Signing up for Disney+ should shield the company from court trials, Disney said. In a legal filing responding to Disney’s claims, Piccolo’s lawyer Brian Denney called Disney’s argument “preposterous” and said that the notion that signing up for a Disney+ free trial would bar a customer’s right to a jury trial “with any Disney affiliate or subsidiary, is so outrageously unreasonable and unfair as to shock the judicial conscience.” Walt Disney Parks and Resort is “explicitly seeking to bar its 150 million Disney+ subscribers from ever prosecuting a wrongful death case against it in front of a jury even if the case facts have nothing...

Future of Virtual Assistants: What to Expect
content: Virtual assistants (VAs) have become an integral part of both personal and professional lives, transforming the way we interact with technology and manage tasks. As we look to the future, the role of virtual assistants is set to expand even further, driven by advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning, and natural language processing. Here, this article explores the future of virtual assistants, highlighting key trends and predictions. Enhanced personalization stands out as one of the most transformative trends for virtual assistants. As AI and machine learning technologies advance, VAs are becoming increasingly adept at understanding and predicting user preferences with greater accuracy. This capability will allow virtual assistants to deliver more tailored recommendations, reminders, and assistance, creating a more intuitive user experience. Future virtual assistants will leverage sophisticated algorithms to learn from user behavior and preferences. For instance, a VA could suggest news articles, music, and movies based on previous interactions. They will also anticipate user needs, such as scheduling appointments or managing grocery orders, based on historical data. This level of personalization will make interactions with VAs more seamless and efficient, enhancing their value in daily life. The rapid expansion of the Internet of Things (IoT) is set to...

Alton park, golf course to reopen Friday, as investigation into mine collapse continues
creator: By Nassim Benchaabane St. Louis Post-Dispatch
content: ALTON — City leaders here said Wednesday that they will soon reopen a public park and golf course that closed two months ago when a mine collapsed and left a giant sinkhole in the ballfields. The city plans to fence off the sinkhole and one ballfield but reopen Gordon F. Moore Park at 7 a.m. Friday, said Mayor David Gions during a press conference. The neighboring Spencer T. Olin golf course will open Saturday. "The park has been deemed safe," Goins said. "We are going to play in our park before school starts, just to show our park is safe." The federal Mine Health and Safety Administration declined comment Wednesday but said the investigation into the mine collapse is ongoing. The agency reviewed reports from mining company New Frontier Materials, which drilled into rock ceiling below the park, and determined the area ceiling is sufficiently thick to be safe to reopen to the public, Goins said. But mining remains on hold while the investigation into the sinkhole continues. "While we're making progress, we're not not entirely out of the woods yet," Goins said. The news conference was meant to assure parkgoers in the city of 25,000 after a mine collapse June 26 closed Moore Park and the neighboring city-owned golf course, halting numerous summer sports and camps and raising concerns about the long-term safety of the park and course. New Frontier Materials, the company that...

‘I bang my head against the wall’: Jamie O’Hara stunned by Liverpool transfer rumour he is hearing
creator: Amir Mir
content: It has been more than a quiet summer transfer window for Liverpool so far. They are yet to sign a new player and Arne Slot begins the new Premier League campaign without being able to add any of his own players. Liverpool fans would probably tell you that a midfielder, preferably a number six, and some backline options are needed. Instead, the two main transfer talking points for the Reds have been midfielder Martin Zubimendi and goalkeeper, Giorgi Mamardashvili. Sources have told HITC that Liverpool are leading the race for Mamardashvili and he is closing in on a move to Anfield. But the biggest blow of them all has been Zubimendi turning down Liverpool when the team seriously needs a number six in the building. You have got to feel for Slot because he hasn’t exactly been welcomed with open arms here and he is finding out how tough it is to deal with the club’s recruitment team. Jamie O’Hara expressed how Liverpool are supposed to be a ‘top ten club’ in the world, yet they don’t sign the best players. The former midfielder added that he wants to ‘bang my head against the wall’ because Zubimendi isn’t the first player to turn them down, as he told talkSPORT (12/08/24 at 10:15 pm). Just go back to last summer when they wanted to sign Romeo Lavia and Moises Caicedo, yet they ended up at Chelsea. Martin Zubimendi turns down Liverpool “What about Liverpool,” asked O’Hara....

דיווח: כלי רכב בדרום לבנון הותקף על ידי כטב"ם של חיל האוויר
content: דיווח: כלי רכב בדרום לבנון הותקף על ידי כטב"ם של חיל האוויר גאי אלסטר עודכן לאחרונה: 14.8.2024 / 20:47 שתף ב וואצאפ שתף ב פייסבוק שתף ב טוויטר שתף ב אימאייל שתף ב general תיעוד תקיפות צה"ל דרום לבנון / דובר צה"ל כלי תקשורת בלבנון דיווחו הערב (רביעי) כי כלי רכב במרג'עיון שבדרום המדינה הותקף על ידי כטב"ם ישראלי. על פי הדיווחים בתקיפה נהרג לפחות אדם אחד ונפצעו נוספים. מוקדם יותר הערב צה"ל תקף משגר שכוון לשטח מדינת ישראל ומבנים צבאיים של חיזבאללה במרחבים רב א-תלתין ובליידא שבדרום לבנון. כמו כן, כוחות צה"ל תקפו מבנה צבאי של הארגון במרחב א-נקורה שבדרום לבנון. הבוקר הופעלו אזעקות במספר ישובים בגליל המערבי, בהם חניתה, יערה, אדמית ואילון. לא דווח על נפגעים או על נזק לרכוש. זירת הנפילה במרג'עיון, הערב / תיעוד ברשתות חברתיות לפי סעיף 27 א' לחוק זכויות יוצרים

title: שוברת את החומות: אפל פותחת את ה-NFC באייפון, ויש לזה משמעות ענקית
content: אפל הכריזה היום על שינוי מדיניות משמעותי שישפיע על הדרך בה מפתחים יכולים לנצל את יכולות ה-NFC וה-Secure Enclave במכשירי אייפון. החל מגרסת iOS 18.1 הקרובה, שתגיע באוקטובר, מפתחים יוכלו לקבל גישה לשבב ה-NFC ולאלמנט האבטחה SE דרך ממשק API חדש. עד כה, הגישה לשני הרכיבים הללו הייתה מוגבלת לאפל עצמה, ושימשה בעיקר עבור שירות התשלומים Apple Pay. ואם עדיין לא הבנתם - השינוי הזה צפוי לפתוח דלת למגוון רחב של יישומים חדשים במכשירי האייפון. מפתחים יוכלו ליצור פתרונות תשלום מתחרים ל-Apple Pay, כמו גם אפליקציות שמשתמשות ב-NFC לקריאה וכתיבה של תגים, למשל תעודות זהות, כרטיסי טיסה ועוד. המהלך של אפל מגיע על רקע לחץ גובר מצד הרגולטורים באירופה, שטוענים כי החברה מנצלת את שליטתה ב-NFC כדי לדחוק מתחרים בשוק התשלומים. פתיחת ה-NFC למפתחים עשויה להרגיע את החששות הללו, ולעודד תחרות וחדשנות בתחום. כדי להבטיח אבטחה ופרטיות ברמה הגבוהה ביותר, אפל דורשת ממפתחים המעוניינים להשתמש ב-API החדשים להגיש בקשה מיוחדת, לחתום על הסכם מסחרי ולשלם עמלות. תהליך זה מבטיח שרק מפתחים מורשים העומדים בדרישות רגולטוריות ותעשייתיות מחמירות ומחויבים לסטנדרטים הגבוהים של אפל בתחום האבטחה והפרטיות יוכלו לקבל גישה ליכולות החדשות. עם זאת, בשלב הראשון, ה-API החדש יהיה זמין למפתחים באוסטרליה, ברזיל, קנדה, יפן, ניו זילנד, בריטניה וארצות הברית, ובהמשך יורחב למדינות נוספות.

title: שר התרבות והספורט: "היכולת להביא עוד מדליות ב-2028 קיימת"
content: ברקע הצלחתה של המשלחת הישראלית למשחקים האולימפיים פריז 2024, שר התרבות והספורט מיקי זוהר שוחח הערב (רביעי) עם פאנל הספורט ב-103fm. "הישג פנומנלי, נבחרת ישראל עשתה דבר אדיר באולימפיאדה הזו - שבע מדליות, שיא של כל הזמנים. אפשר לזקוף את זה לרוח הישראלית, ראיתי בעיניים של הספורטאים והספורטאיות שהם באו כדי לנצח, הם רצו להביא שמחה ונחת לאזרחי ישראל בתקופה המורכבת שכולנו חווים". על תרומת משרד התרבות והספורט להישג אמר: "אנחנו השתדלנו לעזור בכל מה שיכולנו, הכפלנו את התקציב להכנות האולימפיות בשנת 2023, היה את המענקים המאוד גדולים לזוכים. כשאתה רואה את התוצאות אתה אומר שהדבר הנכון לעשות כרגע הוא להגדיל את ההשקעה באופן דרמטי להכנות האולימפיות. היכולת שלנו להביא עוד מדליות ב־2028 קיימת כי אנחנו באמת מתקדמים מאוד יפה. יש את מכון וינגייט, שהוא תחת משרד התרבות והספורט ואנחנו משקיעים בו עשרות מיליוני שקלים בשנה. אנחנו רוצים להקים וינגייט גם בדרום וגם בצפון". עוד הוסיף: "אנחנו רוצים לקדם את הספורט הישראלי, זו השאיפה. עם המדליות אנחנו רואים את השמחה והנחת שזה מביא לאזרחי ישראל, וזה שווה את ההשקעה. כדי להביא את המדליות האלה אתה צריך שהספורטאים שלך יבואו עם הציוד הכי טוב, ולכן אני בחרתי להכפיל את המימון כי אני האמנתי שזה יביא הישגים ואני נורא שמח לראות את ההישגים הללו. אני לא רצתי על המסלולים ולא קפצתי במזרן, אבל כמי שאמון על הספורט בישראל, את החלק שלי לפחות אני מרגיש שכן תרמתי". לסיום הצהיר השר זוהר: "כל יהודי שיודע להביא מדליה, שיעשה עלייה ארצה ואחר כך שיתחרה בשבילנו. אנחנו משלמים את המענקים בין...

title: זה קורה: אמבפה בהרכב ריאל מדריד בסופרקאפ נגד אטאלנטה
content: ריאל מדריד תהפוך לשיאנית הזכיות בסופרקאפ האירופי או שמא אטאלנטה תזכה בגביע בהופעה הראשונה שלה במעמד היוקרתי? בעוד זמן קצר ייפגשו זוכות ליגת האלופות והליגה האירופית באצטדיון בוורשה, פולין, למאבק על התואר הראשון של העונה בכדורגל האירופי. הבלאנקוס, שזכו בליגת האלופות בפעם ה-15 בהיסטוריה עם 0:2 על בורוסיה דורטמונד בתחילת יוני, יעשו היסטוריה אם יזכו גם בסופרקאפ בפעם השישית - כיום ריאל מדריד בשוויון עם מילאן וברצלונה, כל אחת עם חמש זכיות. אטאלנטה, שכאשר הביסה את באייר לברקוזן 0:3 חגגה תואר אירופי ראשון בתולדותיה, משתתפת כעת לראשונה במעמד הנכסף ותנסה להדהים את אלופת אירופה. כצפוי, ב-11 של קרלו אנצ'לוטי נכלל קיליאן אמבפה, המצטרף החדש מפריז סן ז'רמן שזו הופעת הבכורה שלו במדים הלבנים. הצרפתי משתף פעולה בשלישיית ההתקפה ביחד עם ויניסיוס ג'וניור ורודריגו, כשמאחוריהם ג'וד בלינגהאם. פרט לאמבפה, בכורה עשוי לערוך גם אנדריק שיושב על הספסל של אנצ'לוטי. בצד השני, הקבוצה של של ג'אן פיירו גאספריני הגיעה עם חלוץ הרכש מתאו רטגי מגנואה שממתין על הספסל, ובהתקפה שארל דה קטלארה שנרכש מילאן אחרי עונה מצוינת שלו כמושאל בקבוצה, פתח לצד אדמולה לוקמן שכיכב בגמר הליגה האירופית. לצער הקבוצה האיטלקית היא חסרה את טון קופמיינרס, הקשר ההולנדי שאמור לעבור ליובנטוס בימים הקרובים ולא נכלל בסגל וכן את ג'ורג'ו סקאלביני וג'אנלוקה סקמאקה הפצועים. אגב, הקבוצה של אנצ'לוטי לא הפסידה משחק רשמי מאז הסופר-קופה הספרדי נגד אתלטיקו מדריד ב-18 בינואר, משמע מעל חצי שנה ורצף של 26 משחקים - הארוך ביותר שלה מאז 40 המשחקים עם זידאן...

title: El caso del robot suicida surcoreano: ¿espejo de la sobrecarga laboral humana?
content: Un robot administrativo en Corea del Sur sorprendió al arrojarse por unas escaleras , un acto que fue interpretado como resultado del estrés laboral . Este incidente, aunque inusual, genera una reflexión sobre cómo la presión del trabajo puede afectar no solo a los seres humanos, sino también a las máquinas diseñadas para tareas repetitivas. Si un robot que fue programado para soportar jornadas extensas y tareas monótonas colapsa bajo presión, ¿qué podemos esperar del impacto en los trabajadores que enfrentan cargas laborales excesivas? Sobre todo en México, el país que tiene las jornadas de trabajo más largas del mundo, con un promedio de 52 horas semanales, según la Organización Internacional del Trabajo (OIT). El robot que colapsó fue fabricado por Bear Robotics y estaba asignado al ayuntamiento de Gumi, donde desempeñaba funciones administrativas que incluían la entrega de documentos y la asistencia en otras tareas rutinarias. Locales comentaron a la agencia AFP que el robot fue encontrado "inconsciente", tras caer desde una altura de dos metros, no sin antes colapsar en su lugar de trabajo, lo que para un humano sería tener burnout . Esperanza Martínez, especialista en higiene laboral, explica que el burnout lo padecen tanto hombres como mujeres, es reconocido como enfermedad del trabajo por la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS) y también se le...

title: Clínica dentária encerrada por "perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos utentes"
content: A Entidade Reguladora da Saúde (ERS) encerrou uma clínica dentária em Almada por "perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos utentes", tendo participados os factos ao Ministério Público e à Agência de Integração, Migrações e Asilo (AIMA). Em comunicado divulgado esta quarta-feira, a ERS refere que desencadeou ações de fiscalização em Almada, distrito de Setúbal, com o objetivo de "garantir o direito de acesso dos utentes à prestação de cuidados de saúde adequados, de qualidade e com segurança e verificar o cumprimento dos requisitos de funcionamento em vigor", tendo decretado, em consequência o encerramento de um estabelecimento de medicina dentária. No espaço encerrado, por "observação efetuada em diversos locais, bem como da prova recolhida", a ERS constatou que "não se encontrava assegurado o cumprimento dos requisitos aplicáveis ao reprocessamento de dispositivos médicos", ou seja, de esterilização dos instrumentos, que não estava garantida a gestão de resíduos hospitalares perigosos nem o "cumprimento das condições de higiene e controlo ambiental, assim como da segurança e proteção radiológica". O comunicado da ERS aponta ainda que "não se observava a compartimentação mínima exigível para um estabelecimento daquela tipologia de atividade". "Perante os factos apurados e o perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos...

title: Isidoro Sousa: "Sérgio Conceição era o treinador que eu iria buscar para o Benfica"
content: Coração portista, mas um profissional acima de tudo e um grande treinador para o Benfica. Isidoro Sousa, presidente que contratou Sérgio Conceição para o seu primeiro trabalho na I Liga, no Olhanense, aprova o treinador como sucessor de Roger Schmidt. Com uma entrada em falso no campeonato - e face aos rumores de um possível afastamento de Roger Schmidt - o emblema da Luz já veio esclarecer que não procura treinador . Em todo o caso, não é de excluir que Rui Costa seja forçado a uma decisão em sentido contrário. Depois de ter saído do FC Porto, Sérgio Conceição é um treinador livre e Isidoro Sousa imagina-o no Benfica, apesar do coração azul e branco. "O Sérgio é um portista, sem dúvida. Foi para lá miúdo e é óbvio que tem um coração portista, mas também Jorge Jesus era sportinguista e treinou o Benfica. Um profissional tem de pôr isso de lado. Se o Benfica pensar em rescindir com o atual treinador, se fosse presidente, era o Sérgio que ia buscar, porque o conheço bem", diz a Bola Branca o antigo dirigente do emblema algarvio. De acordo com a CMTV, Sérgio Conceição estaria disponível para ser o novo treinador das águias. Isidoro Sousa esteve muito recentemente com Rui Costa. O encontro aconteceu no Algarve, na derrota do Benfica com o Fulham, uma semana antes de os encarnados terem entrado a perder no campeonato. O ex-dirigente do...

title: Musk, Rowling e Trump insultaram-na, Khelif riposta na justiça
content: Elon Musk, J. K. Rowling e Donald J. Trump. Eis alguns dos nomes que constam da queixa de cyberbullying apresentada pela pugilista argelina Imane Khelif, avança a revista norte-americana “ Variety ”. Terminados o Jogos Olímpicos, onde foi acusada de ser um homem e vilipendiada, (e com uma medalha de outo na bagagem), Khelif já pisa outra arena: a justiça francesa. A pugilista avançou, esta semana, com uma queixa por "atos agravados de cyberbullying” contra os autores de publicações nas redes sociais que questionaram o seu género. A queixa, que será analisada pelo Centro Contra o Ódio Online da Procuradoria de Paris, foi interposta contra a rede social “X” (ex-Twitter). À “Variety”, Nabil Boudi, advogado de Khelif, disse J. K. Rowling e Elon Musk são identificados, a par de Donald Trump. "O que pedimos à Procuradoria é que investigue não só estas pessoas, mas quem achar necessário. Se o caso chegar a tribunal, irão enfrentar julgamento", disse. Termos e Condições Todos os comentários são mediados, pelo que a sua publicação pode demorar algum tempo. Os comentários enviados devem cumprir os critérios de publicação estabelecidos pela direcção de Informação da Renascença: não violar os princípios fundamentais dos Direitos do Homem; não ofender o bom nome de terceiros; não conter acusações sobre a vida privada de terceiros; não conter...

title: Capitania do Funchal emitiu avisos de mau tempo e vento forte para a Madeira
content: A capitania do Porto do Funchal emitiu esta quarta-feira um aviso de mau tempo e outro de vento forte para a orla marítima da Madeira, recomendando precauções em zonas junto ao mar e redobrada vigilância às embarcações no arquipélago . O aviso de mau tempo, divulgado com base nas previsões do Instituto Português do Mar e da Atmosfera (IPMA), está classificado pela autoridade marítima regional como sendo de "sinal seis", o que representa vento entre os 51 e os 62 quilómetros de qualquer direção. "Recomenda-se aos proprietários e armadores das embarcações que adotem as devidas precauções por forma a garantirem a segurança das mesmas", lê-se na informação. Quanto ao aviso de vento forte, está em vigor até as 18h00 de quinta-feira. Segundo a capitania, o vento vai soprar de norte/nordeste "fresco a muito fresco, por vezes forte a partir do meio da tarde" de hoje, sendo a visibilidade boa e as ondas na ordem dos dois metros nas partes sul e norte da ilha. A capitania aconselha cuidados a toda a comunidade marítima, nomeadamente o reforço da amarração das embarcações atracadas e fundeadas, que se evitem passeios junto ao mar e zonas expostas, além da prática de atividade de pesca lúdica. O IPMA também colocou as ilhas da Madeira e do Porto Santo sob aviso amarelo, o segundo numa escala de quatro, para a persistência de altas temperaturas a partir...

title: Suspeito de pornografia infantil detido em Mirandela
content: Um homem de 43 anos foi detido em flagrante delito, em Mirandela, no distrito de Bragança, por suspeitas da prática do crime de pornografia de menores, anunciou esta quarta-feira a Polícia Judiciária (PJ). "A investigação decorre da sinalização por entidades internacionais, relativas à posse e à partilha de conteúdos envolvendo pornografia de menores em plataformas de internet", explica esta força de investigação criminal, em comunicado. A PJ acrescenta que, no âmbito de uma busca domiciliária, "foi possível apreender, nos equipamentos informáticos utilizados pelo arguido, vários conteúdos digitais que integram o conceito de "pornografia de menores"". A investigação prossegue "através da realização de perícias complementares aos equipamentos apreendidos, visando determinar a verdadeira extensão e os detalhes da atividade criminosa atribuída ao arguido". O detido vai ser presente a um juiz de instrução criminal para primeiro interrogatório judicial e aplicação de medidas de coação. Termos e Condições Todos os comentários são mediados, pelo que a sua publicação pode demorar algum tempo. Os comentários enviados devem cumprir os critérios de publicação estabelecidos pela direcção de Informação da Renascença: não violar os princípios fundamentais dos Direitos do Homem; não ofender o bom nome de terceiros; não conter acusações...

title: Uçurum faciası: Eşi öldü, kızı yaralı!
content: Olay, Antalya'da meydana geldi. Antalya'nın Alanya ilçesinde safari turuna çıkmaya hazırlanan ailenin aracı arıza yapmıştı. Baba inip kontrol etmek istedi. Ama tam o sırada facia yaşandı. Freni boşalan araç yokuş aşağı savrulup uçurumdan yuvarlandı. Anne öldü, 1 yaşındaki bebeği ise ağır yaralandı. Şifre yenileme bağlantısını gönderebilmemiz için e-posta adresinize ihtiyacımız var. Şifreniz eposta@email.com adresine başarıyla gönderildi. title: Algarve. Temperatura da água do mar com valores elevados nos últimos dias
content: A temperatura da água do mar no Algarve atingiu nos últimos dias valores elevados, com Faro a alcançar um máximo de 25,1 graus, indicou esta quarta-feira a Marinha Portuguesa. A temperatura é medida através da rede de boias do sistema integrado de monitorização ambiental do Instituto Hidrográfico, que registou, nos últimos dias, um aumento "significativo da temperatura da superfície do mar" no Algarve, refere a Marinha em comunicado. Apesar de se tratar de uma temperatura situada acima da média nos últimos 10 anos, o máximo histórico da última década ainda não foi superado, acrescenta. Assim, mantém-se o recorde para a boia de Faro Costeira que em 28 de julho de 2016 atingiu 26,5 graus e para a boia de Faro Oceânica, que alcançou 26,3 graus em 6 de setembro de 2021. No entanto, a temperatura da água do mar no Algarve já registou uma descida. Hoje, de acordo com informação divulgada num "site" do Instituto Hidrográfico para consulta de dados, a temperatura da água em Faro ronda os 20 graus. Termos e Condições Todos os comentários são mediados, pelo que a sua publicação pode demorar algum tempo. Os comentários enviados devem cumprir os critérios de publicação estabelecidos pela direcção de Informação da Renascença: não violar os princípios fundamentais dos Direitos do Homem; não ofender o bom nome de terceiros; não conter acusações...

title: Olympics: Swimmers strong for Team USA
content: From University of Virginia sports information PARIS – Team USA topped the gold medal table in the swimming competition. The United States entered Sunday competition trailing Australia 7-6 in the gold medal tally, but a men’s win in the 1500 Free tied the two nations at seven, with the women’s 4×100 medley relay gold pushing the US ahead. The United States topped the total medal count with 28 to Australia’s 18. Virginia head coach Todd DeSorbo, a Salisbury High graduate and Salisbury-Rowan Sports Hall of Famer, was the head coach of the US Women’s Team, his first time serving in that capacity after being an assistant coach at Tokyo 2020. Anthony Nesty was the head coach of the men’s team. Three Virginia swimmers won gold medals in the 4×100 medley relay, the final event of the Paris 2024 Olympic swimming competition on Sunday at the Paris La Defense Arena. Senior Gretchen Walsh, junior Emma Weber and alumna Kate Douglass all collected gold medals as the United States’s 4×100 Medley Relay won the event in a world-record time of 3:49.63. Walsh swam the butterfly leg of the final, posting a 55.03, tying for the fastest 100 Fly split in history. Reagan Smith opened the relay by setting an Olympic record in the breaststroke, giving the US the early lead, which they continued to build on throughout the race. Lilly King and Torri Huske rounded out the foursome in the final. The mark...

title: Dominion Energy Secures 176,505-acre Lease Area from the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management For Potential Regulated Offshore Wind Development
creator: By Dominion Energy, Virginia Electric and Power Company, Bureau of Ocean Energy Management
content: RICHMOND, Va. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Virginia Electric and Power Company, a wholly owned subsidiary of Dominion Energy, Inc. (NYSE: D), today secured the rights for a 176,505-acre lease area off the coast of Virginia Beach , adjacent and to the East of where the company's 2.6-gigawatt Coastal Virginia Offshore Wind is currently under construction. Winning the lease provides Dominion Energy with the option to pursue additional offshore wind development in the mid-Atlantic. The Bureau of Ocean Energy Management indicates the lease area could support between 2.1 gigawatts and 4.0 gigawatts of offshore wind energy generation. The lease area is located approximately 35 nautical miles from the mouth of the Chesapeake Bay. In early July, the company announced the acquisition from Avangrid of the 40,000-acre Kitty Hawk Wind North offshore wind lease area, to be renamed CVOW South. If approved by regulators and constructed, CVOW South would have a capacity of 800 MW, enough capacity to serve 200,000 homes. At this time, the company does not have an estimated timeline or cost for development of either CVOW South or the new leasehold. "Offshore wind is critical to our all-of-the-above approach to meet the unprecedented growth of our customer electric demand over the next decade," said Robert M. Bakan Yaşar Güler'den Habertürk'e açıklamalar
content: Milli Savunma Bakanı Yaşar Güler'den, Ciner Medya Grubu Ankara Temsilcisi Fevzi Çakır'a açıklamalarda bulundu. Bakan Güler'in konuşmasından öne çıkan başlıklar: Gerçekten Milli Savunma Bakanlığı ve Türk Silahlı Kuvvetleri olarak şu anda en yoğun uğraştığımız faaliyet terörle mücadelemiz. Çünkü ülkemizi bu 40 yıllık bu beladan kurtarmak için milletimizi çok yoğun şekilde çalışıyoruz. yakın coğrafyamız olmak üzere pek çok bölgede ciddi hassas gelişmelerin yaşandığı dönemde artan risk, tehdit ve tehlikeler karşısında ülkemizin ve asil milletimizin güvenliğini sağlamak hak ve menfaatlerimizi korumak için Sayın Cumhurbaşkanımızın liderliğinde azim ve gayretle çalışmalarımızı devam ettiriyoruz. Böylesine hassas süreçte görev ve sorumlulukları artan Milli ve Savunma Bakanlığımız ve Türk Silahlı Kuvvetlerimiz istiklal harbimizden bu yana kadar en yoğun, en kapsamlı ve en etkili faliyetleri icraa ediyoruz. Tabi ki 40 yıldır yakın coğrafyamızda PKK terör örgütü ülkemizin başına bela edilmiş örgüttür. Dünyada çeşitli kaynaklar ülkeler tarafından besleniyor destekleniyor. Ve hala bu faaliyetleri devam ediyor. Ama biz inanıyoruz ki kim arkasında durursa dursun hepsiyle beraber bunları tarihi sayfalara gömeceğiz. Terörle mücadelemiz uzun bir süreçten geliyor. Çok yoğun bir faaliyetle 1 yıl içerisinde tane komando...

title: Na ostrvu ubijeno osmoro ljudi; Proglašeno vanredno stanje
content: ''Ovo je prilika za vladu da se u potpunosti mobiliše kako bi se ozbiljno fokusirala na bande. Ne možemo dozvoliti da se ubistva normalizuju u našoj zemlji'', rekao je Holns na konferenciji za novinare. On nije izneo detalje o novim propisima, ali bi mogli da uključuju noćni policijski čas, duže periode pritvora bez formalnih optužbi i mogućnost policije da pretresa imovinu bez naloga, navodi Rojters. Holns je napomenuo da se nada da će ta mera sprečiti ubistva iz odmazde, rekavši da su obaveštajci upozorili da postoji "veoma velika verovatnoća" da se takvi zločini dogode. Do sada je uhapšeno pet osoba u vezi sa pucnjavom u nedelju, rekao je premijer. Procenjuje se da se broj aktivnih bandi u toj karipskoj zemlji smanjio sa 400 na 185 za pet godina, ali Holns ocenjuje da je taj broj i dalje ''veoma visok''. Jamajka je prošle godine bila druga zemlja regionu Latinske Amerike i Kariba po broju ubistava, iza Sent Kits i Nevisa. Studija medijske organizacije Insajt krajm pokazala je da se prošle godine na Jamajci dogodilo 60,9 ubistava na 100.000 ljudi. Karipska zajednica (CARICOM) pokušava da spreči porast nasilja vatrenim oružjem kroz snažnije sprovođenje zakona i zaustavljanje uvoza ilegalnog vatrenog oružja, a prema podacima američke vlade, oko 87 odsto oružja pronađenog na Karibima dolazi iz SAD. بازدید استاندار مازندران از پروژه‌های عمرانی و گردشگری سوادکوه شمالی
content: یوسف نوری امروز در سفر به شهرستان سوادکوه در خصوص زیرگذر برنجستانک سوادکوه شمالی گفت: با سازمان برنامه و بودجه تماس‌های لازم برقرار شد تا اعتبار کافی برای اتمام پروژه تخصیص یابد. استاندار مازندران افزود: با توجه به حساسیت این پروژه و استفاده کارخانجات شهرک صنعتی بشل از این زیرگذر سعی می‌کنیم تا دهه فجر این طرح عمرانی به بهره برداری برسد. وی یادآور شد: تفاهم نامه‌های بین دستگاه‌هایی مانند راه آهن، شرکت گاز، راهداری و غیره از مهمترین عوامل در بهره‌برداری سریعتر این پروژه خواهد بود. مجموعه گردشگری «اندارگلی» سوادکوه شمالی مقصد بعدی استاندار مازندران بود. یوسف نوری در خصوص گردشگری استان مازندران گفت: فضا و ظرفیت کافی برای طرح ‌ای گردشگری وجود دارد که باید از آن استفاده کرد. نوری از مدیر مجموعه گردشگری اندارگلی خواست تا گردشگری آموزشی و استفاده دانش آموزان و دانشجویان را گسترش دهد. افتتاح غرفه‌های صنایع و گردشگری روستای «شارقلت» لفور پایان سفر یک روزه استاندار به سوادکوه شمالی بود. در این مجموعه ۱۳ غرفه با همکاری دهیاری روستاهای «شارقلت»، «ده کلان»، «لودشت»، «عالم کلا»، «افراسی»، «کالیکلا» و«آغوزبن» با همکاری منابع طبیعی و راهداری سوادکوه شمالی ایجاد شد که محصولات صنایع دستی و غذای بومی منطقه را به گردشگران ارائه می‌کند. انتهای پیام

۳ شهید و پنج زخمی در حمله رژیم صهیونیستی به جنوب لبنان
content: به گزارش روز چهارشنبه به نقل از شبکه المنار، وزارت بهداشت لبنان عصر امروز اعلام کرد که در حمله هوایی رژیم صهیونیستی به شهرک «بلیدا» در جنوب لبنان، یک نفر شهید و یک نفر دیگر زخمی شدند. بر اساس گزارش المنار، یک پهپاد رژیم صهیونیستی نیز یک خودرو را در میدان شهر «مرجعیون» در جنوب لبنان هدف قرار داد. وزارت بهداشت لبنان نیز اعلام کرد که در حمله به مرجعیون ۲ نفر شهید و چهار نفر دیگر زخمی شدند که حال آن‌ها وخیم گزارش شده است. همچنین پهپادهای رژیم صهیونیستی شهرک «عیتا الشعب» را هدف حمله موشکی قرار دادند. از سوی دیگر حزب الله امروز با انتشار بیانیه‌ای تاکید کرد رزمندگان آن در پاسخ به تجاوز رژیم صهیونیستی به روستاهای جنوب لبنان به ویژه روستای العباسیه و هدف قرار گرفتن غیر نظامیان، شهرک صهیونیست نشین کریات شمونه را با راکت های کاتیوشا هدف قرار دادند. ، با آغاز عملیات «طوفان الاقصی» توسط گروه‌های مقاومت فلسطین، حزب‌الله لبنان در راستای درگیر کردن بخش عمده‌ای از نظامیان صهیونیست در شمال فلسطین اشغالی و کاهش فشار بر مقاومت در غزه، اقدام به انجام عملیات‌های روزانه و سنگین علیه اهداف رژیم صهیونیستی در داخل خاک فلسطین کرده است. از ابتدای عملیات حزب‌الله در شمال فلسطین اشغالی، شمار زیادی از شهرک‌نشینان صهیونیست در این منطقه ناگزیر به ترک خانه‌های خود شده‌اند. از سوی دیگر، حملات مداوم حزب الله لبنان به شمال فلسطین اشغالی در دفاع از مقاومت غزه، باعث تحمیل هزینه‌های سنگینی بر این رژیم در همه زمینه‌ها از جمله اقتصادی و صنعتی شده است و اکثر شهرک‎ها و کارخانه‌های رژیم صهیونیستی در شهرک‌های شمال...

title: Британский стартап привлек миллионы долларов на совершенствование батарей для электрокаров
creator: Мария Черкасова
content: Британский стартап Gaussion привлек 12 миллионов долларов для проекта по усовершенствованию аккумуляторов для электрокаров. Об этом сообщает ESGtoday. Полученные средства будут направлены на развитие технологии, позволяющей значительно повысить производительность батарей и обеспечить более быструю зарядку электро- и гибридных автомобилей. По словам представителей компании, ее технология, использующая магнитный усилитель, позволит ускорить зарядку аккумулятора на 67 процентов. В компании также уверены, что решение можно применять в электрификации транспорта, строительной технике, горнодобывающей промышленности, систем накопления энергии для жилых домов и коммунального хозяйства. Ранее российская компания Sitronics Electro создала первый образец зарядной станции для электрокаров. Новые станции получили название eStation Super. Мощность станции составляет до 262 киловатт-час, она позволяет одновременно заряжать до четырех электромобилей. Клиенты смогут приобрести устройство в начале 2025 года.

As God did in Osun, PDP’ll win Ondo poll -Adeleke
creator: Peter Dada
content: The Peoples Democratic Party in Ondo State on Thursday, inaugurated a 500-member campaign council for the November 16 governorship election. A National Vice Chairman of the party (South West ) Dr Eddy Olafeso and a former state chairman of the party, Mr Clement Faboyede were appointed as Chairman and Director-General of the council respectively. The Osun state governor, Ademola Adeleke, who inaugurated the state council at the party secretariat, Akure the state capital, declared that the PDP would win the forthcoming governorship election, coming up on November 16. According to him, the people had seen and felt the poor performance of the government of the All Progressives Congress in the state and the country at large, and had decided to vote for the PDP. Adeleke, who recalled that he fought many battles before he became the governorship candidate of the party before the governorship election in 2022 and he won all the battles, charged the members of the party to support the campaign council and work for the success of the party in the forthcoming governorship poll. He said, “I had about 25 cases, they tried to frustrate me but I won all. We are going to win the election in Ondo by the special grace of God. We must keep talking about it. Don’t have any doubts, it is always difficult to win an incumbent but it is possible. Related News Again, gunmen kill farmer in Ondo, police...

title: Anambra arrests 16 child beggars in night raid
creator: Ikenna Obianeri
content: The Anambra State Government, through the state Ministry of Women Affairs and Social Welfare, has begun cracking down on syndicates using children to beg for alms in Awka, the state capital and environs. During a Tuesday night raid carried out by operatives of Awka Capital Development Authority, at the Aroma Junction in Awka and environs, no fewer than 16 child beggars and adults were arrested. The Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, ACTDA, Ossy Onuko, said the operation was planned in collaboration with the Ministry of Women Affairs as a way to take children off the streets. The operation caused panic in the area as some of the street kids fled on sighting the enforcement team while some resisted arrest but they were, however, overpowered and bundled into waiting vehicles and taken away. Addressing journalists on Wednesday, the Commissioner for Women Affairs and Social Welfare, Ify Obinabo, said the operation will continue in all parts of Awka, to ensure that the town was rid of children being used by syndicates to beg for alms. Obinabo expressed concern that school-age children are being denied their right to education and instead exploited as beggars and petty thieves by unscrupulous individuals. She said the 16 kids picked up during the raid have been handed over to the State’s Operation Clean and Healthy Anambra Brigade for onward tracing of their parents and...

title: కిలాడీలకే కిలాడీలు, భార్యకు పెళ్లి పెద్ద మొగుడే, ఏం స్కెచ్ రా దేవుడా
content: రియల్మ్యారేజ్డ్రామాతోపాటుడబ్బుదోచుకుంటున్ననలుగురువ్యక్తులముఠానుకర్ణాటకలోనితుమకూరుజిల్లాగుబ్బిపోలీసులుఅరెస్టుచేశారు.పెళ్లిపేరుతోదళారులబృందంపెళ్లికానియువకులనులక్ష్యంగాచేసుకునిగ్రామీణప్రాంతాల్లోపెళ్లిళ్లుచేయాలనుకున్నకుటుంబాలనునమ్మించిడబ్బు,బంగారంతోపక్కాప్లాన్తోపారిపోతున్నారు. ఎట్టకేలకుఉత్తరకర్ణాటక,మహారాష్ట్రలోఈచీటింగ్బృందాన్నిఅరెస్టుచేసినగుబ్బీపోలీసులునిందితులనుజైలుకుపంపించారు. లక్ష్మిబాలసాబ్జానకర్అలియాస్@కోమల,సిద్దప్ప,లక్ష్మీబాయి,లక్ష్మీబాలాసాబ్జానకర్పోలీసులకుపట్టుబడ్డారు.మామక్యారెక్టర్సిద్దప్ప,అత్తక్యారెక్టర్లక్ష్మీబాయి,బ్రోకర్లక్ష్మినిఅరెస్ట్చేశారు.ఆశ్చర్యకరంగాఈనకిలీవధువుకుఇద్దరుఎదిగినపిల్లలుఉన్నారనిపోలీసులుఅన్నారు. కర్ణాటకలోనితుమకూరుకుచెందినగుబ్బితోపాటుకర్ణాటకరాష్ట్రంలోనిపలుప్రాంతాల్లోఅమాయకకుటుంబాలనుమోసంచేసినఈముఠామూడేళ్లలోనాలుగునకిలీపెళ్లిళ్లుచేసిడబ్బు,బంగారుఆభరణాలుదోచుకునిఅదృశ్యమైనఘటనచోటుచేసుకుంది. వీరిలోగుబ్బితాలూకాఅత్తిగట్టేగ్రామంలోపాలాక్షకుమారుడికినకిలీవధువునుసృష్టించిసకలసంప్రదాయాలప్రకారంపెళ్లిచేశారు.దయానందమూర్తితనఅసలుభార్యకోసంవెతకడానికిప్రయత్నిస్తుండగాపాలక్షకుటుంబంఈమోసపూరితనెట్‌వర్క్‌లోపడింది. కుష్టగికిచెందినబసవరాజుద్వారాలక్ష్మిఅనేబ్రోకర్‌తోపరిచయమైనపాలక్షఅతనిపెళ్లికలలనువీక్పాయింట్చేసుకున్నాడు.హుబ్బళిలోమంచిఅమ్మాయిఉందనిమాయమాటలుచెప్పారు,కోమలఅనేయువతిఫొటోనుఅతనికిచూపించారు. భర్తఇంటినిచూసేందుకుతాలూకాలోనిఅత్తికటేగ్రామానికివచ్చిననకిలీవధువునకిలీఅత్త,మామలతోకలిసిగతేడాదినవంబర్నెలలోభర్తఇంటికివచ్చిఅదేరోజుపెళ్లిచర్చలుజరిపారు....

title: मशाल यात्रा निकालकर मनाया अखंड भारत संकल्प दिवस:पूर्व सैनिकों को किया सम्मानित
content: शाजापुर में हिन्दू जागरण मंच द्वारा अखंड भारत संकल्प दिवस मनाया गया। इस अवसर पर मशाल यात्रा निकाली गई। इस मशाल यात्रा में बड़ी संख्या में नगरवासियों ने शामिल होकर अखंड भारत दिवस को विभीषिका दिवस मनाया। हिन्दू जागरण मंच के अनूप किरकिरे ने बताया कि हिंदू जागरण मंच द्वारा अखंड भारत स्मृति दिवस के उपलक्ष्य में प्रतिवर्ष वाहन यात्रा, मशाल यात्रा विगत कई वर्षों से निकाली जाती है। इस वर्ष भी हिंदू जागरण मंच की प्रांत योजना के अनुसार शाजापुर नगर एवं जिले में मशाल यात्राएं निकाली गई। नगर में किलारोड से यात्रा की शुरूआत की गई जो श्री राम चौक, आजाद चौक, नई सड़क, फव्वारा चौक, बस स्टैंड होती हुई मां राजाराजेश्वरी मंदिर पहुंची। जहां पूर्व सैनिकों को सम्मानित भी किया गया। किरकिरे ने बताया कि 1947 के पूर्व भूटान, नेपाल जैसे राष्ट्र भारत की सीमाओं में थे, लेकिन इसके बाद सीमा घटती गई। 15 अगस्त 1947 जिस दिन हम स्वतंत्रता दिवस मनाते हैं। उसके एक दिन पहले यह विभीषिका थी जिसने हमारे देश को बांट दिया। इसी कड़ी में हिन्दू जागरण मंच द्वारा अखंड भारत दिवस के रूप में मनाया गया। जिसमें बड़ी संख्या में शहरवासी शामिल हुए।

title: 議員烏龍爆料 踐踏老師 我們要拿什麼教育孩子?
content: 曾經, 幼兒園 是孩子離開家庭進入社會的第一個場域, 幼教 老師則是引導生活學習的第一人,這時候的孩子,大約三、四歲。現在,離家提前到孩子滿二個月,場域則變成托嬰中心。但是,陪伴、啟動孩子今生學習的第一人,成為第一個無法信任的「外人」。 孩子小,缺乏自理與自保能力,沒有任何人比托育教保老師更親近、更能幫助孩子。生命之初的無慮,應是孩子最懷念的時光。能與父母共同滋養孩子,即便身為外人的「老師」,只要不必無端被疑不當對待,疲累忙碌的幼教生涯,還是滿心的幸福與成就。 自從爆料成為揭弊手段,揭弊成為民意代表累積個人聲量的方式,托嬰中心及幼兒園師生互動「啟人疑竇」的影像,就成為民意代表護童正義記者會的嫌疑劇碼。一一二年十月廿日,台北市某 議員 舉行「幼兒園虐童」記者會,公布足以識別資訊的幼童畫面,指控某非營利幼兒園老師有不當對待行為。她提及一名幼童於跑道上跑步,體力透支、多次摔倒,老師卻拖著他跑;另一名幼童則被老師於跑道以「小牛推車」方式訓練體能。 事實上,這是幼兒園老師根據幼童的醫療評估報告,並與特教輔導老師及幼童家長討論後,設計適合早療及特殊需求幼童的個別化肌肉訓練課程。民代未善盡查證責任,逕自揭露涉及兒少影片,幼兒園被眾媒體包圍門口,讓幼兒擔心受怕,讓老師無法正常教學。揭露特殊需求幼兒畫面亦損害孩子權益,無端捲入風波的數名老師被去脈絡化且受未經查證的監視影像影響,長時間陷入輿情及網路酸言霸凌。即便孩子還要老師陪著玩「小牛推車」,但煎熬委屈的老師早已無力可推車,群體萌生離職念頭。 幼兒園認為議員未善盡查證且嚴重損害名譽,提告求償五十萬元。一一三年四月進行第二次調解,議員不願親自面對,僅委由辦公室主任出席,聲稱付不出五十萬元。事實上,幼兒園要的是「道歉及善意」,對於盡心敬業老師,想要回曾經擁有的「成就與尊嚴」。台灣是法治國家,不好、不適的老師有法可裁、可罰;但優質認真的老師,不應被企圖彰顯個人光彩搶曝光率的民代,反覆踐踏而身心俱傷。 口口聲聲喊「兒權」的民意代表,諸多行為卻大相逕庭。事件發生已近周年,至今連句道歉都沒有。議員若要求證任何教育相關事證,有各種據實直接的方式,但以記者會高舉「兒權」牌匾,卻隨手攻擊照顧、教育孩子的老師,這既非兒權正義,更非法理秩序。社會充斥民意代表的權力自由,打錯連道歉都不必,老師只能自撫傷口承受冤屈的無奈,讓托育幼教專業領域的人力出走更快、缺口更大,嚴峻程度更難彌補。 連打幼兒園月餘,議員竟回應:現在的虐童案件這麼多,民眾有疑慮,難道不應釐清?不明白,議員釐清真相的管道是哪裡阻塞不通?不明白,議員不求證而讓社會公審幼兒園的用意?更不明白,議員竟回應「訴訟是人民的權利,表示尊重」的心態。身為老師,我們相信人是有學習能力的,亦希望議員能有道歉悔改的行動。若再次出庭後仍不道歉不賠償,幼兒園也的確沒辦法,只能悲情地持續隱忍。 政治常常扮演正義的戲劇,但戲碼卻暗藏太多杜撰和想像,最終卻是撕裂及矇騙社會,彰顯有權力就可以不必講道理。為孩子,理應重建理性而溫暖的社會,我們必須再現事實及是非,降低權力的驕傲與妄為,共構社會秩序,調整和諧關係。否則,我們要拿什麼教育孩子?
