content: CAS dismisses Vinesh Phogat's appeal for silver medal: వినేశ్‌ ఫోగట్‌(Vinesh Phogat)కు భారీ షాక్‌ తగిలింది. పారిస్‌ ఒలింపిక్స్‌లో కనీసం తనకు రజత పతకం అన్న ఇవ్వాలిన్న వినేశ్‌ ఫోగట్‌ అప్పీల్‌ను కాస్‌ తిరస్కరించింది. సిల్వర్‌ ఇవ్వాలన్న వినేశ్‌ అభ్యర్థనను కాస్‌ తోసిపుచ్చింది. వంద గ్రాముల అధిక బరువు ఉందంటూ ఒలింపిక్స్‌ నిర్వహక కమిటీ వినేశ్‌ ఫొగాట్‌పై నిషేధం విధించింది. దీనిని వినేశ్‌ కాస్‌లో సవాల్‌ చేయగా అక్కడ వ్యతిరేకంగా తీర్పు వచ్చింది. VINESH PHOGAT's PETITION HAS BEEN DISMISSED...!!! [RevSportz] - A heartbreaking news for Indian sports fans. 💔 pic.twitter.com/MuNYNqUDKt — Johns. (@CricCrazyJohns) August 14, 2024 భారత అభిమానుల హృదయం ముక్కలైంది. భారత స్టార్ రెజ్లర్‌ వినేశ్‌ ఫోగాట్‌ ఏదో ఒక పతకంతో భారత్‌లో అడుగు పెడుతుందన్న ఆశలు.. నిర్వీర్యమైపోయాయి. ఒలింపిక్ అనర్హతపై వినేష్ ఫోగట్ చేసిన అప్పీల్‌ను కాస్‌ తిరస్కరించింది. విశ్వ క్రీడల్లో పైనల్‌కు చేరిన తర్వాత తనపై అనర్హత వేటు వేయడంపై భారత స్టార్‌ రెజ్లర్ వినేష్ ఫోగట్... కోర్ట్ ఆఫ్ ఆర్బిట్రేషన్ ఫర్ స్పోర్ట్‌ను ఆశ్రయించింది. అయితే వినేశ్‌ ఫొగాట్‌ అప్పీల్‌ను కాస్‌ తిరస్కరించిందని భారత ఒలింపిక్ సంఘం తెలిపింది. గత వారం మహిళల 50 కేజీల ఫ్రీస్టైల్ ఫైనల్‌లో వినేష్ ఫొగాట్‌పై 100 గ్రాముల అధిక బరువుతో అనర్హత వేటు పడింది. ఇంటర్నేషనల్ ఒలింపిక్ కమిటీ నిర్ణయానికి వ్యతిరేకంగా రెజ్లర్ వినేష్ ఫోగాట్ చేసిన దరఖాస్తును కాస్‌ తిరస్కరించిందని ఇండియన్‌ ఒలింపిక్‌ అసోసియేషన్‌ ప్రెసిడెంట్ PT ఉష(PT Usha) ఒక ప్రకటనలో తెలిపారు. కాస్‌ తీర్పుపై ఉష...

title: 'ಇಲ್ಲಿ ಬರ್ತ್‌ಡೇ ಪಾರ್ಟಿ ಮಾಡ್ತೀರಿ, ದೇವರ ಪೂಜೆ ಯಾಕಿಲ್ಲ..' ನಾಗಪಾತ್ರಿ ಪ್ರಶ್ನೆಗೆ ತಬ್ಬಿಬ್ಬಾದ ಕಲಾವಿದರು!
content: ಬೆಂಗಳೂರು (ಆ.14): ಕಲಾವಿದರ ಸಂಘದಲ್ಲಿ ಕನ್ನಡ ಚಿತ್ರರಂಗದ ಒಳಿತಿಗಾಗಿ ಹೋಮ-ಹವನ ಮಾಡಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಸ್ಯಾಂಡಲ್‌ವುಡ್‌ನ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿ, ಶಾಂತಿ, ನೆಮ್ಮದಿಗಾಗಿ ಗಣ ಹೋಮ, ಆಶ್ಲೇಷಾ ಬಲಿ, ಮೃತ್ಯುಂಜಯ ಹೋಮ, ಸರ್ಪಶಾಂತಿ, ನಾಗದೇವರ ವಿಶೇಷ ಪೂಜೆಯನ್ನು ನೆರವೇರಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ನಾಗಾರಾಧನೆ ಪೂಜೆ ನೇರವೇರಿಸಿ ಮಾತನಾಡಿದ ವಾಸುದೇವ್ ಭಟ್, ಪ್ರಸ್ತುತ ವಿದ್ಯಮಾನದಲ್ಲಿ ಯಾವುದೇ ತೊಂದರೆ ಇಲ್ಲ. ಮನುಷ್ಯ ಅನ್ನೋದು ಜ್ಞಾನ, ವಿದ್ಯೆ, ಬುದ್ದಿ,ಕಾಮ- ಕ್ರೋಧ, ಮಧ- ಮತ್ಸರ ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯ. ಒಬ್ಬರದ್ದು ಮನಸ್ಸು ಒಂದೊಂದು ರೀತಿ ಇರಬಹುದು. ಹಾಗಾಗೀ ದೇವರು ಎಲ್ಲರನ್ನು ಒಗ್ಗೂಡಿಸುವ ವಿಚಾರವಾಗಿ ಆಶೀರ್ವಚನ್ನ ನೀಡಬಹುದು. ಅದನ್ನು ಹೊರತುಪಡಿಸಿ ಬೇರೆ ಯಾವ ಸೂಚನೆಯನ್ನು ಕೊಟ್ಟಿರಲಿಕ್ಕಿಲ್ಲ. ಇವತ್ತು ಮಾಡಿರುವ ಪ್ರಾಯಶ್ಚಿತ್ತ ದಿಂದ ಕನ್ನಡ ಚಿತ್ರೋದ್ಯಮ ಲೋಕದಲ್ಲಿ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯ ಸೂಚನೆ. ಬರುವ ದಿನಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಒಳ್ಳೆ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯ ಧರ್ಮಕಾರ್ಯಗಳು ನಡೆಯಬೇಕು. ಚಿತ್ರೋದ್ಯಮ ಅಂದ್ರೆ ಮಹಾಕಾಳಿ, ಮಹಾ ಸರಸ್ವತಿ ಅಂತಹ ತ್ರಿಪುರ ಸುಂದರಿ ರಾಜರಾಜೇಶ್ವರಿ ಇರುವ ಸ್ಥಳ. ಈ ಸ್ಥಳ ದೇವಾಲಯ ಎಷ್ಟು ಪಾವಿತ್ರತೆಯೋ, ಅಷ್ಟು ಪಾವಿತ್ರತೆ ಈ ಜಾಗಕ್ಕೆ ಇರುತ್ತೆ. ಹಾಗಾಗೀ ಈ ರೀತಿಯ ಧರ್ಮ ಕಾರ್ಯಗಳು ನಡೆಯುತ್ತಿರಬೇಕು ಅಂತ ದೇವರು ಸೂಚನೆ ಕೊಟ್ಟಿರಬಹುದು. ಬಹುಶಃ ಕನ್ನಡ ಚಿತ್ರರಂಗಕ್ಕೆ ಉತ್ತಮ ಯೋಗ, ಉತ್ತಮ ಅನುಗ್ರಹ ಬಂದಿದೆ ಅಂತ ಅನಿಸುತ್ತಿದೆ. ನಾಗರಾಧನೆ ಯಾಕೆ ಮಾಡಿಸಲಾಗುತ್ತೆ ಆರೋಗ್ಯ, ಮಾನಸಿಕ ನೆಮ್ಮದಿ,ದಾಂಪತ್ಯ ಜೀವನ, ಸಂತತಿ, ಸಂಪತ್ತು ನಾವು ಮಾಡುವ ವೃತ್ತಿ, ಚಿತ್ರೋದ್ಯಮಕ್ಕೆ ನಾಗದೇವರ ಪೂರ್ಣ ಅನುಗ್ರಹ ಬೇಕು. ಒಂದು ಚಲನಚಿತ್ರ ಪ್ರಾರಂಭ ಆಗಬೇಕು ಅಂದ್ರೆ ಅನೇಕ ರೀತಿ ಟೆಕ್ನಿಷನ್ ಬರ್ತಾರೆ. ಅವರೆಲ್ಲರನ್ನೂ ಸರಿದೂಗಿಸಿಕೊಂಡು ಒಂದು ಚಲನಚಿತ್ರ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯ ರೀತಿ ಯಶಸ್ಸು ಸಾಧಿಸಲು ಎಲ್ಲರಿಗೂ ಸದ್ಬುದ್ದಿ ಕೊಡಬೇಕು. ನಾಗಾರಾಧನೆಯನ್ನ ಸಾವಿರಾರು ರೀತಿಯ ಅನುಗ್ರಹದ ಫಲವನ್ನು ಹಿರಿಯರು ತೋರಿಸಿಕೊಟ್ಟಿದ್ದಾರೆ....

title: స్థానిక పోరుకు సన్నద్ధం!
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: పంచాయతీ, ప్రాదేశిక ఎన్నికలకు కసరత్తు షురూ మేడ్చల్‌ ఆగస్టు 14(ఆంధ్రజ్యోతి): స్థానిక సంస్థల ఎన్నికలకు ప్రభుత్వం సంకేతాలు ఇవ్వడంతో పంచాయతీతో పాటు ప్రాదేశిక ఎన్నికల ఏర్పాట్లలో అధికారులు నిమగ్నమయ్యారు. ఇందులో భాగంగా ఇప్పటికే పంచాయతీ ఎన్నికల నిర్వహణకు సంబంధించి కొంత మంది సిబ్బంది శిక్షణకు వెళ్లి వచ్చారు. మరోవైపు ప్రాదేశిక ఎన్నికలకు సంబంధించిన శిక్షణ కరపత్రాలు జిల్లా పరిషత్‌ కార్యాలయానికి చేరాయి. అసెంబ్లీ, పార్లమెంటు ఎన్నికలు ఇటీవల జరుగడంతో ఓటర్ల జాబితాలతో పాటు పోలింగ్‌ కేంద్రాల్లో పెద్దగా మార్పులు ఉండకపోవచ్చనే అభిప్రాయాన్ని అధికారులు వ్యక్తం చేస్తున్నారు. జిల్లాలో 61 గ్రామ పంచాయతీలుండగా వీటి పదవీకాలం ఫిబ్రవరి ఒకటితో ముగియగా రెండో తేదీ నుంచి ప్రత్యేకాధికారుల పాలన అమల్లోకి వచ్చింది. జూలై నాలుగో తేదీ నుంచి జిల్లాపరిషత్తు, మండల పరిషత్తు పాలకవర్గం పదవీకాలం ముగిసింది. ఎన్నికల నిర్వహణకు అవసరమైన పోలింగ్‌ సిబ్బంది, కేంద్రాలు, ఓటర్ల జాబితా, బ్యాలెట్‌ బాక్సులు, ఇప్పటి వరకు అమలు చేసిన రిజర్వేషన్ల వివరాలు తదితర వాటి సేకరణలో అధికారులు నిమగ్నమయ్యారు. ఇప్పటి వరకు వచ్చిన ఆదేశాల మేరకు పోలింగ్‌ కేంద్రంలో ఎంత మంది ఓటర్లు ఉండాలి, సిబ్బంది ఎందరుండాలి, నామినేషన్ల స్వీకరణకు చెల్లించాల్సిన రుసుం, తదితర వాటిని ఖరారు చేస్తూ ఉత్తర్వులు జారీ అయ్యాయి. ప్రాదేశిక ఎన్నికలకు సంబంధించిన మార్గదర్శకాలతో రూపొందించిన కరపత్రాలను ప్రభుత్వం జిల్లా పరిషత్తుకు పంపించింది. పంచాయతీ కార్యదర్శులు, ఎండీఓలకు శిక్షణ.. గ్రామపంచాయతీ ఓటర్ల జాబితా తయారీకిగాను జిల్లా పంచాయతీ శాఖ ఆధ్వర్యంలో కలెక్టరేట్‌లో శిక్షణ కార్యక్రమాన్ని...

title: Nearly 200,000 Russians being evacuated after massive Ukrainian attack
creator: ABC News
content: Nearly 200,000 people are being evacuated following on Russian territory, Russian officials said Wednesday. The overnight strikes marked the biggest combined attack on Russia's air force infrastructure since the start of the full-scale war, with three Russian military airfields targeted, sources in the Security Service of Ukraine told ABC News. Russian air defense forces destroyed 117 Ukrainian drones and four Tochka-U missiles over eight regions of Russia overnight, including in Kursk, Voronezh, Belgorod and Nizhny Novgorod, the Russian Ministry of Defense said in a statement. Local authorities did not confirm the airfields were attacked. A state of emergency has been declared in the Belgorod region due to "daily Ukrainian attacks," Belgorod Gov. Vyacheslav Gladkov said Wednesday morning. Nearly 194,000 people are going to be evacuated from the Kursk and Belgorod regions due to the Ukrainian military offensive, according to Russian outlets. The last time Russians fled en masse from fighting inside the country was during the decadelong Second Chechen War, which started in 1999, according to the independent Russian outlet Agentstvo. The overnight assault comes more than a week into Ukraine's into Russia. Ukraine's top commander said Wednesday that Ukraine has advanced again inside Russia's Kursk region as it continues to try to expand its unprecedented incursion there....

Savers squeezed by interest rate cuts as providers slash deals
creator: Callum-mason
content: Savers are being squeezed by interest rate cuts as lenders slash their best deals, with just a handful now offering above 5 per cent. Prior to the Bank of England lowering the base rate to 5 per cent on 1 August, there were more than 20 providers offering more than 5 per cent interest on a one-year fixed savings deal – but now there are just three, i analysis shows. Interest on savings tends to fall whenever the base rate does, meaning that while a drop in the base rate is good for homeowners, it isn’t as good news for savers. This will increase pressure on Chancellor Rachel Reeves to offer support for savers in the Budget, especially as she prepares to increase taxes. Experts are warning that those who have not yet locked their money away in a fixed-rate account are likely to miss out on hundreds of pounds of interest each year if they do not secure a deal soon, as more banks will start to pull their best offers in the coming days and weeks. For example, there were eight five-year fixed accounts offering above 4.3 per cent prior to the base rate cut, but now there is just one. Meanwhile, the final two-year fixed savings deals paying 5 per cent have all been removed from the market. VíasChile destaca su oferta sobre la de Sacyr para la nueva concesión de la Ruta 5 Santiago - Los Vilos
content: VíasChile destacó su oferta en el marco de que el el Ministerio de Obras Públicas (MOP) recibió dos propuestas técnicas para la nueva concesión de la Ruta 5 Santiago-Los Vilos , que considera una inversión cercana a los US$1.275 millones. Las empresas que presentaron ofertas fueron las españolas Sacyr y Vías Chile. La firma europea resaltó su propuesta frente a su par española en el marco de su visita a las dependencias del MOP. VíasChile comentó que el encuentro se dio en el marco de la apertura de las ofertas económicas correspondientes a la licitación de la segunda concesión de la Ruta 5, tramo Santiago-Los Vilos. “De acuerdo con las propuestas expuestas por los interesados, la oferta presentada por la compañía resultó ser la más competitiva ”, dijo VíasChile en un comunicado. Además, la firma resaltó su posición en la nueva concesión bajo el argumento de que, según su análisis, “ la concesión representa una continuidad natural de la parte norte de Autopista Central , principal activo del grupo VíasChile, siendo un activo que conecta geográficamente la Región de Coquimbo con la red que opera la Compañía en las regiones Metropolitana y de Valparaíso”. De esta forma, Andrés Barberis, director general del grupo VíasChile, comentó que “ estamos muy felices de haber presentado la oferta más competitiva que nos permitirá generar un impacto...

title: Hoodlums hired to vandalise govt property, steal Ganduje’s corruption case file during protest — Gov. Yusuf
creator: Ibrahim Ramalan
content: The Kano State governor, Abba Yusuf, has claimed that the hoodlums who invaded the state High Court during the #endbadgovernance protest carted away some of the documents used in the corruption trial of former Governor Abdullahi Ganduje. Recall that the state government had dragged Mr Ganduje, some of his family members, and five others to court over charges of misappropriation, and diversion of funds during his eight-year tenure as governor. In a statement issued by his chief press secretary, Sanusi Bature, the governor claimed that the hoodlums destroyed every unit of the courts and caused damages worth N1bn. Mr Bature said the governor made the revelation after he was conducted around the court premises by the attorney general and commissioner of justice, Haruna Dederi, the chief registrar of the court, Abdullahi Ado Bayero, and some judges. According to the governor’s spokesperson, Mr Yusuf described the vandalism as a stage-managed mission by hired miscreants. “It is very unfortunate that enemies of Kano State hired undesirable elements to vandalized one of the historic public buildings with a mission of averting corruption charges against the Ag. National Chairman of APC and former governor of the state Dr. Abdullahi Umar Ganduje, his family and aides,” the governor was quoted as saying. The governor, therefore, appealed to youths in the state to desist from being used...

title: Emprego público atinge novo máximo e sobe para quase 750 mil
creator: Salomé Pinto
content: O número de funcionários públicos subiu para 749.678, no segundo trimestre do ano, atingindo um novo máximo da série , que se inicia em 2011, segundo a síntese estatística da Direção-Geral da Administração e do Emprego Público (DGAEP), publicada esta quarta-feira. Este crescimento deveu-se sobretudo à criação de postos de trabalho nas câmaras municipais. Emprego público atinge novo recorde e sobe para 748.870 Ler Mais São mais 3.831 postos de trabalho na comparação com o mesmo período do ano passado, o que corresponde a um aumento de 0,5%. Face ao trimestre anterior, o número de funcionários praticamente estabilizou, ainda que se tenha registo uma ligeira subida de 0,1% ou de 632. Analisando o início da série, que se reporta a 31 de dezembro de 2011, o salto foi de 3%, o que significa que foram contratados mais 21.977 em relação aos 727.701 funcionários que o Estado empregava na altura. Este incremento no emprego público deveu-se sobretudo ao aumento de funcionários nas “câmaras municipais (nomeadamente nos técnicos superiores e assistentes operacionais)”, indica o mesmo relatório. Em concreto, as autarquias integraram mais 3.885 funcionários, o que corresponde a uma subida de 2,9% para 137.438, entre abril e junho. Na administração central foram criados mais 527 postos de trabalho (0,1%), “destacando-se o crescimento do emprego nas...

content: [스포츠한국 이혜영 기자] 아이브 가을이 13일 오전 서울 강남구 현대백화점 무역센터점에서 열린 '발리(Bally) BY YK JEONG' 캡슐 컬렉션 런칭 이벤트 포토콜 행사에 참석하고 있다. 이번 캡슐 컬렉션은 브랜드 '발리'가 스타일리스트 정윤기와 함께해 스페셜한 콜라보레이션을 선보인다. 이날 행사에는 제로베이스원 규빈, 아이브 가을, 크래비티 세림, 있지 채령, 세븐틴 도겸이 참석해 자리를 빛냈다.

title: تقی‌زاده: دنیامالی مدیری تحول‌خواه است
content: ، معاون اسبق وزارت ورزش چهارشنبه‌شب و در آستانه برگزاری جلسات رای اعتماد نمایندگان به کابینه دولت چهاردهم، در گفت‌وگو با ایرنا گفت: امروز ایران، در بزنگاه سیاسی مهمی قرار گرفته است. با عنایت به پیچیدگی‌ها و مشکلات کشور و به امید تغییر و بهبود شرایط زندگی مردم، نیاز است مجلس از تصمیمات و برنامه‌های مسعود پزشکیان حمایت کرده و پشتیبانی همه جانبه‌ای انجام بدهد. بی‌شک موفقیت و درخشش کابینه دولت چهاردهم، موجب امیدواری مردم و نشاط اجتماعی خواهد شد. وی درباره معرفی احمد دنیامالی به عنوان گزینه پیشنهادی برای وزارت ورزش به مجلس، اظهار داشت: انتخاب و معرفی دنیامالی که مدیری تحول‌خواه است، بارقه امید را در جامعه ورزش به وجود آورده است. می‌توانیم با تکیه بر شایستگی، تجارب و توانمندی‌های او شاهد موفقیت‌ها و دستاوردهای درخشان در عرصه داخلی و بین‌المللی در جهت اعتلا و توسعه ورزش کشور باشیم. تقی‌زاده افزود: با توجه به اشراف نمایندگان مجلس به شایستگی‌های اخلاقی، حرفه‌ای و مدیریتی دنیامالی، امید است با رای اعتماد به گزینه وزارت ورزش، در راستای تقویت دولت برای خدمت به مردم و جامعه بزرگ ورزش، آنها را برای خدمت‌گزاری بیشتر امیدوار سازند.

title: Subgobernador Heath de banco central México ve prematuro reciente recorte tasa clave
content: El subgobernador del banco central mexicano (Banxico) Jonathan Heath considera prematuro el reciente recorte a la tasa clave de interés y al mismo tiempo contradictorio dado que se subieron los pronósticos para la inflación general, según una entrevista publicada el miércoles. Heath y su colega Irene Espinosa votaron la semana pasada por mantener la tasa en un 11% mientras que la gobernadora del banco , Victoria Rodríguez, y los subgobernadores Galia Borja y Omar Mejía lo hicieron para bajarla en 25 puntos base a 10.75%. " Creo que es prematuro ahora bajar, más bien yo pago por ver: empiezo a ver resultados realmente visibles y vamos a bajarla ", dijo en la entrevista con el diario El Universal. El economista aseguró que recortar el costo de los préstamos y al mismo tiempo subir los pronósticos para la inflación general -como hizo Banxico- daña las expectativas porque los analistas comenzaron a corregir al alza sus estimaciones de precios . "No nos creen, hay que trabajar más en las expectativas, ser más cautelosos. La inflación general no puede estar subiendo y nosotros bajando tasas, es contradictorio, va en contra de las expectativas ", sostuvo. "No hay que tener prisa; hay que tener calma, dejar la tasa y esperar a que los datos realmente se materialicen".

title: Négociations avec les fournisseurs : E.Leclerc sanctionné d’une amende de record de 38 millions d’euros
creator: 20 Minutes avec AFP (20 Minutes)
content: Michel-Edouard Leclerc avait dit s’y attendre, c’est chose faite : la Répression des Fraudes sévit et vient d’infliger une sévère amende au premier distributeur alimentaire français, E.Leclerc, accusé d’avoir dépassé la date limite de négociations avec des fournisseurs. Le groupe, via sa centrale d’achat européenne Eurelec, a écopé mercredi d’une sanction d’un peu plus de 38 millions d’euros – la plus élevée prononcée dans ce genre de dossier – pour ne pas avoir respecté les délais des négociations avec 62 de ses fournisseurs. Michel-Edouard Leclerc se sent « personnellement » visé En septembre 2020, la Direction générale de la concurrence, de la consommation et de la répression des fraudes ( DGCCRF ) avait déjà infligé une amende de 6,34 millions d’euros à Eurelec pour « non-respect allégué de la réglementation française relative au formalisme des négociations entre fournisseurs et distributeurs ». Contactée par l’AFP, cette enseigne leader du secteur n’a pas souhaité commenter. Mais son porte-voix Michel-Edouard Leclerc s’était exprimé en février, disant s’attendre à des assignations et des sanctions dans la foulée des négociations commerciales, estimant même être visé « personnellement » par un « groupe de députés » de la majorité. Car cette année, les règles du jeu commercial ont changé. Habituellement, industriels et...

title: In High-Level Meeting On J&K, Rajnath Issues Directions To Strengthen Security Grid
creator: Press Trust of India
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh on Wednesday chaired a high-level meeting that reviewed the overall security situation in Jammu and Kashmir in the backdrop of recent spurt in terrorist incidents. The meeting was attended by National Security Advisor Ajit Doval, Army Chief Gen Upendra Dwivedi, Defence Secretary Giridhar Aramane and heads of other security and intelligence agencies concerned. The defence minister issued instructions to further strengthen the security grid in Jammu and Kashmir and underlined the need for improving coordination among various security and intelligence agencies, sources said. The meeting also focused on enhancing security apparatus in Jammu as the region faced a number of terror attacks in the recent months. The meeting came just a day ahead of Independence Day. The government is committed to root out terrorism from Jammu and Kashmir, said a source.

title: La demanda por ciberacoso de una boxeadora olímpica que nombra a personajes célebres
creator: Thomas H.
content: La medallista de oro olímpica Imane Khelif ha presentado una denuncia penal en un tribunal francés, nombrando a Elon Musk y JK Rowling como parte de “actos de ciberacoso agravado” debido a las mentiras que difundieron sobre la boxeadora en línea. El enfoque de la demanda es amplio. El 13 de agosto, el Centro Nacional para la Lucha contra el Odio en Línea contactó con la Oficina Central para la Lucha contra los Crímenes contra la Humanidad y los Crímenes de Odio para realizar una investigación sobre cargos de ciberacoso por razón de género, insulto público por razón de género, incitación pública a la discriminación e insulto público por razón de origen, según informaron las autoridades francesas a Variety . ¿Quién es Imane Khelif? Khelif, una boxeadora argelina que ganó la medalla de oro, enfrentó una oleada de acoso en línea. En un combate temprano, venció a la boxeadora italiana Angela Carini, quien terminó el combate en lágrimas, afirmando que “nunca había sido golpeada tan fuerte” en su vida. Después de que una organización desacreditada descalificara a Khelif de un combate en 2023 por tener “cromosomas XY,” se difundió la mentira de que Khelif es un hombre. Sin embargo, Khelif es una mujer y fue asignada a ese género al nacer. El rumor proviene de la Asociación Internacional de Boxeo, desacreditada y respaldada por el Kremlin, que...

"I wasn't actually very excited for the Aljo fight. I was stressed about that fight, just because my rib (injury), my training camp wasn't the best. It was good for what we had, and then it's like, this is hard. This fight, I'm feeling good as f*ck. I love this matchup. He's got a 10-fight winning streak. It's a big fight. It's at the Sphere, it's in competition with boxing, which is just kind of an extra little layer. "When it comes to Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, who are they talking about? Are they talking about Canelo? Are they talking about the boxing fight? title: This Mattress Kept Me Cool on an 80-Degree Night - and It's Now Almost Half Off
creator: Alida Araica
content: I take sleeping very seriously. So much so that I've incorporated lavender-scented candles, TikTok's sleepy-girl mocktail , and stretching into my nighttime routine. But despite all the tips, tricks, and products I use to get a good night's rest, sleeping comfortably is always more difficult in the summer. Hot summer nights in mid-July are just not what Lana Del Ray makes them out to be. This July, I found myself tossing, turning, and staring at the ceiling fan in bed, waiting for temperatures to drop so I could get some shut eye. It doesn't help that I always sleep with covers and a comforter over me, but it's not a habit I'm willing to break. So when I was looking for new ways to beat the heat — besides a second fan and new set of cotton sheets — I thought it might be time to try a different mattress. I was immediately drawn to the Emma Hybrid Cooling Elite ($1,089, originally $1,989) because of the name, but was also intrigued by the product description on the brand's site. In addition to having a cooling effect, the mattress promises to provide extra pressure relief and a unique floating sensation for "unparalleled restoring sleep." With that in mind (and the hope that I could put this version of hot-girl summer to rest), I decided to test it out. Keep reading for my honest thoughts on the new Hybrid Cooling Elite mattress ahead. What I Like About the Emma Hybrid Cooling...

title: Belengette visszavonulását az erőszaktevő holland strandröplabdázó
content: Van de Velde egy interjúban elmondta: már az olimpia előtt fontolgatta a játékokról való visszalépését az ellene kialakult ellenszenv miatt, de végül a folytatás mellett döntött. Az Olimpiai Bizottság engedélyezte indulását, hiszen alanyi jogon megfelelt a verseny-és kvalifikációs rendszer feltételeinek. “Valami rosszat követtem el tíz éve, ezt el kell fogadnom. De bántani a szeretteimet, a csapattársamat (Matthew Immers), feleségemet, a fiamat... ez már túl sok nekem. Határozottan elgondolkoztam azon, hogy: Tényleg megéri ez?- nyilatkozta könnyeivel küszködve a holland NOS televíziónak. A sportoló kritizálta a részvételével kapcsolatos médiavisszhangot is. Elmondta, hogy fontosabb számára a fia jövője, mint saját sportkarrierje és hozzátette: ha továbbra is ellenszenv övezi majd a nemzetközi versenyeken, akkor elgondolkodik visszavonulásán. Van de Veldének megengedték, hogy a mérkőzések után kihagyja a sajtótájékoztatókat. Csak a holland csapat sajtósa nyilatkozott egy alkalommal a korábban elítélt sportoló jelenlétéről, de olyan sokkoló kijelentést tett, hogy az rendkívül negatív visszhangot keltett a brit médiában. “Azért védünk meg egy elítélt gyermekerőszakolót, hogy a lehető legjobban teljesítsen a sportjában, egy olyan versenyen, amelyre kvalifikálta magát” - közölte John van...

title: Hà Nội có hơn 8.000 cổ thụ
content: Ngày14/8, tại một hội thảo khoa học, ông Nguyễn Đức Hưng, Giám đốc Trung tâm Quản lý hạ tầng kỹ thuật, Sở Xây dựng Hà Nội, cho biết trên các đường phố thuộc 30 quận huyện có 2,4 triệu m2 thảm cỏ, cây mảng, hàng rào, cây cảnh, 1.500 m2 hoa thời vụ. Cấp thành phố đang quản lý khoảng 194.000 cây bóng mát, 510.000 cây keo, tràm, bạch đàn; cấp huyện quản lý khoảng 470.00 cây. Thống kê sơ bộ, 12 quận có hơn 8.000 cổ thụ, đường kính thân từ 50 cm trở lên. Một số cây già cỗi, có biểu hiện sinh trưởng kém cần thay thế. Ngoài ra, một số loài không thuộc chủng loại cây đô thị như dâu da, vông, trứng cá dễ bị gãy đổ khi gặp mưa gió, quả chín rụng bẩn, thu hút ruồi, nhặng. Hàng sấu trên phố Phan Đình Phùng. Ảnh: Lê Bích Theo ông Hưng, việc quản lý, phát triển cây xanh đô thị còn một số khó khăn như thiếu quy định cụ thể để nghiệm thu, thanh quyết toán duy tu, duy trì hệ thống cây xanh. Công tác cắt tỉa cây bóng mát đôi khi còn chưa đạt yêu cầu về kỹ thuật, ảnh hưởng đến sinh trưởng, phát triển và khả năng tạo bóng mát. Hiện thành phố chưa có danh mục cây bóng mát trồng, hạn chế trồng và cấm trồng trong khu đô...

creator: Gino Farfán
content: La Medalla de Educación de América Latina es una de las tres medallas mundiales fundadas por T4 Education y la marca tecnológica HP. Este reconocimiento se otorga a una persona que está marcando una diferencia en la educación y cuyo ejemplo puede ser considerado una inspiración. Estos organismos reconocen el trabajo incansable de líderes que están transformando la educación en su país o en toda la región. En esta ocasión, entre los diez finalistas se encuentra una ecuatoriana. Marcela Suárez es directora de Proyectos del colegio Johannes Kepler (Quito) y de la Empresa de Consultoría Educativa Edusi y podría llevarse la Medalla de Educación para América Latina. Suárez fue distinguida entre cientos de postulaciones de líderes en América Latina que recibió T4 Education para este galardón. La institución Johannes Kepler fue preseleccionada para los premios a la mejor escuela del mundo de T4 Education en 2023 por su trabajo para crear un entorno de aprendizaje de diseño regenerativo que se centra en la energía, el desperdicio cero, la construcción ecológica, la gestión del agua, la combinación de semillas, suelo y alimentos y la restauración de los ecosistemas. Suárez logró que su institución modifique su plan de estudios, adaptándolo para cumplir los Objetivos de Desarrollo Sostenible de la ONU . Al reconocer la innovación de la escuela, el...

title: South Mill Champs Expands Distribution Network in Florida with Acquisition of Baird Produce
content: KENNETT SQUARE, Pa. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- South Mill Champs, one of the largest high-quality mushroom growers in North America , is pleased to announce the expansion of its distribution network in Florida with the acquisition of substantially all of the assets of Baird Produce, located in the Tampa Wholesale Produce Market. "We are excited to now be operating in Tampa and look forward to continuing the legacy of Baird Produce by delivering the freshest mushrooms, fruits and vegetables to the greater Tampa region," said Mike Pia Jr. , VP of Business Growth at South Mill Champs. "The proximity of Tampa to our existing Winter Haven operation will create synergies that will allow us to provide quality, fresh mushrooms efficiently to this key Floridian market," added Mike. In addition to being one of the largest mushroom producers in North America , South Mill Champs operates a robust network of distribution centers across the United States , with locations in Atlanta , Dallas , Houston , Indianapolis , Kennett Square , Los Angeles , New Orleans , West Sacramento , and Winter Haven ( Florida ). The 2023 acquisition of World Fresh Produce further enhanced our distribution capabilities by providing direct relationships with specialty produce growers across the world, allowing us to supply our customers with a wide variety of specialty seasonal produce alongside their...

title: TimberHogs fall to Flying Bison, 12-4
creator: From Staff Reports
content: ABILENE - Cooper Markle doubled and drove in three runs, four other Flying Bison drove in two runs and regular-season champion Abilene opened the Mid America League playoffs with a 12-4 win over the Piney Woods TimberHogs on Tuesday at McMurry University's Walt Driggers Field. The loss ends the season for the TimberHogs, who entered the playoffs as the No. 4 seed after tying in the regular season with Sherman. Piney Woods finishes its first season of play in the Mid America League with a 31-36 record. Abilene moves to 47-22 and was scheduled to take on Joplin (36-33) for the championship back at Walt Driggers Field on Wednesday. Joplin was an 18-14 winner over Sherman in the other semifinal on Tuesday. The TimberHogs scored twice in the top of the first inning and led 3-1 before Abilene scored five times in the bottom of the fifth and added two more in the sixth. After Piney Woods tacked on a run in the top of the seventh, Abilene pushed across four in the bottom of the inning to put things away. Cooper Schneider doubled, singled and drove in two runs for Abilene. Gianni Horvat had three hits and drove in two runs. Mason Krznarich singled and drove in a run. Joshua Overbeek and Kyler Mentzel both singled and plated two runs, and Andrew Detlefsen banged out three hits. Noah Paddie had two hits in the loss for the TimberHogs. Alton Gatson, Corbin Montayne and Gage Goddard all...

title: La mordedura de garrapata que podría costarte la vida
content: Los insectos pueden ser una amenaza considerable en el hogar, especialmente cuando son portadores de enfermedades graves como la rickettsia. Esta bacteria puede transmitirse de las garrapatas a los seres humanos, y en algunos casos, puede resultar potencialmente mortal. Es importante destacar que no todas las picaduras de garrapatas conducen a la fiebre manchada de las Montañas Rocosas, también conocida como fiebre maculosa. Sin embargo, las garrapatas pueden ser vectores de otras enfermedades graves que también representan un riesgo significativo para la salud. ¿Qué es la fiebre manchada? La fiebre manchada es una infección bacteriana que se propaga a través de garrapatas infectadas. Según los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades (CDC), la mayoría de las personas que contraen esta enfermedad experimentan síntomas como fiebre, dolor de cabeza y erupciones cutáneas. BB

title: Эпидемиологическая ситуация в Армении может обостриться
Tom Petty's 1965 Mustang is up for auction: Maybe you'll get lucky
creator: Autoblog
content: What this really needs is a couple of bidders who won't back down. Tom Petty's 1965 convertible is scheduled to sell at Bonham's auction at The Quail this Friday, part of Car Week. The auction house has suggested an estimated range of $25,000-$35,000. That struck us as surprisingly low; there are a lot of 1965 Mustangs selling at that or more. The car looks good in pictures, in Rangoon Red over a white and red interior. But Petty drove it for about 20 years in the great wide open around his home in ; there's no mention of a restoration; and it's said to be in "excellent running order." So it's not going to ... break down ... but singling out that it runs great might be a phrase intended to redirect from cosmetics. No matter. Maybe it's pristine, maybe it's not. Tom Petty's voice had patina, so if his car has it too, all the better. There's not much more detail about the Mustang, other than it's nicely optioned. We can see the wood wheel, and that it has an automatic. But this is one of those auctions where they pretty much clean out a late celebrity's garage and closet. In addition to the Mustang, on offer will be over 100 items of Petty's, including his: Yamaha Grand Piano. Estimate $5,000 – 7,000. The Virgin and Child painting from 18th-19th from Spanish Colonial School. Estimate: $2,000 – 3,000. A Chinese Carved Wood Daybed, 20th Century. Estimate: $2,000 – 3,000. Writing...

title: Robert Ellis and Pink Development and Construction LLC Advocate for 62-Unit Ivy Residences Project in Columbus
creator: By Pink Development and Construction LLC
content: The proposed development is located in Franklinton adjacent to downtown Columbus, Ohio COLUMBUS, Ohio , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- Robert Ellis , principal of Pink Development and Construction LLC, continues to champion the Ivy Residences, a 62-unit mid-rise project in Columbus , despite recent setbacks. Following a second rejection from the Development Commission, Ellis is now working to have the proposal drafted into legislation for a City Council vote expected in September or October 2024 . Project Overview: From 20 Stories to 8 Stories with Concessions Originally proposed as a 20-story tower, the Ivy Residences have been reduced to an 8-story, 89-foot structure in response to feedback from city officials and community stakeholders. The site, currently zoned for manufacturing, would be transformed into a commercial planned development, adding much-needed residential units to the area. The project aligns with Columbus's urban development goals, following similar projects like the six-story residential development by National Church Residences on the same street. Support and Opposition: Navigating City Departments and Area Commissions Most city departments back the project, recognizing its potential to enhance Columbus's urban landscape. However, the Planning Division and Franklinton Area Commission oppose it, raising concerns that Ellis believes are irrelevant to the...

title: West Virginia DH, DoHS Cabinet secretaries join Capito & actress Halle Berry for menopause roundtable
creator: For WV News
content: The menopause roundtable featuring actress Halle Berry and Sen. Shelley Moore Capito was held at the Kanawha County Public Library. U.S. Sen. Shelley Moore Capito and Halle Berry with leaders from across West Virginia at a menopause roundtable discussion Wednesday at the Kanawha County Public Library in Charleston. CHARLESTON, W.Va. (WV News) — West Virginia Department of Health Cabinet Secretary Sherri Young, D.O. MBA, FAAFP, and West Virginia Department of Human Services (DoHS) Cabinet Secretary Cynthia Persily, Ph.D., on Wednesday joined U.S. Sen. Shelley Moore Capito and actress Halle Berry for a roundtable discussion on menopause. The event, held at the Kanawha County Public Library, brought together local leaders, health care professionals and community members to address the critical issue of menopause care. “Women have deserved more from our health care systems for far too long, but that’s about to change,” Berry said. “I’m thrilled to be in West Virginia and am grateful for Senator Capito’s leadership on the bipartisan Advancing Menopause and Mid-Life Women’s Health Act. I look forward to working alongside her to get it over the finish line.” Wednesday's roundtable provided a platform to discuss the newly introduced Advancing Menopause Care and Mid-Life Women’s Health Act, a bipartisan bill co-sponsored by Senator Capito and advocated for by Berry. title: South Mill Champs Expands Distribution Network in Florida with Acquisition of Baird Produce
creator: By South Mill Champs
content: KENNETT SQUARE, Pa. , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- South Mill Champs, one of the largest high-quality mushroom growers in North America , is pleased to announce the expansion of its distribution network in Florida with the acquisition of substantially all of the assets of Baird Produce, located in the Tampa Wholesale Produce Market. "We are excited to now be operating in Tampa and look forward to continuing the legacy of Baird Produce by delivering the freshest mushrooms, fruits and vegetables to the greater Tampa region," said Mike Pia Jr. , VP of Business Growth at South Mill Champs. "The proximity of Tampa to our existing Winter Haven operation will create synergies that will allow us to provide quality, fresh mushrooms efficiently to this key Floridian market," added Mike. In addition to being one of the largest mushroom producers in North America , South Mill Champs operates a robust network of distribution centers across the United States , with locations in Atlanta , Dallas , Houston , Indianapolis , Kennett Square , Los Angeles , New Orleans , West Sacramento , and Winter Haven ( Florida ). The 2023 acquisition of World Fresh Produce further enhanced our distribution capabilities by providing direct relationships with specialty produce growers across the world, allowing us to supply our customers with a wide variety of specialty seasonal produce alongside their...

title: Race Across World's Jeff Brazier's romance with pregnant Jade Goody destroyed by 'out of control row'
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Vikki White)
content: Jade Goody found love with Jeff Brazier soon after becoming famous overnight on Big Brother - but the relationship ended after a 'huge row'. Jeff Brazier was a reality contestant himself, appearing on C4 's Shipwrecked, when they got together in 2002. The relationship moved quickly, with son Bobby Jack arriving in 2003 but while Jade was pregnant with their second son Freddie things were all over a massive bust up at their home in Harlow, Essex. Jade was 23 when she admitted in a statement there had been a 'huge row... that got out of control', leading to the break up of her relationship. The quarrel was said to have been caused when the former footballer arrived home from a night drinking with friends and Jade accused him of seeing another woman. "We had a huge row early Saturday morning that got out of control," Jade said in a statement. "We've had to try very hard to make our relationship work but I feel it would be better for all of us if we separated. "The split is amicable and we are in the process of planning Bobby's christening and first birthday." Reflecting on their young love, Jeff later said the 'odds were stacked against us'. "She was a huge, strong character going through a huge transition in her life going from a childhood which was a lot harder than your average," he said of his ex's overnight fame. "You had two parents who wanted so badly for our children to...

title: InventHelp Inventor Develops New Device for Use with an Angle Grinder (LBT-8210)
content: PITTSBURGH , Aug. 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- "I wanted to create a device that would work in conjunction with an angle grinder to level warped engine block surfaces," said an inventor, from East Petersburg, Pa. , "so I invented the E D L. My design would simplify major automotive engine repair work." The invention provides an easy way to level a warped engine block using an angle grinder. In doing so, it enables the angle grinder to be worked across the engine block evenly for optimum results. As a result, it increases efficiency and convenience. The invention features a reliable and user-friendly design that is easy to use so it is ideal for mechanics and do-it-yourselfers. The original design was submitted to the Lancaster sales office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 23-LBT-8210, InventHelp, 100 Beecham Drive, Suite 110, Pittsburgh, PA 15205-9801, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com . SOURCE InventHelp

title: Meeskond loodab Taaramäelt karjääri viimasel suurtuuril etapivõitu
creator: Kaspar Koort
content: Selle hooaja järel oma karjääri jalgrattaspordi eliitseltskonnas World Tour'il lõppenuks kuulutav Rein Taaramäe on nimetatud laupäeval algavaks Hispaania velotuuriks ehk Vueltaks Intermarche-Wanty meeskonna koosseisu. Tegemist on Taaramäe karjääri 20. ja viimase suurtuuriga – ning omamoodi sümboolselt oli Vuelta ka esimeseks suurtuuriks, kus Taaramäe 2009. aastal osales. Lissabonis stardi saavale ja 8. septembril Madridis kulmineeruvale tuurile läheb Intermarche-Wanty selge eesmärgiga: individuaalarvestuses peaks nende parim rattur mahtuma tuuri kokkuvõttes esikümnesse ning neljandat aastat järjest tuleks noppida vähemalt üks etapivõit. Ning meeskonna mänedžer Aike Visbeek ei varjanud, et ses osas vaadatakse otsa ka 37aastasele eestlasele. „Lorenzo Rota, Kobe Goossens ja Rein Taaramäe on kolm ratturit, kellel on suutlikkust mägistel etappidel esikoha nimel heidelda,“ teatas ta klubi kodulehel. Intermarche-Wanty etapivõitude ketile panigi 2021. aastal aluse Taaramäe, kellel õnnestus tol tuuril kahel etapil ka liidrisärgis sõita – tegemist oli üldse esimese korraga, kui mõni Intermarche-Wanty klubi rattur oli suurtuuril liidrisärgi enda valdusesse saanud. Järgmisel aastal noppis etapivõidu Louis Meintjes ja mullu Rui Costa. Tiimi liidrina ja mehena, kes võiks kokkuvõttes esikümnesse jõuda, näeb Visbeek just lõuna-aafriklast Meintjesi....

content: -Uloga Save mi nije prva uloga, ali je prva najveća uloga do sada. Drago mi je zbog toga i osećam se uzbuđeno zbog pozitivnih komentara. To je bio i moj cilj koji sam ostvario - priča za „Blic“ Jakša Prpić. Šta vas je privuklo ovom projektu? -Privukla me je tema, jer sam mislio da bih mogao da naučim više o istoriji i o nekim stvarim koje ja nisam uspeo da proživim. Da shvatim kako je bilo ljudima koji su to proživeli ili su čuli priče od starijih jer su oni tada kada se to dešavalo bili mali. Privukla me je i vrlo dobra ekipa. Drago mi je bilo što sam radio sa sjajnom ekipom i što smo mogli svaki dan da se družimo, šalimo i da pomažemo jedni drugima. Najteže tokom snimanja vam je palo trčanje... -Iako sam jak, nisam toliko sportski tip. U filmu sam bežao od kučeta i trčao za trolom. To dosta umara jer trola nije mogla da ide sporo zbog mene, već brzo, a i kuče nije moglo da uspori kada me je jurilo. Nekako sam se navikao na to ali bilo mi je zaista teško i naporno. Međutim, volim to da radim i bilo mi je lako da se priviknem i na takve scene. Kakve su bile scene sa kučetom koje nije izgledalo nimalo miroljubivo? -Kuče možda pred kamerama izgleda tako besno ali je vrlo pitomo i voli da se druži. Iako ne smeju puno da se diraju ti kučići, da se neka emocija ne bi pomešala u sceni, bilo je teško, ali sam uživao u scenama sa njim. Jedan od...

title: “Las pérdidas han sido grandes”: sale lastimada una vez más la agricultura
creator: Efraín Montalbán Ríos
content: La presidenta de la Asociación de Agricultores, Vanessa Piñeiro, indicó que la cosecha de café se perdió y un agricultor en Maunabo lamenta la pérdida de su cosecha de plátano 14 de agosto de 2024 - 1:15 PM Nota del editor: te invitamos a mantenerte bien informado. Accede libre de costo a las noticias y actualizaciones relacionadas con el huracán Ernesto. Gracias por apoyar el periodismo responsable. Suscríbete hoy. --- “Ahora es empezar de cero nuevamente”. Estas fueron las palabras del agricultor Marvin Guzmán Maldonado , para quien se repite la historia de perder el 100% de su cosecha de plátano, unas 20,000 plantas con frutos casi listos para el recogido en la Finca Guzmán, en Maunabo. La cosecha malograda por la tormenta tropical Ernesto representaba la fuente de ingreso para la familia Guzmán, por lo que el agricultor aseguró a El Nuevo Día que “las pérdidas han sido bien grandes” . “La finca que tenemos en el barrio Cascadas de Maunabo, hemos tenido unas pérdidas de un 100% de todas las matas de plátano, matas que estaban ya paridas”, indicó Guzmán. “ Nosotros vivimos de esto, esta es la fuente económica de nosotros y te digo, de nosotros, porque los hijos míos también tienen fincas ”, expresó entre sentimientos el agricultor, quien no encontraba las palabras adecuadas para expresar lo sucedido. Otras cosechas se afectaron en áreas altas del...

title: ​​​​​​नेतरहाट की तर्ज पर 10 जगहों पर खोलेंगे स्कूल:मुंगेर में प्रशांत किशोर ने किया दावा, अन्य क्षेत्रों में सुधार को लेकर किया चर्चा
content: जन सुराज के संस्थापक प्रशांत किशोर बुधवार को एक दिवसीय दौरे पर मुंगेर पहुंचे। जहां प्रशांत किशोर ने जिला के विभिन्न प्रखंडों में कार्यक्रम आयोजित किया। इसके बाद देर शाम जिला मुख्यालय स्थित टाउन हॉल सभागार पहुंचे। जहां कार्यक्रम के दौरान सभा को संबोधि उन्होंने शिक्षा पर जोर देते हुए कहा कि सबसे पहले 15 साल के जो बच्चे है, उन्हें मूल रूप से शिक्षा की जरूरत है। जो आज का समाज उसे नहीं दे रहा है। इसलिए विद्यालयों में पढ़ाई की व्यवस्था में सुधार की जरूरत है। आज नेतरहाट के बच्चे आईपीएस और आईएएस बन रहे है। इसलिए जन सुराज नेतरहाट जैसे 8 से 10 विद्यालय बनाने का काम करेगा। हमारी सरकार बनी तो शिक्षा में सुधार किया जाएगा। आज की सरकार बुजुर्गों के लिए जो पेंशन दे रही है वह मात्र 400 रुपया दे रही है अगर हमारी सरकार बनती है तो हम सभी पेंशन धारी को 2000 रुपए देंगे। वहीं अगर रोजगार की बात करें तो हमारे बिहार में पूंजी की कमी है। जबकि एक पूंजी अपना है तो दूसरा पूंजी बैंक देती है। बिहार के बैंकों में 100 रुपया जमा होने पर जहां बैंक को 75 रुपया देना चाहिए। वहां बैंक सिर्फ 30 रुपया देती है।बांकी पैसा दूसरे राज्यों को देती है। इसके कारण बिहार में बेरोजगारी और पलायन बरकरार है। हमारी सरकार आएगी तो पंचायत स्तर पर लोगों को रोजगार दिया जाएगा।

title: Назван возраст, в котором тело начинает быстро выходить из строя
creator: Газета.Ru
content: Назван возраст, в котором тело начинает быстро выходить из строя В возрасте 40 и 60 лет происходит резкое ухудшение работы организма на молекулярном уровне. Это показало исследование, опубликованное в журнале Nature Aging . Ученые оценили уровни 135 тысяч молекул у 108 человек в возрасте от 25 до 75 лет, а также их микробиомы — совокупности бактерий, вирусов и грибов внутри организма на коже. Всего проанализировали 250 миллиардов различных параметров. Исследование показало, что разнообразие микробных сообществ мало менялось с течением времени. Самые большие изменения в уровнях молекул происходили в возрасте около 45 и 60 лет. Сначала ученые посчитали, что результаты могут быть связаны с менопаузой у женщин. Они даже предположили, что из-за этого исказились средние показатели в группе пациентов. Однако оказалось, что у мужчин также происходят значительные изменения в работе организма в возрасте 45 лет. Содержание молекул, связанных с сердечно-сосудистыми заболеваниями и работой иммунной системы, сильно отличалось у добровольцев старше 60 лет. Известно, что риски деменции и сердечно-сосудистых заболеваний резко возрастают в 60 лет, до этого увеличиваясь постепенно. Результаты ученых открывают возможную причину этого. Значительные изменения наблюдались в уровнях молекул, связанных с переработкой алкоголя, кофеина и жирового обмена, а также кожи и мышц. Ученые считают, что...

title: 9 પાસ કમ્પાઉન્ડર બન્યો ડોક્ટર! દર્દીઓના આરોગ્ય સાથે કરતો હતો ચેડા
content: દાહોદ : આદિવાસી બાહુલ્ય ધરાવતા દાહોદ જિલ્લાના અંતરિયાળ વિસ્તારમાં ડિગ્રી વગર ગરીબ અને ભોળી કહેવાતી આદિવાસી સમાજનાં લોકોના સારવારના નામે આરોગ્ય સાથે ચેડા કરનાર ઝોલાછાપ ડોક્ટર સામે આવ્યા છે. જોકે આ માહિતી આરોગ્ય વિભાગને મળતા વિભાગના અધિકારીઓએ સક્રિય બની કાર્યવાહી હાથ ધરી હતી. દાહોદ શહેરના નગરપાલિકા વિસ્તારમાં કાલાભાઈ પેટ્રોલ પંપની સામે ભલાદાન ઔષધલય નામક હોસ્પિટલમાં ડોક્ટરની ગેરહાજરીમાં કમ્પાઉન્ડર દર્દીઓનું સારવારના નામે આરોગ્ય સાથે ચેડા કરતા હોવાની અરજી આરોગ્ય વિભાગના અર્બન મેડિકલ ઓફિસર લોકેન્દ્ર મહેન્દ્રસિંહ બેરાવતને મળતા આરોગ્ય વિભાગની ટીમે ઉપરોક્ત ભલાદાન ઓષધાલયમાં દરોડો પાડતા ડોક્ટરની ગેરહાજરીમાં કમ્પાઉન્ડર રમેશ બચુભાઈ મેડા (રહે. ભીલવાડા ગૌશાળાની બાજુમાં ) દર્દીઓનું ડોક્ટરના પ્રિસ્ક્રિપ્શન પર દવાઓ લખી સારવારના નામે દર્દીઓના આરોગ્ય સાથે ચેડા કરતો હોવાનો રંગેહાથ ઝડપાઈ જતા આરોગ્ય વિભાગના ટીમે દાહોદ એ ડિવિઝન પોલીસ મથકે જાણ કરી ઉપરોક્ત રમેશ બચુ મેડા વિરુદ્ધ ગુનો દાખલ કરાવતા પોલીસે ઉપરોક્ત કમ્પાઉન્ડની ધરપકડ કરી હોસ્પિટલમાંથી એલોપેથીક દવાઓનો 14,000 ઉપરાંતનો જથ્થો જપ્ત કરી આગળની કાર્યવાહી હાથ ધરી છે. આ પણ વાંચો : અમદાવાદ: નવું સિમ કાર્ડ ખરીદતી વખતે સાવધાન! તમારા નામે થઈ શકે છે આવા મોટા કાંડ ઓષધાલયમાંથી કોઈપણ પ્રકારની મંજૂરી કે સર્ટિફિકેટ ન મળી આવતા આરોગ્ય વિભાગની ટીમ ચોકી. દાહોદ શહેરના મધ્યમાં ધમધમતા ઉપરોક્ત ઔષધલાયમાંથી ચેકિંગ દરમિયાન જરૂરી મંજૂરીઓ જેવી કે બાયોવેસ્ટ લાયસન્સ, પાલિકાનું લાયન્સ અથવા કોઈપણ પ્રકારની મંજૂરી કે લાયસન્સ ન મળી આવતા ચેકિંગ કરનાર આરોગ્ય વિભાગની ટીમ પણ ચોંકી ઉઠી...

title: Mum slams easyJet after being sent email cancelling holiday while in the air to Spain
creator: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Nicole Wootton-Cane)
content: A mum has hit out at easyJet after she claims her and her disabled daughter were left 'abandoned' at a Spanish airport by the airline. Kerry Andrew booked a holiday to Alicante to celebrate her 16-year-old daughter finishing her exams. The pair jetted off from Manchester airport without a hitch - but while they were in the air, Kerry received an email saying their entire package holiday had been cancelled. They were able to check into their hotel upon arrival and when Kerry checked her email she assumed the message was a mistake. But when they arrived at Alicante airport to fly home, Kerry was told she didn't have a booking, and was left to find her own way home. READ MORE: Police on scene in town centre after 'armed robbery' with bank shut "When I went to the check-in desk they said 'you've got no flight'. They didn't offer us anything - no alternative flights. They just basically said find your own way home," she said. "I was told they'd cancelled my whole holiday while I was in the air - I don't know if they wanted me to jump out the window or what." Luckily, Kerry and her daughter were accompanied by special assistance due to her daughter's autism, who helped them to an alternative airline's desk where they were able to book the last two seats on a flight back to Manchester. But they were left out of pocket for double the flights as they had not yet been refunded for the...

title: Kolkata Doctor Rape-Murder Case: Autopsy Report of Trainee Doctor at RG Kar Medical College Indicates Multiple Penetrations, Injuries to Several Parts of Body
content: The autopsy report of the woman doctor who was allegedly raped and murdered at RG Kar Medical College and Hospital here has indicated multiple penetrations and injuries to several parts of the body. It also stated that her death was “homicidal” and “antemortem”, negating some claims that she was raped after being murdered. "Homicidal injuries are antemortem in nature with the indication of sexual penetration," the report said. The time of the death could be between 3 am and 5 am, it said. There were multiple external injuries, including on the lower and upper lips, nose, cheeks and lower jaw, said the report. Injuries on the temporal bone of her skull and blood coagulation on its frontal portion were also mentioned. Dr Subarna Goswami, a former student of RG Kar Medical College and Hospital, who went through the report, claimed that it indicated multiple penetrations. "The autopsy report is proof of the brutality she had to encounter, the presence of more than one person, and that she was sexually assaulted more than once. This is bestiality at its worst," he told PTI. The report also said after being sexually assaulted, she was first throttled by applying pressure to her neck and then smothered to death. The body of the postgraduate trainee was found inside a seminar hall of the hospital here on the morning of August 9. A civic volunteer was arrested on Saturday in connection...

title: Mininter anuncia creación de equipo especial para capturar a acosador de periodistas
creator: Bibiana Guardamino Soto
content: La liberación de Hialmar Enrique Laynes Sánchez , sujeto identificado como el acosador de siete periodistas, ha causado rechazo en todo el país. El último sábado 3 de agosto se dio a conocer que, pese a la gravedad de los hechos y al peligro que suponía para las mujeres de prensa, la jueza Emma Ruth Tambini Monge solo lo condenó a cinco años de pena suspendida y, actualmente, se encuentra no habido. Luego de la emisión de sentencia, la periodista Manuela Camacho advirtió que el sujeto volvería a amenazar a ella y a sus colegas, un hecho que quedó demostrado cuando volvió a denunciar haber sido nuevamente víctima de hostigamiento sexual por parte de este hombre. Frente a esto, el ministro del Interior, Juan Santiváñez , afirmó que ya se ha dispuesto la creación de un equipo de trabajo al interior de la Policía Nacional del Perú (PNP) con el objetivo de lograr su captura. Culpa a Ministerio Público por liberación El titular del Mininter , a su vez, criticó el papel que viene desempeñando la Fiscalía de la Nación a lo largo de este proceso, puesto que —de acuerdo a lo señalado— dicho ente no logra que el sujeto pueda ser detenido. A su turno, Manuela Camacho lamentó que las autoridades peruanas no tomen en serio estos casos y rechazó el “ desamparo absoluto ” en el que se encuentran, lo que se suma al agotamiento emocional y físico que la afecta a...

title: Celtic transfer bulletin as O'Riley price spikes with latest Atalanta 'bid' and imminent exit gets Parkhead hero 'raging'
creator: reporters@dailyrecord.co.uk (Alan Galindo)
content: It's all happening with Matt O'Riley and it's reported in Italy Atalanta have upped the ante AGAIN. . The news that Southampton are 'out of the race' for Matt O'Riley dovetailing with a spike in interest in the Italian media after Saints boss Russell Martin says they aren't in the running 'for now' to land the playmaker. That leaves Atalanta the clear frontrunners, having already lodged five unsuccessful bids. Calcio Mercato say another offer, thought to be worth €25m plus €2m in bonuses, has been lodged - though there seems to be some confusion with the Italian outlet claiming this latest bid is just their fourth. It is, however, the highest figure cited yet, coming to just over £23m in total. They say that Celtic are holding out for €29m (just under £25m), though even that figure seems low. Atletico Madrid, Inter, Chelsea and Liverpool are all in the queue and watching closely. Italian transfer journalist Nicolo Schira goes as far to claim that O'Riley has 'agreed personal terms' on the move, though that may be jumping the gun slightly at this stage. Meanwhile SportWitness carry reports from TuttoMercato, saying Celtic have Atalanta and Juventus 'on strings' - with talks between the two over Teun Koopmeiners seemingly at a deadlock until Atalanta can find a way to land O'Riley. They see the Dane as the ideal replacement for their key midfielder, and don't want to sanction an...

It is recommended that participants confirm all meeting times with the conference organizers. A webcast of GSI Technology's presentation will be available on the company's website under the Events and Presentations tab: https://ir.gsitechnology.com/events-and-presentations . title: واکنش لبنان به تعرض صهیونیست‌ها به مسجدالاقصی
content: به گزارش به نقل از الجزیره، واکنش‌های جهانی به تعرض روز گذشته صهیونیست‌ها به مسجدالاقصی همچنان ادامه دارد. در همین راستا وزارت امور خارجه لبنان با صدور بیانیه‌ای به این تعرض صهیونیست‌ها واکنش نشان داد. وزارت امور خارجه لبنان تاکید کرد: ما یورش وزرای تندرو کابینه «اسرائیل» به محوطه مسجدالاقصی را به شدت محکوم می‌کنیم. روز گذشته منابع فلسطینی از تعرض صدها صهیونیست به سرکردگی «ایتمار بن گویر» وزیر امنیت داخلی رژیم صهیونیستی و «اسحاق واسرلو» یکی دیگر از وزرای کابینه این رژیم به مسجدالاقصی، تحت حمایت شدید نظامیان صهیونیست خبر دادند. منابع محلی در قدس اشغالی گزارش دادند که روز سه‌شنبه بیش از ۲ هزار شهرک‌نشین به مسجدالاقصی یورش برده‌اند و پرچم رژیم جعلی صهیونیستی را در این مکان مقدس اسلامی نصب کرده‌اند. این اقدام صهیونیست‌ها با واکنش جهانی مواجه شده است و تاکنون چندین کشور از جمله ترکیه، عربستان سعودی، قطر، مصر، اردن، آلمان و آمریکا به آن واکنش نشان داده‌اند.

title: India to participate in overall 12 sports at Paris Paralympics
Clinica dentária em Almada encerrada por folta de condições de higiene e segurança
creator: portal@cmjornal.pt (Correio da Manhã)
content: A Entidade Reguladora da Saúde (ERS) encerrou uma clínica dentária em Almada por "perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos utentes", tendo participado os factos ao Ministério Público e à Agência de Integração, Migrações e Asilo (AIMA). Em comunicado esta quarta-feira divulgado, a ERS refere que desencadeou ações de fiscalização em Almada, distrito de Setúbal, com o objetivo de "garantir o direito de acesso dos utentes à prestação de cuidados de saúde adequados, de qualidade e com segurança e verificar o cumprimento dos requisitos de funcionamento em vigor", tendo decretado, em consequência o encerramento de um estabelecimento de medicina dentária. No espaço encerrado, por "observação efetuada em diversos locais, bem como da prova recolhida", a ERS constatou que "não se encontrava assegurado o cumprimento dos requisitos aplicáveis ao reprocessamento de dispositivos médicos", ou seja, de esterilização dos instrumentos, que não estava garantida a gestão de resíduos hospitalares perigosos nem o "cumprimento das condições de higiene e controlo ambiental, assim como da segurança e proteção radiológica". O comunicado da ERS aponta ainda que "não se observava a compartimentação mínima exigível para um estabelecimento daquela tipologia de atividade". "Perante os factos apurados e o perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos...

title: J.K. Rowling und Elon Musk tauchen in Klage von Boxerin Imane Khelif auf
content: Die Boxerin Imane Khelif aus Algerien feiert nach ihrem Sieg bei den Olympischen Spielen 2024 in Paris. Quelle: Mauro Pimentel/AFP/dpa Während der Olympischen Spiele war die algerische Boxerin Imane Khelif wegen einer Debatte über ihr Geschlecht in sozialen Medien vielen Beleidigungen ausgesetzt. Nun geht sie mit einer Klage dagegen vor. In der Anzeige werden auch „Harry Potter“-Autorin J. K. Rowling und Elon Musk genannt. Paris. Nach massiven Anfeindungen gegen die algerische Boxerin Imane Khelif während der Olympischen Spiele in Paris ermittelt Frankreichs Justiz. Es sei eine Untersuchung zu Cybermobbing aufgrund des Geschlechts, wegen öffentlicher Beleidigung und des öffentlichen Aufrufs zur Diskriminierung eingeleitet worden, teilte die Pariser Staatsanwaltschaft auf Anfrage mit. Wie das Magazin „Variety“ berichtet, sollen demnach auch die Autorin J. K. Rowling und der Unternehmer Elon Musk in der Strafanzeige genannt werden. Das bestätigte der in Paris ansässige Anwalt Khelifs, Nabil Boudi, gegenüber dem Magazin. Laut der Staatsanwaltschaft ist das Büro für Hass­verbrechen und Verbrechen gegen die Menschlichkeit für den Fall zuständig. Der Behörde zufolge hatte Khelif am Montag eine Anzeige eingereicht. Boudi schrieb auf der Internet­plattform X, die Ermittlungen sollten zeigen, wer hinter der „misogynen, rassistischen und sexistischen Kampagne“ gegen die...

title: Mukesh Sahani: मुकेश सहनी की पाला बदलने की अटकलें और तेज, अचानक मिलने पहुंचे अशोक चौधरी; 45 मिनट तक चली बात
content: Bihar Politics बिहार में इस वक्त विकासशील इंसान पार्टी के नेता और पूर्व मंत्री मुकेश सहनी पर सबकी निगाहें टिकी हैं। ऐसी अफवाह है कि वह एनडीए में शामिल हो सकते हैं। इस बीच एक सियासी घटनाक्रम ने इन अफवाहों को और हवा दे दी है। दरअसल बिहार के सीएम नीतीश कुमार के करीबी अशोक चौधरी सहनी से मिलने पहुंच गए। विकासशील इंसान पार्टी के नेता और पूर्व मंत्री मुकेश सहनी के पाला बदलने की चर्चा लगातार चल रही है। राजनीतिक गलियारों में चर्चा है कि मुकेश सहनी महागठबंधन का साथ छोड़ एनडीए में जाने वाले हैं, हालांकि पार्टी की ओर से लगातार ऐसी खबरों को अफवाह बताया जा रहा है। इन्ही चर्चाओं के बीच बुधवार को राज्य सरकार के मंत्री व जदयू नेता अशोक चौधरी सहनी से मिलने उनके ककड़बाग स्थित आवास पर पहुंचे। दोनों नेताओं की मुलाकात करीब 45 मिनट तक चली। दोनों के बीच ताजा राजनीतिक हालात, स्वास्थ्य, परिवार सहित अन्य मुद्दे पर चर्चा हुई। इसके बाद एक बार फिर यह चर्चा जोरों पर है कि सहनी का मन डोल रहा है। हालांकि, वीआईपी के राष्ट्रीय प्रवक्ता देव ज्योति ने सहनी के एनडीए में जाने को अफवाह बताया। उन्होंने कहा कि दोनों नेताओं की यह मुलाकात राजनीति की जगह पारिवारिक है। दोनों नेताओं के बीच व्यक्तिगत संबंध है। इसकी वजह से कंकड़बाग स्थित आवास पर बिहार सरकार के मंत्री पहुंचे थए। सहनी महागठबंधन के साथ है। ऐसे में व्यक्तिगत संबंधों को राजनीति रुप नहीं देना चाहिए। पुलों के रखरखाव के लिए नीति निर्धारण जरूरी : विजय सिन्हा उप मुख्यमंत्री विजय कुमार सिन्हा ने बुधवार को कहा कि राज्य में पुलों के रखरखाव के लिए नीति निर्धारण जरूरी है।...

title: EA FC 24: All FUTTIES Team 1-4 Upgrade SBC rewards
creator: Arka Sarkar
content: The FUTTIES Team 1-4 Upgrade SBC is a worthwhile challenge to complete in Ultimate Team, bringing with it some hefty rewards for the investment required. This special challenge guarantees a FUTTIES card from the current promo, and includes all special items barring Heroes. For a cheap price, you could make a valuable addition to your squad. Let’s take a look at all the possible items you can find by completing the SBC. All EA FC 24 FUTTIES Team 1-4 Upgrade SBC players As mentioned earlier, there are no icons in this challenge, which is slightly disappointing. But you can still get the special cards of Heroes and active footballers from all four FUTTIES teams. My only gripe with the FUTTIES Team 1-4 Upgrade SBC is the fact that it’s not a player pick. মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রীর শিগগিরই বাংলাদেশ সফরের ইচ্ছা প্রকাশ
creator: বাংলা ট্রিবিউন রিপোর্ট
content: মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রী আনোয়ার ইব্রাহিম শিগগিরই বাংলাদেশ সফরের ইচ্ছা প্রকাশ করেছেন। বাংলাদেশের অন্তর্বর্তী সরকারের প্রধান উপদেষ্টা হিসেবে দায়িত্ব পাওয়ায় ড. মুহাম্মদ ইউনূসকে অভিনন্দন জানানোর জন্য বুধবার (১৪ আগস্ট) মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রী ব্যক্তিগতভাবে ফোন করেন এবং এই ইচ্ছা ব্যক্ত করেন। মালয়েশিয়ায় বাংলাদেশ দূতাবাস থেকে পাঠানো এক বিজ্ঞপ্তিতে জানানো হয়, প্রধানমন্ত্রী ইব্রাহিমের সঙ্গে কথোপকথনের সময় ড. ইউনূস সংখ্যালঘুসহ সব বাংলাদেশিদের অধিকার রক্ষায় তার দৃঢ় অঙ্গীকার পুনর্ব্যক্ত করেন। ড. ইউনূস তাকে দুই দেশের মধ্যে ভ্রাতৃত্বপূর্ণ সম্পর্ক আরও জোরদার করতে বাংলাদেশ সফরের আমন্ত্রণ জানান। মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রী শিগগিরই বাংলাদেশ সফরের ইচ্ছা প্রকাশ করেন। আলাপকালে মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রী মালয়েশিয়ার সঙ্গে ড. ইউনূসের দীর্ঘদিনের সুসম্পর্ক গভীর সন্তুষ্টির সঙ্গে স্মরণ করেন। মালয়েশিয়া অন্তর্বর্তী সরকারকে সর্বাত্মক সহায়তা দিতে প্রস্তুত মর্মে তিনি ড. ইউনূসকে আশ্বস্ত করেন। আনোয়ার ইব্রাহিম বলেন, বাংলাদেশকে একটি সমৃদ্ধ ও সত্যিকারের গণতান্ত্রিক রাষ্ট্র হিসেবে গড়ে তোলার প্রচেষ্টায় মালয়েশিয়া বাংলাদেশের অংশীদার হতে প্রস্তুত। অধ্যাপক ইউনূস মালয়েশিয়ার প্রধানমন্ত্রীকে তার ফোনের জন্য ধন্যবাদ জানান এবং তিনি আশা প্রকাশ করেন যে, বাংলাদেশি কর্মীরা মালয়েশিয়ায় কাজের আরও সুযোগ পাবেন। এর আগে, গত ১০ আগস্ট প্রধানমন্ত্রী আনোয়ার ইব্রাহিম তার সোশ্যাল মিডিয়া অ্যাকাউন্টে প্রফেসর ইউনূসের জন্য একটি উষ্ণ অভিনন্দন বার্তা পোস্ট করেন। যেখানে তিনি রবীন্দ্রনাথ ঠাকুরের অমর কবিতা...

title: Smritika War Memorial: Citizens queue up to pay tribute
content: The Smritika War Memorial, in the Lucknow Cantonment, was opened to the public on June 20 in a sober ceremony. Following its opening, although visitors are allowed only between 5:30 PM to 7:00 PM, the footfall has been beyond expectation. With a footfall of about 50-60 visitors on weekdays, and over 100 on weekends, a large number of school students and families turn up to soak in the patriotic sentiment, and learn more about the brave hearts of the country. Volunteer personnel are always deployed on the premises to educate and enlighten visitors on the different army men immortalised at the memorial. The Smritika War memorial features all 21 Param Vir Chakra awardees and the 3 Ashok Chakra awardees of Uttar Pradesh, namely, Major Bhukant Mishra, who was martyred in Operation Blue Star on June 6 in 1984, Lt Col Harsh Uday Singh Gaur, who sacrificed his life during Operation Rakshak on November 29 in 1994, and Naik Neeraj Kumar Singh, who also was martyred in Operation Rakshak on August 24, 2014. Defence spokesperson Shantanu Pratap Singh said that the response from visitors has been overwhelming. “People have really appreciated the maintenance of the war memorial, and have expressed that the opportunity to lay flowers at the war memorial is one they particularly value.”

title: صندوق حمایت از پیشکسوتان فوتبال افتتاح می‌شود
content: به گزارش و به نقل از سایت سمی فدراسیون فوتبال، مراسم اختتامیه رقابت‌های جام یونس شکوری امروز با حضور مهدی تاج رئیس فدراسیون فوتبال برگزار شد. تاج ضمن اهدای جوایز تیم‌های منتخب خطاب به جامعه پیشکسوتان فوتبال گفت: ستاره‌های واقعی فوتبال کشور پیشکسوتان هستند. امیدوارم روح مرحوم شکوری قرین رحمت الهی باشد. خودم چند دوره در این جام شرکت کردم و اکنون خوشحالم بار دیگر در جمع هستم تا افتخارهای فوتبال را ببینم. رئیس فدراسیون فوتبال خبر از تأسیس صندوق پیشکسوتان فوتبال کشور داد و گفت|: با پیشنهاد آقایان قلعه نویی و تاج تصمیم گرفتیم صندوق حمایت از پیشکسوتان فوتبال را ایجاد کنیم تا بخش بسیار اندکی از زحمات این قشر محترم فوتبال را داده باشیم. خبری که با تشویق یکصدای پیشکسوتان حاضر در مراسم همراه بود تا آنها مهر تأیید خود را اینگونه روی این اقدام جدید فدراسیون فوتبال بزنند.

title: Rapper sentenced after using stolen payment info to buy private jets and luxury hotels
content: A Chicago-based rapper was sentenced in a federal court in Springfield Wednesday morning after he used information to steal more $100,000 to buy private jet charters and luxury hotels, federal authorities said. Joseph Williams, 32, of University Park, Ill. — also known as Joe Rodeo,” “Rockstar Rodie,” or “Rodeo,” — was sentenced to three years of probation after he pleaded guilty to one count of conspiracy to commit wire fraud in March, acting U.S. Attorney Joshua S. Levy said in a statement. Williams was indicted by a federal grand jury in December 2020 with five co-defendants, including rap promoter Antonio Strong, — also known as “T-Glo” — rapper Herbert Wright — “G Herbo” and Demario Sorrells — “Jonte” and “Johntay,” Levy added. title: В Пермском крае ожидается потепление с 19 августа
creator: RT на русском
content: В Пермском центре по гидрометеорологии и мониторингу окружающей среды рассказали о погоде в регионе в ближайшие дни. Об этом сообщает URA.RU. «С 19 августа ожидается устойчивое потепление и прекращение осадков», — заявили синоптики. До следующей недели погода будет по-прежнему прохладной и дождливой. Так, 15 августа пройдут кратковременные дожди, вероятны слабые грозы. Ранее главный синоптик Уральского гидрометцентра Галина Шепоренко рассказала о погоде в Екатеринбурге на День города.

title: Metro sales rise as Canadians turn to discount brands amid higher cost of living
creator: Yahoo Finance Canada
content: Metro Inc. ( ) sales grew 3.5 per cent in the third quarter of the year, fuelled by higher traffic and sales at its discount banners, as Canadian consumers continue to seek savings amid higher cost of living. "Consumers are looking for value. They're participating in promotions more. They're trading down, especially in meat," Metro chief financial officer François Thibault said on a conference call with analysts on Wednesday following the release of third-quarter results. Metro saw total sales increase from $6.43 billion last year to $6.65 billion in the third quarter ended July 6. It reported an adjusted profit of $305 million, down from $314.8 million during the same period last year. Same-store sales, a key metric in the retail industry that excludes sales at newly opened stores, were also up 2.4 per cent. Over the last three years, same-store sales have climbed 12 per cent. "Our discount banners continued to fuel this growth, on top of high (comparables) in discount last year," Metro CEO Eric La Flèche said on the call, noting that the company opened six Super C discount stores so far this year. Two of those openings were store conversions, where the company changes the stores from a conventional brand like Metro to a discount brand like Super C. The shift to discount among consumers has been an ongoing trend in Canada, prompting the country's largest grocery retailers...

title: Брат Доннаруммы перешёл в "Торино"
Le Paris Saint-Germain va perdre Joane Gadou, espoir de son centre de formation
content: Pas envie d’être traîné dans la Gadou. Annoncé depuis plusieurs années comme un défenseur prometteur du PSG, Joane Gadou va quitter le club de la capitale dans les prochains jours. D’après RMC Sport, Paris discute bien avec le défenseur pour lui faire signer un premier contrat professionnel, mais le joueur né en 2007 et sous contrat jusqu’en juin 2025 estime qu’il n’existe à ce jour pas de projet concret pour l’envoyer prochainement en équipe première. Les différentes parties négocient actuellement pour régler son départ. Le nom de son futur club n’a toujours pas fuité, bien que certaines sources parlent d’intérêt de clubs allemands et anglais. Le récent recrutement de William Pacho pour 45 millions d’euros aurait définitivement convaincu Gadou de quitter son club formateur. En début d’année, le jeune joueur avait été convoqué pour la première fois en équipe première ; le titi a fait trois apparitions sur le banc parisien en matchs officiels, sans jamais entrer en jeu. Il a tout de même pris part à la préparation estivale en disputant une partie du match face à Sturm Graz (2-2), mais n’avait pas été reconduit dans le groupe lors du match suivant face à Leipzig (1-1). Pas grave, le PSG le récupérera pour 70 millions d’euros dans quelques années.

Hope Utilities Implements Lucasys Tax Fixed Asset Solution
creator: Globe Newswire
content: ATLANTA, Aug. 14, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Hope Utilities , a leading provider of US natural gas and water distribution services, has completed a strategic engagement with software and consulting firm Lucasys to implement its advanced tax fixed asset solution, Lucasys Tax. The pivotal initiative is part of Hope Utilities' ongoing commitment to leveraging advanced technologies to optimize operational efficiency and accuracy in financial reporting. The collaboration was driven by Hope Utilities' decision to pursue a robust tax fixed asset software solution to facilitate their evolving requirements as their utility network expands to new markets. The implementation process included the conversion and standardization of data resulting from several recent acquisitions by Hope Utilities, including Peoples Gas in 2023. "We are honored to support Hope Utilities in their strategic journey toward enhancing operational efficiency and financial accuracy. This successful implementation of Lucasys Tax is a testament to the power of collaboration and innovation in meeting the complex challenges of today's utility industry. We look forward to continuing our partnership with Hope Utilities as they lead the way in adopting advanced technologies to serve their customers more effectively." -Vadim Lantukh, Chief Executive Officer at Lucasys Leveraging their deep domain expertise in utilities,...

Russia hastily builds trenches in Kursk
creator: The Telegraph
content: as the Kremlin began building trenches far behind the front lines in a sign of deepening concern about the potential extent of the invasion. Oleksander Syrsky, Ukraine’s army chief, said that his forces had into the , capturing 100 more prisoners of war. Kyiv’s troops filmed themselves inside a captured Russian command point, as Moscow struggled to halt the . “The search for and destruction of the enemy in the town of Sudzha has been completed,” Mr Syrsky said, referring to the Ukrainian-controlled home of Russia’s last gas terminal for shipments to Europe. Ukrainian state television broadcast a report showing soldiers pulling down the Russian flag from the city’s three-storey administrative building as they shouted: “Glory to Ukraine!” Igor Klymenko, the interior minister, said Ukraine would create a “buffer zone” in Kursk to prevent Russian cross-border strikes. Volodymyr Zelensky, Ukraine’s president, warned that his drone arsenal was not enough to protect his troops, in an appeal for the UK and Western allies to drop limits on long-range missile strikes inside Russia. “There are things you can’t do with drones alone. Unfortunately. Another weapon is needed - a missile weapon,” he wrote last night on Telegram. “The bolder the partners’ decisions, the less Putin can do,” he added. title: Ex-NBA player Royce White wins GOP Senate primary in Minnesota
creator: ESPN
content: Conservative populist and former NBA player Royce White defeated Navy veteran Joe Fraser in Minnesota's primary election for the Republican nomination on Tuesday and will challenge Democratic Sen. Amy Klobuchar in November. White was a first-round pick by the Houston Rockets in 2012 but never played for the team after disclosing mental health issues and saying he did not want to fly to road games with the team. He signed multiple 10-day contacts with the Sacramento Kings in 2013, playing in three games, but was eventually let go before playing overseas for several years. The 33-year-old White, who was an outspoken advocate for mental health awareness in sports, also considered a future in mixed martial arts but lost his only professional fight in 2021. White has made a number of social media comments that have been denounced as derogatory. White, who ran and lost in the GOP primary for a U.S. House seat in 2022, argues that, as a Black candidate, he can broaden the party's base by appealing to voters of color in the Minneapolis-St. Paul area and others disillusioned with establishment politics. He is expected to be a big underdog to Klobuchar, who has served as a senator since 2007. The Associated Press contrinuted to this report.

title: Kourtney Kardashian Shows Off Her Legs in Feathered Matching Set
creator: Grace Riley
content: Kourtney Kardashian. Courtesy of Kourtney Kardashian/Instagram Kourtney Kardashian is fierce in feathers. Kardashian, 45, took to Instagram on Tuesday, August 13, to show off a frilly outfit she rocked while posing for her wellness gummy brand, Lemme. Her ensemble featured a bubblegum pink knit top embellished with lots of feathers and a black bow at her neck. She paired the garment with matching underwear and platform heels complete with a sparkly silver sole and cushioned strap. For glam, Kardashian donned a full beat including shimmery pink eyeshadow on her lids, a plum color blended into her crease, long lashes, rosy cheeks and lined pink lips. Her brunette hair was teased into a voluminous coiffure. Elsewhere in her campaign, Kardashian slayed in a fuzzy pastel pink sweater featuring a white lace collar and sparkly buttons. She completed her getup with black-and-whtie polka dot bottoms. “A little bts from my @lemme glow lollipop campaign shoot,” Kardashian captioned the post. Famous friends were quick to praise Kardashian in the comments section. “Loves it!😍🎀💞,” Paris Hilton gushed, as celebrity hairstylist Dimitris Giannetos added, “Miss u. A stunner.” This isn’t the first time Kardashian has stunned in feathers. Last month, she rocked a white plume jacket while attending husband Travis Barker ’s Blink-182 concert . Mercato : Rennes et Al-Duhail proches d'un accord pour Benjamin Bourigeaud
creator: Matteo Amghar
content: C'est l'un des chouchous du public rennais qui s'apprête à quitter la Bretagne. À 30 ans, Benjamin Bourigeaud devrait s'engager rapidement avec Al-Duhail. C'est le souhaite indéfectible du Français depuis plusieurs semaines. Rennes et le club qatarien sont quasiment tombés d'accord sur un transfert qui sera inférieur à 10 M€. Cette somme était espérée par le Stade Rennais qui laissera partir son joueur pour service rendu. Le milieu (310 matches avec la formation bretonne) était arrivé de Lens à l'été 2017. Il est depuis devenu l'un des joueurs les plus appréciés de l'histoire du club.

Independence Day Story: देश की आजादी के बाद भी राष्ट्रध्वज फहराना था गुनाह, रायसेन में चार युवकों पर चली थी अधाधुंध गोलियां
content: HighLights चेतन राय, नवदुनिया रायसेन। हमारे देश को अंग्रेजी शासन से भले ही 15 अगस्त 1947 को आजादी मिल गई थी, लेकिन रायसेन 1949 में आजाद भारत का हिस्सा बना था। दरअसल तीन साल तक भोपाल रियासत के नवाब अलग देश बनाने अथवा पाकिस्तान में विलय पर विचार करते रहे। उसी रियासत का हिस्सा रायसेन भी तीन साल तक आजाद भारत में शामिल नहीं हो पाया। इसके बाद जिले में एक अलग आजादी की लड़ाई शुरू हुई, जिसे विलीनीकरण आंदोलन कहा जाता है। सैकड़ों नौजवानों ने भोपाल रियासत के नवाब की यातनाएं झेलीं, कई ने बलिदान दिया, तब जाकर लोगों को नवाबी शासन से आजादी मिली और रायसेन स्वतंत्र भारत के मध्यभारत प्रांत का हिस्सा बना। भोपाल के नवाब ने नहीं किया विलय 15 अगस्त 1947 को जब भारत स्वतंत्र हुआ था, उस समय भोपाल के नवाब हमीदुल्लाह खां ने भोपाल राज्य को स्वतंत्र रखने का निर्णय लिया। इस निर्णय से भोपाल रायसेन सहित भोपाल रियासत के सभी रहवासी देश आजाद होने के बाद भी आजाद नहीं हुए थे। राष्ट्रध्वज तिरंगा फहराना था गुनाह 15 अगस्त 1947 से लगातार 1 जून 1949 तक यानी 659 दिन भोपाल पर नवाब का शासन रहा। यहां भारत का राष्ट्रध्वज तिरंगा फहराना गुनाह माना जाता था। भोपाल नवाब हमीदुल्ला खां इसे स्वतंत्र रियासत के रूप में रखना चाहते थे। साथ ही हैदराबाद निजाम उन्हें पाकिस्तान में विलय के लिए प्रेरित कर रहे थे, जो कि भौगोलिक दृष्टि से असंभव था। विलीनीकरण न होने से जनता में आक्रोश आजादी के इतने समय बाद भी भोपाल रियासत का विलय न होने से जनता में भारी आक्रोश था, जो विलीनीकरण आंदोलन में परिवर्तित हो गया, जिसने आगे जाकर उग्र रूप ले लिया। आजादी...

title: ERS fecha estabelecimento de medicina dentária em Almada por colocar saúde e segurança dos utentes em risco
content: A Entidade Reguladora da Saúde (ERS), no âmbito das suas competências e de forma a garantir o direito de acesso dos utentes à prestação de cuidados de saúde adequados, de qualidade e com segurança e verificar o cumprimento dos requisitos de funcionamento em vigor, encetou ações de fiscalização no concelho de Almada, distrito de Setúbal. Num comunicado enviado às redações, a organização explicou que, através da observação efetuada em diversos locais e provas recolhidas, foi possível apurar que num desses espaços, onde era desenvolvida atividade de medicina dentária, sucediam-se as seguintes situações: Acresce que, no decorrer desta ação de fiscalização, verificou-se que no estabelecimento eram praticados atos de medicina dentária por uma pessoa não habilitada ao respetivo exercício. Perante os factos apurados, e dado o perigo iminente para a saúde e segurança dos utentes, a ERS decretou uma medida cautelar de suspensão imediata da atividade num dos estabelecimentos fiscalizados. Para tal, a organização fundamentou o incumprimento dos requisitos mínimos relativos à organização e funcionamento das clínicas e dos consultórios dentários, assim como no exercício não habilitado de cuidados de saúde na área da medicina dentária. A medida cautelar será declarada extinta quando for comprovada a eliminação do perigo para a saúde e...
