title: Cómo ayudar al medio ambiente en este regreso a clases
creator: El Universo
content: En el régimen Sierra, los más pequeños de la casa se empiezan a alistar para iniciar bien el año lectivo. Para afrontarlo de la mejor manera, hay una gran variedad de opciones que ayudarán no solo a economizar, sino también a darle un respiro a nuestro planeta. Para ello, la abogada ambientalista y líder de opinión Verónica Arias se enfoca en seis aspectos clave: materiales escolares, transporte, alimentación, uniformes y ropa, energía y recursos, educación y conciencia. Sin duda, cuando los jóvenes vuelvan a las aulas los necesitarán. La activista recomienda optar por utilizar materiales reciclados como cuadernos, papel y carpetas hechas de papel reciclado. Asimismo, aconseja utilizar lápices, bolígrafos y otros utensilios de escritura reciclables o fabricados con materiales reciclados. En cuanto a la reutilización de materiales, Arias sugiere reutilizar mochilas, estuches y otros suministros de años anteriores, pero solo si están en buen estado. Intercambiar libros y materiales escolares con amigos o a través de programas de intercambio también son dos opciones válidas. Las compras al granel en empaques sostenibles también son muy viables. “Recomiendo adquirir suministros en grandes cantidades para reducir el embalaje y elegir productos con empaques reciclables o biodegradables”, menciona Arias. Con el fin de promover el transporte sostenible, se...

title: La DANA provoca el caos en Baleares: vuelos cancelados, barcos varados y numerosas incidencias
La DANA provoca el caos en Baleares: vuelos cancelados, barcos varados y numerosas incidencias
creator: NTM/Agencias
content: La DANA que está atravesando Baleares este miércoles ha obligado por seguridad a la cancelación de 53 vuelos en sus tres aeropuertos : 44 en el de Palma, 4 en Ibiza y 5 en Menorca, así como retrasos generalizados en las salidas y llegadas, han informado a EFE fuentes de Aena. En el caso del Aeropuerto de Palma de Mallorca han sido cancelados 22 aterrizajes y 22 despegues , que han afectado principalmente a conexiones internacionales como Múnich, Zúrich, Colonia, Ginebra, Hamburgo, Nuremberg, Hannover, Bolonia, Nierdenhein, Baden Baden o Bremen. Además, un vuelo Birmingham-Palma ha sido desviado al aeropuerto de Menorca. En Ibiza se han clausurado dos salidas hacia Palma y Niza y dos llegadas previstas desde Palma y Valencia. Otro vuelo procedente de Manchester ha sido desviado a Alicante. Finalmente, en Menorca el mal tiempo ha cancelado 2 salidas (Palma y Valencia) y 3 llegadas (Palma, Barcelona y Valencia). En zonas como Santa Maria, Puerto de Sóller, Son Bonet y Cabrera se han registrado rachas de viento de más de 90 kilómetros por hora en una tormenta que ha llegado a Mallorca sobre las 11.00 horas y que a las 14.00 horas continúa afectando el interior, norte y oeste de la isla. ¿Lo de Formentera qué ha sido? pic.twitter.com/gaTlYNpzm0 Al menos 40 incidentes Las fuertes lluvias han dejado por ahora (14:30 horas) unos 40 incidentes, sobre todo costeros, por lo...

title: Lattice Semiconductor: Still Requires A Leap Of Faith
content: Monty Rakusen In February, I believed that investors in Lattice Semiconductor Corporation ( NASDAQ: LSCC ) were required to take a leap of faith. This came after shares had seen a decent run in the post-pandemic era, driven by the AI hype, hyping the role which the company and its products can play. With these promises not showing up in the reported results, with near-term results expected to cool off, expectations were on the rise. This setup made it easy for disappointments to arise, as I was not yet willing to get involved with the shares. Trading 40% lower half a year further, expectations are still demanding as the anticipated improvements did not come through, in fact, the opposite is the case. While improvements are still anticipated, the extent and timing of these require a continued real leap of faith. Lattice - Lower Power Programmable Leader Lattice describes itself as a so-called lower programmable leader. This allows for securing control, flexible connectivity and low-power compute acceleration. About 60% of these sales are tied to serving industrial and automotive markets, complemented by communication & computing markets, and to a far smaller extent consumer segment. With global operations, the company serves a broad range of blue-chip customers. These products focus on small-size, low-power, high-security, reliance, and ease-of-use products. Classified under...

creator: Grace Nole Alcántara
content: El entrenador Jorge Fossati está a punto de afrontar uno de sus más grandes retos al mando de la selección peruana . Falta menos de un mes para el reinicio de las Eliminatorias Sudamericanas 2026 y ya empezó a trabajar en ello. El uruguayo está armando el plan para enfrentar a Colombia y Ecuador en setiembre. El DT deberá revertir el mal momento que vive la ‘blanquirroja’ en las clasificatorias : está en la última posición con dos puntos y no ha celebrado ningún triunfo hasta el momento. El arranque de la ‘bicolor’ no ha sido el mejor y tiene un panorama complicado para clasificar al Mundial de Canadá, Estados Unidos y México 2026. Los malos resultados del ‘equipo de todos’ provocó la salida del estratega peruano, Juan Reynoso , y acaba de empezar una nueva era con Fossati al mando. El debut oficial del charrúa fue en la Copa América 2024 y lamentablemente no salieron las cosas como las planeó: quedó eliminado en fase de grupos. El ambiente entorno a Perú no es el mejor tras su decepcionante participación en Estados Unidos, y las críticas apuntan al popular ‘Nono’ por algunas decisiones polémicas como la inclusión de Christian Cueva a la nómina para el torneo Conmebol sin tener ritmo futbolístico, ni equipo. ¿Cuándo sale la lista de convocados de Perú? title: Quando será o sorteio da Champions League?
creator: LANCE!
content: A Champions League está cada vez mais perto de começar. Repleta de novidades, o maior torneio entre clubes europeus tem sorteio marcado e transmitido para o dia 29 de agosto, e será a primeira vez que o evento será desenvolvido por um software. O sistema tecnológico trabalhará com quatro potes e nove clubes em cada um, classificados com base no coeficiente do ranking da Uefa. Segundo a entidade do futebol europeu, o novo método permitirá reduzir significativamente o diferencial entre equipes com melhor e pior pontuação no ranking, apresentando uma simulação em que essa redução atingiu perto de 50%. Quando um time é sorteado, o computador define instantaneamente os rivais que a equipe terá pela frente, sendo oito adversários (dois de cada pote), com quatro jogos fora e o mesmo número em casa. A primeira rodada do novo formato da competição, que será composta pela primeira vez com 36 times, sendo 29 que confirmaram vaga de forma direta e outros sete oriundos dos playoffs, está programada para os dias 17 e 19 de setembro. Cada time será colocado em 'potes' com outros oito clubes. Serão nove confrontos ao todo, contra dois integrantes de cada grupo (ida e volta) que valem para a classificação geral. Ao final da fase, os oito primeiros times se classificam para as oitavas do mata-mata de forma direta. Da posição 9 até 24, os times se enfrentarão em...

'Taylor Swift Wembley concert-goers have nothing to fear after Vienna terror plot'
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Lucy Thornton)
content: Music lovers heading to Wembley for Taylor Swift ’s return should not be concerned for their safety, a former top police officer believes. New details have emerged about plans to keep half a million fans from harm over the five shows. After a foiled terror plot targeting her Vienna gigs and the Southport stabbings at a Taylor-themed dance party, security is being beefed up. And former Met Police Detective Chief Inspector Peter Kirkham told the Mirror : “It’s safer than ever because the recent events will have focused minds and led to things being double and treble-checked.” He believes intelligence will have been “raked over” and CCTV teams bolstered, while the Met insist there is “nothing to indicate” the Austria plot will affect the London shows. Mr Kirkham thinks state-of-the-art CCTV that can detect abandoned parcels could be in use this week. But he added: “It’s as safe as anything else we do in this life, there is no particular reason to fear here. There is always going to be a risk where large numbers of people gather. It’s impossible to be 100 per cent but generally in the UK we’re not far off that.” Mr Kirkham believes lessons have been learned since the Manchester Arena suicide bombing in 2017. He said: “After Manchester, most operators of venues realised it was a risk they couldn’t take and they have sharpened up what they have been doing. It is now pretty good in...

content: Podijeli : Guliver Image Nogometaši Astane izborili su plasman u play-off rundu Konferencijske lige nakon što su obje utakmice 3. pretkola pobijedili rumunjski Corvinul Hunedoara. Kazahstanci su u prvom susretu na gostovanju slavili sa 2-1, a u srijedu su pred svojim navijačima deklasirala rumunjski sastav sa čak 6-1. Sjajnu predstavu pružio je hrvatski nogometaš Marin Tomasov koji je postigao dva gola, u 57. minuti je zabio za 2-0, a u 76. za 5-0 kada mu je asistirao Karlo Bartolec. Dva gola je postigao i Charles Geoffrey (13, 68), a među strijelce su se upisali i Nazmi Gripshi (73) i Elkhan Astanov (84). Za goste je zabio Mihai Velisar (78). omasov je za Astanu igrao cijeli susret, baš kao i Bartolec, te vratar Josip Čondrić, dok je Branimir Kalaica igrao od 49. minute. Podsjetimo u 2. pretkolu Europske lige Corvinul je ispao od Rijeke preselivši u Konferencijsku ligu gdje je sada završio svoju europsku priču. title: Where Data-Driven Decision-Making Can Go Wrong
creator: Michael Luca; Amy C. Edmondson
content: When managers are presented with internal data or an external study, all too often they either automatically accept its accuracy and relevance to their business or dismiss it out of hand. Leaders mistakenly conflate causation with correlation, underestimate the importance of sample size, focus on the wrong outcomes, misjudge generalizability, or overweight a specific result. Leaders should ask probing questions about the evidence in a rigorous discussion about its usefulness. They should create a psychologically safe environment so that participants will feel comfortable offering diverse points of view. the hourly pay of your company’s warehouse employees. For several years it has automatically been increased by small amounts to keep up with inflation. Citing a study of a large company that found that higher pay improved productivity so much that it boosted profits, someone on your team advocates for a different approach: a substantial raise of $2 an hour for all workers in the warehouse. What would you do?

title: Why Leadership Teams Fail
creator: Thomas Keil; Marianna Zangrillo
content: and executives often overlook a critical factor in organizational success: the health of their leadership team. That’s a big problem, because a dysfunctional team can become a serious drag on strategy execution and erode morale. Not only that, the health of a senior team can make or break a CEO’s tenure.

title: Tom Brady on the Art of Leading Teammates
creator: Tom Brady; Nitin Nohria
content: tend to focus on individual success. We obsess about who is the “greatest of all time,” who is most responsible for a win, or what players or coaches a team might add next season to become even better.

title: There Really Is a “Sales Gene”
creator: Juan Martinez
content: MIT Sloan School of Management’s and three co-researchers—Shiyang Gong (Beijing Normal University), Qian Li (Beijing Foreign Studies University), and Song Su (Beijing Normal University)—explored the relationship between genetics and sales performance. They studied 117 salespeople at an Asian telemarketing company over the course of 13 months. They cross-referenced employee DNA with performance metrics, such as revenue produced, the ability to identify selling opportunities, and effort. The conclusion: There really is a “sales gene.”

title: New Rules for Teamwork
creator: Angus Dawson; Katy George
content: Traditional thinking about teamwork has often been based on intuition and observation. But that approach isn’t well suited to today’s workplace, which demands that teams adapt to constant change and disruption. New ideas are emerging, some based on experience, some guided by new practices, some made up on the fly. But none of this has yet cohered into a systematic approach to improving how teams work. The authors set out a new, systematic approach to teamwork that relies on continuous, real-time testing, learning, analysis, adaptation, and improvement. composed of people with similar skills working in the same place. Their efforts were based on the idea that by working together in a well-managed process, they could deliver replicable results. They primarily operated with efficiency and effectiveness but would frequently encounter obstacles, such as internal siloes or bureaucratic processes, that hindered their overall performance. In response, they began to innovate how they worked together, establishing the groundwork for a more flexible, cross-functional approach to their rituals and practices. From the Skunk Works engineers of the 1950s to Brazilian football in the 1960s to the aviation and surgical collaborations that delivered stunning improvements in the 1990s and early 2000s, organizations have continually searched for ways to enhance their teams’ effectiveness.

title: Teamwork at the Top
creator: Gregory LeStage; Sara Nilsson DeHanas; Pete Gerend

title: When It Comes to Influencers, Smaller Can Be Better
content: You wouldn’t be in the minority if your impression of influencer marketing is A-list celebrities hawking products they’d never use. But the industry isn’t as homogeneous as you might think: For every Kim Kardashian, thousands of lesser-known influencers are having a dramatic impact on direct-to-consumer (DTC) marketing.

title: Qué es y para qué sirve una lista de difusión en WhatsApp
content: Las listas de difusión en WhatsApp son una herramienta muy útil, pero muchas veces pasan desapercibidas entre las opciones más conocidas de la aplicación, como los o los chats individuales. Te explico y para qué puedes utilizarla, es ideal en muchos escenarios diferentes. ¿Qué es una lista de difusión? Se trata de una función que te permite enviar un mismo mensaje a varias personas al mismo tiempo, ¿El resultado? Puedes comunicarte con muchas personas de manera directa, sin necesidad de crear un grupo o reenviar el mismo mensaje una y otra vez. Así es cómo puedes crear tu propia lista de difusión y cuáles son las ventajas de usarla. Cómo crear una lista de difusión en WhatsApp Para empezar, En la pantalla principal, donde ves todos tus chats, busca el botón de menú en la parte superior derecha, en Android, los tres puntos verticales. Si utilizas un iPhone, lo verás en el propio menú Ajustes. Al pulsarlo, se desplegará un menú con varias opciones. Entre ellas, encontrarás la opción «Nueva difusión o nueva lista». Esta es la puerta de entrada para crear tu lista de difusión. Una vez que hayas seleccionado «Nueva difusión o nueva lista», se abrirá una lista con todos tus contactos. Aquí es donde eliges a las personas que quieres incluir en tu lista de difusión. , pero ten en cuenta que solo recibirán tu mensaje aquellos que tengan tu número de...

title: پزشکیان: دولت در انتخاب استانداران از مشورت نمایندگان مجلس بهره می‌بَرد
content: به گزارش ایسنا، مسعود پزشکیان رئیس‌جمهوری بعد از ظهر امروز چهارشنبه در دیدار اعضای مجمع نمایندگان کردستان، با تأکید بر ضرورت بازنمایی جایگاه استان کردستان در فرآیند برنامه‌ریزی توسعه کشور، توجه به ظرفیت‌های بالقوه استان و اجرای کارشناسی و غیر سلیقه‌ای سند توسعه با بهره‌گیری از ظرفیت علمی اساتید دانشگاه و نخبگان را از جمله مولفه‌های موثر در توسعه استان برشمرد. رئیس جمهوری بخش گردشگری، صنایع و معادن و کشاورزی را از جمله ظرفیت‌های بالقوه استان عنوان کرد و گفت: بالفعل کردن این ظرفیت‌ها با روش‌های علمی می‌تواند بسیاری از مشکلات استان را حل کند. پزشکیان در ادامه به مزیت‌های جغرافیایی و مرزی استان کردستان به عنوان یکی از ظرفیت‌های بزرگ برای غلبه بر تحریم‌ها اشاره کرد و گفت‌: دولت چهاردهم اعطای اختیارات ویژه به استانداران استان‌های مرزی برای بهره‌مندسازی بیشتر کشور از ظرفیت مرزها را در دستور کار خود دارد. رئیس جمهوری همچنین با بیان اینکه دولت در انتخاب استانداران از مشورت نمایندگان مجلس بهره خواهد برد، افزود: ملاک و معیار ما در تعیین استانداران، توانمندی، شایستگی و تخصص است نه داشتن روابط یا وابستگی‌های جناحی. پیش از سخنان رئیس جمهوری اعضای مجمع نمایندگان کردستان در سخنانی به بیان مهمترین مسائل و مشکلات حوزه‌های انتخابیه خود از جمله تقویت جاده‌های مواصلاتی، جلوگیری از خام‌فروشی محصولات معادن استان، تامین انرژی پایدار، ساماندهی مرزها، ساماندهی اراضی کشاورزی و اشتغال‌زایی پرداختند. انتهای پیام

She's probably best known for her role as C.J. on , but the icon is also an and an outspoken activist for animal rights and environmental causes. Most recently, Anderson has made headlines for her decision to ditch her well-known glam in favor of going makeup-free. last year about keeping things natural and said "You have to challenge beauty sometimes." On going out barefaced, she added: "It's just freedom, it's like a relief." While Anderson may not be doing her signature smokey eye anytime soon, she does seem to have a favorite lip balm in her rotation: . Spotted in one of her from a recent trip to Rome (and according to ), the hydrating lip balm appears to be one of Anderson's go-to's. I have found that simplicity, and accepting all that we are is the key to an effective skincare and beauty routine." Currently, Sonsie only offers three products: a mask, serum and lip balm. title: Brad Pitt and George Clooney rekindle their bond having drifted apart over a wedding snub and Angelina's 'rivalry' with Amal (as new interview features a subtle 'dig' at Jolie)
content: Brad Pitt and George Clooney rekindle their bond having drifted apart over a wedding snub and Angelina's 'rivalry' with Amal (as new interview features a subtle 'dig' at Jolie) Brad Pitt and George Clooney feature in the September issue of GQ READ MORE: Brad Pitt stages GQ photo shoot at the French winery he and Angelina Jolie are battling over in court By Eleanor Dye Published: 18:11, 14 August 2024 | Updated: 19:28, 14 August 2024 e-mail 29 shares 56 View comments They were once one of the film industry's famous friendships after starring in the Ocean's Eleven series together in the noughties and joining each other for numerous playful appearances on the red carpet. But after Brad Pitt failed to show up to George Clooney 's lavish Venetian wedding to Amal Alamuddin in 2014 - despite being relatively close by in Malta - rumours flew that the pair's bromance was no more. Academy Award-winner Pitt, now 60, had even been tipped to be his long-time co-star's best man, making the no-show even more questionable. It was also rumoured that Brad's then-wife, actress Angelina Jolie , disliked Amal and felt that the human rights lawyer was her 'rival'. Although these reports were never confirmed, there certainly seemed to be a distance between the two women and the public-facing friendship between Brad and George has faded from view over the last 10 years. This week however the duo...

title: VELIKA ŠANSA ZA BORAC: Igrače sa Farskih Otoka u Banjoj Luci dočekalo +38 - 'Ovo je ludo'
Why Multibusiness Strategies Fail and How to Make Them Succeed
creator: Bharat N. Anand; David J. Collis
content: Multibusiness enterprises often struggle with crafting effective strategies because their leaders focus too much on the composition of their portfolios and not enough on enhancing the businesses in them. The market capitalization of many diversified enterprises ends up being less than the combined value of their separate businesses. Strategies for adding value fall on a continuum, and leaders need to decide where their enterprises are on it. Each choice involves trade-offs. Successful multibusiness firms understand this and align their structure and management processes with their sources of value creation across the portfolio. corporate organization today. While crafting strategies for them can certainly be hard, the way many leaders go about it is flawed: They focus too much on the composition of their portfolio and too little on how the corporation should add value to the businesses in it. A corporation’s scope determines its strategic potential, but aligning its structure and management processes with its chosen sources of value creation determines the success of its execution.

title: Опожареният дом за възрастни в Банкя е работил нелегално
content: © Обектът в Банкя, в който един човек загина при пожар, работи без лиценз. Това е установено при проверка на Агенцията за качеството на социалните услуги (АКСУ), извършена в края на юни 2024 г. по сигнал на друга администрация, съобщават от Министерство на труда и социалната политика. Поради отказ за предоставяне на информация, проверката е извършена със съдействието на СДВР. При нея е установено, че в обекта пребивават 11 души със здравословни проблеми. От АКСУ веднага са сигнализирали всички компетентни органи, включително МВР и Прокуратурата, за нелегалната дейност на обекта, който не е социална услуга по смисъла на закона. Съгласно нормативните разпоредби Агенцията няма правомощия да спира дейността на фирми, които работят без лиценз. Изпълнителният директор на Агенцията за социално подпомагане (АСП) Веселин Кожухаров заедно с експерти бе на място, за да окаже съдействие за пренасочване на обитателите към подходящи социални услуги. Три жени ще бъдат настанени в два дома за стари хора, делегирана от държавата дейност. Министерството на труда и социалната политика напомня, че за да бъде гарантирано в най-голяма степен качеството на социалните услуги и здравето и безопасността на потребителите, частните доставчици подлежат на лицензиране. Списъкът с лицензираните доставчици е достъпен на сайта на АКСУ. Списъкът със социалните услуги, делегирани от държавата дейност,...

Ruling that bounced Kennedy from New York ballot could challenge him in other states
creator: Michael Hill And Sean Murphy, The Associated Press

title: Ruling that bounced Kennedy from New York ballot could challenge him in other states
creator: News Staff
content: ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) — Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s independent presidential campaign suffered a blow this week when a judge in New York invalidated his petition to put his name on the state ballot, a ruling that could potentially create problems for the candidate as he faces challenges elsewhere. Kennedy’s attorneys filed an appeal Wednesday to a ruling this week from Justice Christina Ryba, who said the residence listed on his nominating petitions was a “sham” address he used to maintain his voter registration and to further his political aspirations. The judge ruled in favor of the challengers, who argued Kennedy’s actual residence was the home in Los Angeles he shares with his wife, the “Curb Your Enthusiasm” actor Cheryl Hines. New York is just one of more than a half-dozen states where challenges have been made to Kennedy’s petitions from Democrats and their allies. Some of the challenges allege he falsely listed the same New York address that was the subject of litigation in that state, or that there were problems with petition signatures. In Pennsylvania, challengers contend that papers filed by Kennedy list an incorrect address in New York and that he and his running mate demonstrated “at best, a fundamental disregard” of state law and the process by which signatures are gathered. An attorney for Kennedy said the challenge contained specious allegations. A court will conduct...

content: H δημοσίευσε δύο σέξι στιγμιότυπα στα social media. Λίγες μέρες μετά την κυκλοφορία του κομματιού της, με τίτλο «Lifetimes», η τραγουδίστρια κάνει διακοπές με τον Ορλάντο Μπλουμ. Πριν λίγες ώρες μάλιστα, μοιράστηκαν ένα βίντεο, στο οποίο φαίνονται να κάνουν ελεύθερη πτώση στη θάλασσα από ένα ελικόπτερο. Τώρα, η Κέιτι Πέρι έκανε μια νέα ανάρτηση στον προσωπικό της λογαριασμό στο Instagram, στην οποία ποζάρει μόνη της. Η σταρ φωτογραφήθηκε φορώντας ένα χρυσό φόρεμα με βαθύ ντεκολτέ, σε ένα σκάφος με φόντο το γαλάζιο της θάλασσας.

title: La nueva app de BMW trata de convencer a dueños de autos de gasolina, que los autos eléctricos funcionarán mejor para ellos
creator: jorge@techradar.mx (Jorge Covarrubias)
content: El Grupo BMW, que comprende las marcas BMW y Mini, acaba de lanzar la última actualización de la aplicación para smartphones de sus socios, con una funcionalidad adicional que tiene como objetivo convencer a los propietarios de vehículos de gasolina y diésel de que los vehículos eléctricos funcionarán para ellos. La última herramienta de BMW, denominada función de análisis de vehículos eléctricos, está diseñada para simular qué tan bien se adaptaría un BMW eléctrico a los hábitos de conducción habituales del propietario actual y a su estilo de vida en general. Lo único que tiene que hacer el usuario es registrar la aplicación con su vehículo con motor de combustión, siempre que tenga el sistema operativo BMW 7 o posterior, y luego realizar al menos 200 viajes, cubriendo una distancia total de al menos 2.000 kilómetros (aproximadamente 1.250 millas). Después de seleccionar una de las alternativas de vehículos eléctricos de BMW como vehículo de comparación, la aplicación analizará estos números y determinará cuántos de esos viajes podrían haberse completado fácilmente con una sola carga. El fabricante de automóviles alemán afirma que la función está diseñada para "combatir la ansiedad por la autonomía y las preocupaciones sobre la practicidad diaria de los vehículos totalmente eléctricos". La aplicación no solo sugerirá vehículos...

title: Experiencias de turismo termal con descuento en la provincia de Pontevedra: plazos y requisitos
content: La Diputación de Pontevedra lanza este viernes, día 16 de agosto, las inscripciones para disfrutar de una experiencia de turismo termal en la provincia a un precio especial. El programa +Benestar, dotado con más de 220.000 euros, ofertará un total de 2.127 plazas subvencionadas en alojamientos como el Talaso Hotel Louxo La Toja o el Balneario de Mondariz. ¿Pero qué incluye la iniciativa? Las personas que formen parte de +Benestar podrán pasar una estancia de seis días y cinco noches en uno de los establecimientos asociados y con pensión completa . Las opciones son el Gran Talaso Hotel Sanxenxo, el Balenario de Mondariz, Hotel Carlos I Silgar, Talaso Hotel Louxo La Toja, Hotel Spa Norat Torre do Deza, Hotel Spa Galatea y el Hotel Nuevo Astur Spa. Los precios de estas experiencias subvencionadas por el programa de la Diputación oscilarán entre los 330 y los 425 euros, en función del establecimiento, e incluyen el traslado de ida y vuelta en autobús desde los ayuntamientos de Vigo o Pontevedra y el uso del spa o balneario durante un mínimo de dos horas al día. Podrán beneficiarse de esta iniciativa todas aquellas personas empadronadas en la provincia de Pontevedra que tengan 55 años o más. En el caso de no tener esa edad, los otros criterios son contar con una discapacidad superior al 65% , ser pensionista o tener acreditado un respiro familiar. De todas las...

title: ചീഫ്​ ജസ്റ്റിസ്​ ഡി.വൈ. ചന്ദ്രചൂഡ്​ വെള്ളിയാഴ്ച കൊച്ചിയിൽ
creator: മാധ്യമം ലേഖകൻ
content: കൊച്ചി: സുപ്രീംകോടതി ചീഫ്​ ജസ്റ്റിസ്​ ഡി.വൈ. ചന്ദ്രചൂഡ്​ വെള്ളിയാഴ്ച ഹൈകോടതിയിലെത്തും. ഹൈകോടതിയിലെ മോഡൽ ഡിജിറ്റൽ കോർട്ട്​ റൂം, ഡിജിറ്റൽ ലൈബ്രറി ആൻഡ് റിസർച് സെന്‍റർ, ജുഡീഷ്യൽ അക്കാദമിയിലെ ലേണിങ്​ മാനേജ്‌മെന്‍റ്​ സിസ്റ്റം, കൊല്ലത്ത് നെഗോഷ്യബിൾ ഇൻസ്ട്രുമെന്‍റ്​ ആക്ട് പ്രകാരമുള്ള കേസുകൾ പരിഗണിക്കുന്ന ഡിജിറ്റൽ കോടതി തുടങ്ങിയവയുടെയും റാം മോഹൻ പാലസ് പുനരുദ്ധാരണ പദ്ധതിയുടെയും ഉദ്ഘാടനത്തിനാണ്​ ചീഫ്​ ജസ്റ്റിസ്​ എത്തുന്നത്​. വൈകീട്ട്​ 3.45ന് ​ഹൈകോടതി ഓഡിറ്റോറിയത്തിൽ നടക്കുന്ന ചടങ്ങിൽ മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി പിണറായി വിജയൻ മുഖ്യ പ്രഭാഷണം നടത്തും. പട്ടികജാതി -വർഗ പീഡന നിരോധന നിയമപ്രകാരമുള്ള കേസുകൾ പരിഗണിക്കാൻ എറണാകുളത്ത് തുടങ്ങുന്ന പ്രത്യേക കോടതിയുടെയും ബഡ്​സ്​ ആക്ട് പ്രകാരമുള്ള കേസുകൾ പരിഗണിക്കാൻ ആലപ്പുഴയിൽ തുടങ്ങുന്ന പ്രത്യേക കോടതിയുടെയും ഉദ്ഘാടനം മുഖ്യമന്ത്രി നിർവഹിക്കും. ഹൈകോടതി ആക്ടിങ്​ ചീഫ് ജസ്റ്റിസ് എ. മുഹമ്മദ് മുഷ്താഖ് അധ്യക്ഷത വഹിക്കും.

title: Keto diet treatment can starve cancer cells, study claims
creator: Ella Pickover
content: Pancreatic cancer cells can “starve” thanks to a combination of a cancer drug and a keto diet , an early study has suggested. Researchers said that their new study points to a “vulnerability” which could potentially lead to a new treatment for the most deadly common cancer. Only around 5% of people with the disease survive for a decade after diagnosis. Pancreatic Cancer UK urged patients not to make any radical changes to their diets, saying that the study was still in the early stages and the drug has not yet been tested in humans with pancreatic cancer. A keto diet is a low-carb, high-fat plan designed to put your body in the optimum metabolic state for fat-burning, known as ketosis. A conventional keto diet is rich in high-quality meats, yoghurts and cheeses. Researchers initially set out to examine how the body manages to support itself on fat while fasting. They found that a protein known as eukaryotic translation initiation factor (eIF4E) changes the body’s metabolism to switch to “fat consumption” during fasting. The same switch also occurs when an animal is on a ketogenic diet – a diet based on high fat and low carbohydrates. The team, from UC San Francisco in the US, discovered that a new cancer drug called eFT508, which is currently in clinical trials, blocked this protein, preventing the body from metabolising fat. In mouse studies, researchers found that when...

title: आजमगढ़ में मुख्यमंत्री डैशबोर्ड पोर्टल की हुई समीक्षा:E, C, D ग्रेड प्राप्त विभागों को दिया गया ग्रेडिंग सुधारने के निर्देश, किसी भी हालत में न हों रैंकिंग में गिरावट
content: आजमगढ़ जिले के डीएम विशाल भारद्वाज ने मुख्यमंत्री डैशबोर्ड पोर्टल के विकास कार्यों की समीक्षा बैठक की। इस समीक्षा बैठक में ई ग्रेड डी ग्रेड और सी ग्रेड प्राप्त विभागों को अपनी ग्रेडिंग सुधारने के निर्देश दिए गए। डीएम ने संबंधित विभाग के अधिकारियों को दुग्ध मूल्य का भुगतान न होने पर आई गिरावट जिले के डीएम विशाल भारद्वाज ने बताया कि दुग्ध विकास विभाग दुग्ध मूल्य का भुगतान न होने के कारण रैंकिंग में गिरावट आई है इसको लेकर अधिकारियों को फटकार भी लगाई है। इसके साथ ही दूध की गुणवत्ता को बरकरार रखने के साथ ही समय से मूल्य भुगतान और सहकारी दुग्ध समितियां का गठन कर ग्रेडिंग और रैंकिंग में सुधार लाने के निर्देश दिए हैं। बेसिक शिक्षा विभाग को मिड डे मील और विद्यार्थियों की उपस्थिति में भी ग्रेडिंग और रैंकिंग सुधारने के निर्देश दिए गए हैं। पंचायती राज विभाग में भी काम करने की जरूरत डीएम विशाल भारद्वाज ने पंचायती राज विभाग की ग्रेडिंग में सुधार लाने के निर्देश दिए हैं इसके साथ ही मत्स्य पालन आईसीडीएस विश्वकर्मा श्रम सम्मान की ग्रेडिंग सुधार कर समाज कल्याण विभाग ऊर्जा विभाग और कृषि विभाग सहित जिन भी विभागों की ग्रेडिंग में गिरावट है। उन्हें 25 अगस्त तक हर हाल में सुधार लें। इसके साथी पौधारोपण अभियान की समीक्षा करते हुए डीएम ने डीएफओ को पौधारोपण अभियान के अंतर्गत लगाए गए पौधों को संरक्षित करने का निर्देश दिया। इस अवसर पर बड़ी संख्या में विभागीय अधिकारी उपस्थित रहे।

title: Alexander Lecaros, futbolista de Cienciano, se casó con periodista brasileña en Cusco
content: Entretenimiento Alexander Lecaros, futbolista de Cienciano, contrajo matrimonio con la joven periodista brasileña Bia Barangertusen en una íntima ceremonia en Cusco. El deportista y su ahora esposa compartieron detalles de la boda en sus redes sociales y evidenciaron su felicidad. (video: @biabarangertusen)

title: 'ഉത്തരമലബാറിലെ ഉമ്മാക്കി കാട്ടി പേടിപ്പിക്കേണ്ട'; ഇടുക്കിയിൽ കോൺഗ്രസ് - ലീഗ് തർക്കം പരസ്യ പോരിലേക്ക്
content: തൊടുപുഴ: ഭിന്നത രൂക്ഷമായി പരസ്യ പോരിലേക്ക് നീണ്ട് ഇടുക്കിയിൽ കോൺഗ്രസ് - മുസ്ലിം ലീഗ് തർക്കം. സോഷ്യൽ മീഡിയയിലും അല്ലാതെയും പ്രവർത്തകരും നേതാക്കളും വാക്പോര് തുടരുന്നതിനിടെ ലീഗിനെതിരെ ശക്തമായ ആരോപണവുമായി ഡിസിസി പ്രസിഡന്റ് രംഗത്തു വന്നു. ഇതിന് പിന്നാലെ മറുപടിയുമായി മുസ്ലിം ലീഗ് ജില്ലാ പ്രസിഡൻ്റും രംഗത്ത് വന്നതോടെ ഇടുക്കിയിലെ യു.ഡി.എഫിൽ ഭിന്നത കൂടുതൽ രൂക്ഷമായി. സിപിഎമ്മും ലീഗും നടത്തുന്നത് കൂട്ടുകച്ചവടമാണെന്നും മൂന്നുമാസം വിദേശത്തായിരുന്ന മുസ്ലീം ലീഗ് ജില്ലാ പ്രസിഡന്റ് കെ.എം.എ. ഷൂക്കൂർ എൽ.ഡി.എഫുമായി ഡീൽ ഉറപ്പിച്ച ശേഷമാണ് ചെയർമാൻ തിരഞ്ഞെടുപ്പിന് തലേന്ന് നാട്ടിലെത്തിയതെന്നും ഇടുക്കി ഡിസിസി പ്രസിഡന്റ് സി.പി മാത്യു ആരോപിച്ചു. ഉത്തര കേരളത്തിലെ ഉമ്മാക്കി കാട്ടി ലീഗ് തൊടുപുഴയിലെ ജനാധിപത്യ വിശ്വാസികളെ പേടിപ്പിക്കരുത്. ലീഗിന്റെ ഭീഷണിയൊന്നും കോൺഗ്രസിനോട് വേണ്ട. അടുത്ത തവണ ലീഗ് സ്വതന്ത്രമായി മത്സരിച്ച് വിജയിക്കട്ടെ. ഇക്കാര്യത്തിൽ ഒരു വിട്ടുവീഴ്ചക്കും ജില്ലയിലെ കോൺഗ്രസ് നേതൃത്വം തയാറല്ല. വിവരങ്ങൾ കെ.പി.സി.സി പ്രസിഡന്റിനെയും പ്രതിപക്ഷ നേതാവിനെയും അറിയിച്ചിട്ടുണ്ടെന്നും സി.പി. മാത്യു പറഞ്ഞു. പത്രസമ്മേളനത്തിൽ തൊടുപുഴ ബ്ലോക്ക് കോൺഗ്രസ് പ്രസിഡന്റ് ഷിബിലി സാഹിബ്, ചാർളി ആന്റണി, തോമസ് മാത്യു കക്കുഴിയിൽ, ജോസ് അഗസ്റ്റിൻ എന്നിവർ പങ്കെടുത്തു. പിന്നാലെ ലീ​ഗും രം​ഗത്തെത്തി. ഇടുക്കി ഡിസിസി പ്രസിഡൻ്റിനെ കോൺഗ്രസ് നേതൃത്വം നിലയ്ക്ക് നിർത്തണമെന്നും അനുരഞ്ജനത്തിന്റെ അവസാന സാധ്യതകൾ ഇല്ലാതാക്കാനുള്ള ഗൂഢശ്രമത്തെ തള്ളിപ്പറയണമെന്നും മുസ്ലിം ലീഗ് ഇടുക്കി ജില്ലാ കമ്മിറ്റി ആവശ്യപ്പെട്ടു. തൊടുപുഴ നഗരസഭ...

OPINIÓN | Anuncian la victoria de Maduro, ¿problema para la izquierda latinoamericana?
creator: CNNEspañol sjv
content: Nota del editor: Jorge Dávila Miguel es Licenciado en Periodismo desde 1973 y ha mantenido una carrera continuada en su profesión hasta la fecha. Ostenta posgrados en Ciencias de la Información Social y Medios de Comunicación Sociales, así como estudios superiores posuniversitarios en Relaciones Internacionales, Economía Política e Historia Latinoamericana. Es de nacionalidad cubana y ha recorrido casi todos los niveles y labores de su profesión, desde reportero hasta corresponsal extranjero en prensa plana y radial, así como productor ejecutivo en medios televisivos. Como columnista, Dávila Miguel ha sido premiado por la Asociación de Periodistas Hispanoamericanos y la Sociedad Interamericana de Prensa. Actualmente Dávila Miguel es columnista del Nuevo Herald, en la cadena McClatchy y analista político y columnista en CNN en Español. (CNN Español) -- El Gobierno de Nicolas Maduro, a través del Consejo Nacional Electoral, fue prudente en dar las cifras de su victoria. Apenas 51,95% según el segundo boletín, 1,95% más de lo que necesitaba para ganar . La oposición dice que lo superó por 37% y asomaba un conflicto popular. Hoy los reportes desde Venezuela indican que no hay protestas en el país, pero la izquierda latinoamericana no está tranquila. No se creen la victoria del bolivariano. title: Amid Paramount Layoffs And Skydance Talks, CBS Sports Has Emerged “Largely Intact” And “Strong” Due To Viewer Demand, Division Chief David Berson Says
creator: Dade Hayes
content: CBS Sports CEO David Berson said the volatility at parent company Paramount Global , which is laying off 15% of its U.S. workforce and preparing to merge with Skydance Media , isn’t taking his division off its game. “There’s no doubt that the media and entertainment world is incredibly complex these days, but there’s no doubt that the sports world is growing in value every single day,” the exec said Wednesday at an NFL media breakfast at Paramount’s corporate headquarters in New York. Berson has been in the top job at CBS Sports since the springtime. He was the No. 2 exec during the lengthy tenure of former Chairman Sean McManus and was named to the CEO position when McManus announced his plan to retire. The two remain close, Berson said. Asked about managing through tumult (something he and McManus experienced during the years when CBS Corp. was its own company led by Les Moonves), he said the sports division has been shielded from the worst of it. Viewer demand continues to surge for the NFL, and CBS enters this NFL season on a high note after airing the most-watched Super Bowl of all time last February. As to the layoffs, Berson said, “Every group’s impacted, of course, but we’re largely intact.” The major staff reductions followed an eye-popping write-down last Thursday of $6 billion of the value of the company’s cable networks, on the heels of an even larger one by Warner...

Demokrate Nikšić: Laž DPS-a da se otpad odlaže u Željezari razbijena
creator: portal@dan.co.me (DAN portal)
content: Kazali su da su danas predstavnici Ministarstva ekologije, održivog razvoja i razvoja sjevera, zajedno sa predstavnicima Agencije za zaštitu životne sredine i Opštine Nikšić, obišli privatnu halu u krugu Željezare, u kojoj se pretovara otpad i odvozi na deponiju Livade u Podgorici i konstatovali da se cijeli postupak vrši u skladu sa standardima. Oni su dostavili video snimak na kojem se, kažu, jasno vidi da u Željezari ne postoji nikakva deponija, niti se u njoj odlaže otpad, kako to tvrdi DPS, već se otpad pretovara. Dodali su da će u toj hali ubrzo biti opremljena transfer stanica kao prelazno rješenje do izgradnje Centra za upravljanje otpadom za čiju izgradnju su pokrenite neophodne procedure. - Vlast u Nikšiću, čiju okosnicu čine Demokrate, nastavlja da rješava probleme koje DPS nije bio sposoban da riješi, brinući o zaštiti životne sredine i zdravlja građana koji su nam na prvom mjestu - zaključuje se u saopštenju.

title: Ampel beschließt Wohngeld-Erhöhung: So viel Geld gibt es jetzt
creator: Max Schäfer
content: Ampel beschließt Wohngeld-Erhöhung: So viel Geld gibt es jetzt Die Ampel-Koalition reagiert auf steigende Preise und erhöht das Wohngeld. Doch wer bekommt es und wie viel mehr gibt es? Berlin – Steigende Mieten, teurere Lebenshaltungskosten: Die Bundesregierung reagiert auf die Inflation und erhöht das Wohngeld. Die Unterstützung soll am 1. Januar 2025 um 15 Prozent steigen. Durchschnittlich sollen Wohngeldempfänger damit 30 Euro zusätzlich erhalten. Das teilte das Bundesbauministerium mit. Eine Zustimmung des Bundesrats steht noch aus. Ampel erhöht Wohngeld: Geywitz will „Entlastungswirkung auch langfristig“ erhalten „Die Menschen geben heute deutlich mehr Geld für Miete, Energie und die Waren des täglichen Bedarfs aus“, erklärte Bauministerin Klara Geywitz (SPD). Die Erhöhung um die durchschnittlich 15 Prozent soll die „Entlastungswirkung auch langfristig“ erhalten, sagte die -Politikerin. „Damit bleibt , Familien und Arbeitende weiterhin bezahlbar.“ Das erhalten. Dadurch soll die Belastung durch die Wohnkosten reduziert werden, damit die Betroffenen wegen zu hoher Mieten nicht oder Grundsicherung beantragen müssen. Bei der letzten Reform 2023 hat die den Kreis der Berechtigten ausgeweitet. Auch Eigentümer können Wohngeld beantragen. title: İtalya'daki plaj kulübü işletmecileri, AB rekabet kurallarının işlerini tehdit etmesinden endişeli
content: İtalya'da plaj kulübü işletmecilerine verilen imtiyazlar ve bunları düzenleyen ulusal bir yasanın olmaması tartışılıyor. İtalya'da "lidos" olarak adlandırılan plaj kulübü işletmecileri, şezlong ve şemsiye kiralayan işletmelerden sahil kenarında restoran ve bar işletmelere kadar çeşitlilik gösteriyor. 2006 yılında kabul edilen ve Bolkestein Direktifi olarak da bilinen Avrupa Birliği (AB) rekabet kuralları gereğince, plaj kulüplerinin lisansları Ocak 2026'dan itibaren ihaleye çıkarılmaya başlanacak. Bu durum uzun süre aynı aile tarafından işletilen plaj kulübü işletmelerinde endişe yaratıyor. İtalyan hükümeti, çeşitli sektörlerde piyasayı serbest bırakarak rekabet gücünü artırmayı amaçlayan direktife uymakta gecikti. Yeni yasanın etkilerine tepki olarak bazı plaj kulübü sahipleri greve giderken, bazı işletmeler ise ruhsatlarını kaybetme tehlikesini azaltmak için birleşme kararı aldı. 'Nesilden nesile aktarılan yaşam tarzı' Kendisi de bir plaj kulübü işletmecisi olan Marco Lepre, Roma'ya arabayla bir saat uzaklıktaki Fiumincino'nun iki kilometrelik sahil şeridi boyunca uzanan 11 işletme sahibini temsil eden bir grup kurdu. Lepre, "Bu girişim ile bir iş ağı olarak bütün becerilerimizi kullanarak kaçırılmaması gereken ihalelere katılmayı amaçlıyoruz. Fikrimiz, yerel belediyenin öne çıkmasını sağlayacak projeleri paylaşarak...

title: RDC : Arrestation à Beni de présumés criminels impliqués dans le braquage armé d'un point de transfert d'argent
creator: PMaki
content: L'armée congolaise a arrêté et présenté mardi à Beni plusieurs criminels présumés, membres d'un réseau de voleurs à main armée opérant dans les villes de Beni et Butembo, au Nord-Kivu. Parmi les personnes interpellées figure Paluku Kinava Patrick, un criminel notoire recherché pour ses activités sur les grands chemins. Il a été arrêté par les forces militaires en pleine opération de braquage, armé de AK-47. Lors de cette opération, lui et ses complices avaient cambriolé un shop de transfert d'argent dans le quartier Mabolio, emportant 5000 USD, 4 millions de francs congolais et quatre téléphones. Kambale Tsongo, également un criminel notoire, a été arrêté dans des circonstances similaires, en pleine opération de braquage, armé lui aussi d'une arme de guerre. Il était impliqué dans le même cambriolage du shop de transfert d'argent. Kasereka Vagheni George, un autre criminel recherché, a également été appréhendé par les militaires lors d'un braquage au même endroit. Il était armé et s'apprêtait à dévaliser le shop de transfert d'argent. Ces derniers mois, les actes de vol à main armée se sont multipliés à Beni. Par exemple, le 11 mai 2024, la police avait interpellé 20 personnes, dont deux femmes, dans le quartier Kalinda à Beni. Elles étaient accusées de vol et de détention illégale d'effets militaires, dont quatre...

title: Erica Mena Gets Called Out For Slamming Safaree’s “New Purpose” In Life
creator: Caroline Fisher
content: It's no secret that Safaree and his ex Erica Mena haven't always gotten along , but recently, she's found herself at the center of backlash for her comments on his latest inspirational message. Earlier this week, the rapper took to social media to announce that his new purpose in life is giving back. “I want to start giving back more, and uh, I don’t why lately. [Maybe] this trip is just making me see things different [but] I have to do it. So if you’re somebody who know me, link me up if you want to help in any way,” he explained. He went on to announce that his foundation will be doing "a community treat giveback" later this month. Shortly after, Mena hopped on Instagram to call him out, claiming that he cares about other people's children and not theirs . Moreover, she said that she's been feeling guilty for missing their daughter's first day of preschool, while he frequently misses important dates in their kids' lives. Read More: Erica Mena Responds After Being Called Out For Racism On Her New Dating Show “And here I am feeling guilty because I wasn’t there due to work. And while I’m feeling guilty, motherf*****s is out here trying to make the world believe that they actually have a charity because they care about other people’s children,” Mena said. “How can you care about anybody else’s children when you don’t even care about your own?” Mena's remarks have earned mixed...

title: Catean casa en el Campestre
creator: Antonio Flores Schroeder
content: Fotografía: Gabriel Barraza Durante el operativo, estuvo presente el fiscal de distrito zona norte, Carlos Manuel Salas Por Gabriel Barraza | 11:12 am 14 agosto, 2024 Decenas de policías ministeriales ejecutaron una orden de cateo en una casa ubicada en el cruce de las calles Fresno y Senecú, en el exclusivo fraccionamiento Campestre, cerca de los bulevares Tomás Fernández y Manuel Gómez Morín. Los agentes de la Fiscalía General del Estado (FGE) llegaron al lugar en aproximadamente 10 patrullas, bloqueando la calle privada antes de intervenir en la lujosa vivienda. Durante el operativo, estuvo presente el fiscal de distrito zona norte, Carlos Manuel Salas, quien dialogó con los propietarios de la casa mientras los agentes realizaban la inspección. De manera extraoficial, se informó que el objetivo del cateo era obtener las grabaciones de dos cámaras de vigilancia que apuntan al lugar exacto donde ocurrió el asesinato de dos hombres, quienes estaban a bordo de un auto deportivo Porsche. Tras el operativo, los agentes estatales volvieron a cerrar la calle Senecú para continuar con las investigaciones en la escena del doble homicidio. Se informó extraoficialmente que habrían salido de un bar ubicado en Plaza Portales, a 300 metros del ataque Por Redacción Se trata de Miguel Amador Z. title: قائم پناه: رئیس جمهور، سردار مومنی را به عنوان وزیر کشور انتخاب کرد
content: ، محمد جعفر قائم‌ پناه روز چهارشنبه در گفت وگویی اظهار داشت: دکتر مسعود پزشکیان گفتند خودم اسکندر مومنی را به عنوان وزیر کشور انتخاب کردم. با جمیع جهات دیدم بهتر از گزینه‌های دیگری است و این وزیر من خواهد بود نه وزیر شخص دیگری. برای من کار خواهد کرد نه برای شخص دیگری. این نکته خیلی مهم است برخلاف چیزی که دوستان مطرح می کنند بنابراین یکی از وزیرهایی که رئیس جمهور شخصاً انتخاب سرد سردار مومنی بود. وی خاطر نشان کرد: در همین هنگام رئیس دفتر آمدند و گفتند که قرار بود که جواب بدهند، سردار مومنی گفتند که من نمی‌آیم و دکتر کمی فکر کرد. بلافاصله گفتم من با ایشان صحبت می‌کنم. به مومنی زنگ زدم و از آمدن اکراه داشت از او خواهش کردم به جد که حتما بیاید. قائم پناه افزود: نظر وی این بود که من نظامی هستم و ممکن است برای دولت دکتر پزشکیان هزینه ایجاد کنم، بهتر است فرد غیر نظامی را انتخاب کنید. معاون اجرایی رئیس جمهور و سرپرست نهاد ریاست جمهوری تصریح کرد: تعجب کردم که ظفرقندی به لیست وزرا اضافه شدند، دکتر پزشکیان شخصا تصمیم گرفته بودند. از ساعت ۷:۳۰ دقیقه تا ۱۱ چندین بار با ظفرقندی تماس گرفتم و درخواست کردم که با ایشان تماس بگیرند. از یکی از دوستان خواستم که با ایشان تماس بگیرند. دو تا از دوستان گفتند که قرار نبوده من وزیر شوم و نمی‌شوم. قائم پناه ادامه داد: ایشان خود دو تا سه نفر را به عنوان وزیر پیشنهاد کرده بود و لذا وزارت خودشان را منتفی شده می‌دانست دوستان آقای دکتر گفتند که ظفرقندی قبول نخواهد کرد پس از آن به مدت ۲ ساعت با ایشان صحبت کردم تا متقاعد شدند که بپذیرد. با او از جنگ...

title: Atropello en Navarra: una anciana ha resultado herida tras ser arrollada por un vehículo
